<p>21b.5</p>phyogs bskor bar bya/ /g.yas pa yis ni g.yon par dbye/ /snying gar g.yon pa ral gri 'dud/ /mgal me 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung / /rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yi/ /thal mo 'grom pa spyi bor gzhag /go cha mthe'u chung phye ba
<p>21b.6</p>dang / /khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o/ /de nas phyag bzhi byas la/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas te/ oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM zhes bya ba 'dis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgom mo/ /
<p>21b.7</p>de nas oM swa b+hA ba shur+d+ho\u0f85haM zhes bya bas rang bzhin gyis dag par mos par byas la/ oM sarba sa ma yo\u0f85 haM zhes bya bas bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du bsam par bya'o/ /de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge
<p>22a</p>
<p>22a.1</p>brgya pa rdo rje'i tshig gam yid kyis bzlas la/ thams cad bdag yin no zhes bsgoms la/ lha thams cad kyi zhal nas sngags kyi sgra 'byung bar bsam zhing / bzlas pa la brtson par byas na de lta bus ni thams cad kyis bzlas par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid skyo bar
<p>22a.2</p>ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgoms la skyo bar gyur na yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod la/ mchod yon phul te mchod la phyag bzhi byas nas/ phyag rgya gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid las bkrol la/ rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas badzra muHzhes bya ba
<p>22a.3</p>dang / dgrol bar bya'o/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gnas kyi nges pa ni bshad zin to/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gnas ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje las kyi gnas nyid yin no/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas
<p>22a.4</p>ni spyi gtsug yin no/ /de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya snying gnas byung ba/ rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gnas pa dang / oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes bya bas phyag rgya thams cad dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la sarba mu traM mai tri ku ru ba ra ka ba tse na baM zhes bya
<p>22a.5</p>ba dang / mdzub mo gnyis kyis snga ma bzhin du go cha bgos la/ tha mar mnyam pa'i thal mos snga ma bzhin du mnyes par byas la/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang yi ge brgya pa bzlas nas/ mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ste/ bdag gi cho ga
<p>22a.6</p>ma tshang ba gang dag bgyis pa de bzod par mdzod cig ces gsol ba btab la/ mchod yon phul nas/ oM kr-i to ba sarba satwA r+tha sid+d+he ma dat+t+wa ya thA nu ga gats+tsha twAM bud+d+hA bi Sha yaM/ pu na ra ga ma na yats+tsha zhes bya bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams gshegs pa'i phyir
<p>22a.7</p>bskul bar bya zhing / oM badzra satwa muHzhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis/ rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya gyen du dgrol bar bya'o/ /de ltar na thams cad kyang gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ba bzhin du sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams ni/ de
<p>22b</p>
<p>22b.1</p>bzhin du yid kyis legs pa'i sbyor bas rang gi lus la bcug la/ rdo rje srung ba dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag nyid bsrung ba byas nas langs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi las dang / glegs
<p>22b.2</p>bam bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de ltar nyin re zhing thun bzhir zla ba gcig gam/ zla ba drug gam/ lo gcig gam/ dus ji srid kyi lha rnams las gnang ba thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bya'o/ /yang na snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor
<p>22b.3</p>chen po dang / mchod pa la sogs pa byas la/ de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung / /chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher/ /byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla/ /de nas badzra At+ma ko la sogs pa'i snying po gsum bzlas la/ de'i don gsum po rnam
<p>22b.4</p>par bsgoms nas/ phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i sngags lnga pos rang gi snying gar/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la/ sngar bshad pa'i snying pos dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de/ nam mkha' dang mnyam
<p>22b.5</p>pa'i sbyor bas zhugs la/ badzra At+ma ko la sogs pa'i sngags kyis de rnams dang gcig tu gyur par byas la/ badzra d+hA tu ra haM swa yaM zhes bya bas/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bdag nyid nges par byas te/ thams cad kyang bdag nyid kho na yin no zhes
<p>22b.6</p>bsgoms la/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po'am/ sngags zlos shing lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang sngags kyi sgra 'byung bar yang bsam par bya'o/ /phyogs de lta bu la sogs pas kyang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ngal
<p>22b.7</p>zhing dub na mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa dang / mchod pa dang / phyag bzhi byas la/ thun bzhi'i tha mar yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bstod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa byas la gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang
<p>23a</p>
<p>23a.1</p>sngags rnams ni/ rnal 'byor chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin pas/ dkyil 'khor bsgom par mi nus pa gang yin pa des ni rnal 'byor chen po byas la/ thams cad kyi sngags re re zhing bzlas brjod 'bum 'bum byas la/ badzro tiSh+Tha zhes lan 'bum
<p>23a.2</p>bzlas la rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas/ mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas brtsams te des bum pa la sogs pa de nam mkha' la 'jog par nus par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje mdzub sor gnyis legs par/ /rab mnyam
<p>23a.3</p>gzhag pas bsnyams nas ni/ /shi ba thams cad slong ba ste/ /rdo rje slong ba zhes bya'o/ /badzra A be sha a zhes bya ba yang bzlas brjod 'bum byas la/ rdo rje dril bu mar la byugs te/ sreg blugs stong gis mngon par sbyangs la/ rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas
<p>23a.4</p>bzung la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na de 'grub par 'gyur la lag na thogs pa thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// //de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ 
<p>23a.5</p>yul lam/ grong khyer gyi shar ram/ byang gi phyogs kyi char ram/ rang yid dang mthun pa der dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /der shin tu mnyam zhing snum la shar du gzhol ba/ tshad dang ldan zhing tsha sgo can ma yin pa'i sa'i char rgyal pos ni khru brgya 'am lnga
<p>23a.6</p>bcu'o/ blon po dang blon po chen pos ni khru lnga bcu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /tshong dpon nam ded dpon gyis ni khru nyi shu'am de'i phyed do/ /sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis sam drug pa bya'o/ /de la dang po kho nar mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su/ mi rus kyi phye
<p>23a.7</p>ma khrag dang dug dang bcas pa dang / mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gyi cho gas dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bzlog la/ bdag dang slob ma dang sa bdag la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas sa sbyang du gzhug par bya ste/ 'dom gang tsam la lkog ma'am lte ba'am
<p>23b</p>
<p>23b.1</p>pus mo nub pa tsam du 'og tu brkos la/ spos chu dri zhim pos sbrus pa'i sas bkang la/ rdo rje rtse mo yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus chag chag btab ste/ 'thas par bcags la shin tu mnyam par byas pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du chud pa/ rta babs bzhis mdzes
<p>23b.2</p>par byas pa/ sgo bzhi dang skar khung gis yongs su bskor ba/ tha mar dril bu legs par btags pa dang bcas pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / bla re'i mchod pa sna tshogs bres pa/ sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris dang sku gzugs kyis nye bar brgyan pa/ grwa bzhir
<p>23b.3</p>spos snod gzhag pa/ me tog dang mar me dang gos la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas la dris byugs te/ rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus yongs su bsangs la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o/ /sa sbyang ba dang yongs
<p>23b.4</p>su gzung ba'i cho ga'o// //de nas bdag nyid khrus byas shing lus dris byugs la/ ji snyed pa'i gos dang rgyan gdags shing / shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgos la/ /me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhim par byas la/ yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad
<p>23b.5</p>nas brtsams te/ tshes bcu'am/ tshes bcu gsum mam bcu bzhi nas brtsams te/ bco lnga'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o/ /gnyug mar gnas pa'i sa'i char Ti phyag dar dang / skyang nul byas la/ de bzhin du lag pas reg par byas nas/ rdo rje sems
<p>23b.6</p>dpa' bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas cho ga thams cad spyad par bya'o/ /yang na tshes bco lnga'i snga dro nas brtsams te bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i zhag ni/ slob dpon slob ma dang bcas pas smyung bar gnas par bya'o/ /de la re zhig dkyil 'khor
<p>23b.7</p>gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la/ bdag bsrung ba dang / bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i 'khor los dkyil 'khor sprul la/ phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang sdom pa bzung la/ rnal 'byor chen po dang khang pa brtsegs
<p>24a</p>
<p>24a.1</p>pa dang / gdan la sogs pa bskyed la/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam
<p>24a.2</p>par/ /gyur par bdag ni som nyi med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig las/ /mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni/ /deng bdag skye bar the tshom med/ /deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med/ /sangs
<p>24a.3</p>rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no/ /de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas te/ spos snod lag tu thogs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
<p>24a.4</p>dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol/ /zhes brjod la/ dang po'i sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang las kyi rgyal po'i
<p>24a.5</p>mchog rnam par bsgoms nas/ yang sgo dbye ba sngon du 'gro bas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas pa'i bar du byas nas/ de'i sngags zlos pa la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa la/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog de bzhin gshegs
<p>24a.6</p>pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas langs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams gang bar mngon
<p>24a.7</p>sum du bsams la/ bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin/ /bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal/ /phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag yin/ /bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag /
<p>24b</p>
<p>24b.1</p>byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor ro/ /de nas badzra dr-iSh+Ti ma Ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la/ yi ge a las rkang mthil gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la/ rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ badzra satwa ut+tiSh+ThA zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor de nam mkha'i steng du bteg go/ /
<p>24b.2</p>de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya des bdag nyid lan cig byin gyis brlabs la/ yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te/ phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs/ /kun du rnam par bltas nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas/ /bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs
<p>24b.3</p>su bskor/ /rdo rje'i lta bas phyogs dang mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / rab dang dra ba byas nas/ rkang mthil nas yongs su gzung ste/ sa gzhi nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byas la/ /yang bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa
<p>24b.4</p>byas nas/ sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dang ldan pas/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya'o/ /oM badzra sarba maN+Da la hUM dzaH rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mdzub mo dang / mthe bong rdo rjer bya ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad dgug pa yin no/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / 
<p>24b.5</p>ma hA badzra tsakra a d+hi tiSh+Tha sid+d+h+ya hUM zhes bya ba 'dis yang dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgya nyid 'di'i phyag rgya yin no/ /de nas seng ldeng las byas pa'i rdo rje'i phur bu/ dbus dang grwa bzhir rdo rjes brdung bar bya ste/ oM badzra ki la ya
<p>24b.6</p>sarba big+h+naM ban+d+ha hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ste/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs la/ hUM zlos shing de dang dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhi dang dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar phur bu lnga bskyed la/ lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje rtsa gsum par byas pas
<p>24b.7</p>brdung zhing 'di skad ces bzlas par bya'o/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+TAn phaT/ ki la ya ki la ya sarba pA paM phaTaHbadzra ki la ya/ badzra d+ha rod Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i bsang chu'i bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bzhag la/ 
<p>25a</p>
<p>25a.1</p>rdo rje khu tshur gyi las kyi phyag rgyas bsrung ba thams cad brtan par byas la/ rdo rje go chas go bskon par bya ste/ de yang bcing ba'i cho ga'i sbyor ba la/ /rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtan/ /rdo rje go chas go bskon pas/ /dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung bar bya/ /zhes
<p>25a.2</p>gsungs pa yin no/ /yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi gnas dris nye bar byugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gnas su tsan+dan dang gur gum la sogs pa'i lde gus dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas la/ lhag
<p>25a.3</p>ma rnams ni zlum por bya zhing rang rang gi sngags kyang lan bdun bdun du bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha'i phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang mnyes pa la sogs pa byas la rang gi snying gar bcug ste/ mchod pa lnga
<p>25a.4</p>pos legs par mchod do/ /de nas dbang bskur ba'i bum pa 'bru la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan par chu nyung zad cig blugs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzlas pa'i mchod yon phul te/ spos chu dang me tog kyang bcug la spos kyis bdugs te/ cho ga
<p>25a.5</p>bzhin du lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /nyin zhag gnyis pa la thun gsum du yang dag par bzlas par bya zhing / des dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /yang dkyil 'khor du bzlas la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i de'i mtshan nyid bdag nyid chen pos shes par byas la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i
<p>25a.6</p>spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas spyan la re re zhing mar la sogs pa'i sreg blugs dbul bar bya'o/ /lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// //de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la/ nye reg
<p>25a.7</p>byas nas/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de/ me tog la sogs pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod la/ phyag byas nas slob ma lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de la re zhig dang por khrus legs par bya'o/ /gos gtsang ma bgo zhing /
<p>25b</p>
<p>25b.1</p>lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la/ 'di skad smrar gzhug go/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid
<p>25b.2</p>stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste/ 
<p>25b.3</p>rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas ni/ /shin tu bsam pa bzang por ldan pas nyon/ /brjod ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob/ /dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang / /rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid
<p>25b.4</p>stsal gang / /de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni/ /spyan sngar ma lus da ltar so sor bshags/ /bde gshegs sras kyi tshogs gnyis zab pa dang / /rgya ches 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don/ /sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan la yang / rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo / /
<p>25b.5</p>thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cing / /blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom/ /ma lus rigs kyi pad+ma'i nang zhugs pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi/ /blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' rab ste/ /dman pas 'jigs pa rnams kyi
<p>25b.6</p>rgyal byed tshal/ /srid pa'i 'byor ba zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog /gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing / /blo gros rnams rgyal thugs rje cher ldan pa'i/ /brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs
<p>25b.7</p>mchi zhing / /srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid/ /'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rgyal gyur pa/ /snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cing yang dag rtogs/ /mnyam med byang chub rnam par gzung bar bgyi/ /sems can
<p>26a</p>
<p>26a.1</p>rnams ni yongs su smin pa'am/ /yang na yongs su bskyab par bya phyir ram/ /rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /'di dag thams cad rtswa sogs bzhin du btang / /de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan shes
<p>26a.2</p>rab bla na med pa ni/ /bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bgyi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags la mkhas pa yis/ /chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni/ /'gro ba 'di yis thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /khyad 'phags
<p>26a.3</p>gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi/ /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /bdag gis de skad ces brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ /bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par
<p>26a.4</p>bgyi'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang / thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyis btul nas/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab tu gzhag par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
<p>26a.5</p>gyur kyang / sems can 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med do zhes sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtogs par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis ma yengs pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi
<p>26a.6</p>sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis theg pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtogs par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas par so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bgyi'o/ /
<p>26a.7</p>bdag gis stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa ma lus pa'i
<p>26b</p>
<p>26b.1</p>bar la mngon par gnas par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub chen por sems bskyed par rdo rje lta bu yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
<p>26b.2</p>bka' bzhin byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo ste 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po'o/ /de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs par byas pa'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la gnas pas kun
<p>26b.3</p>du bzang po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba sgo mtha' yas pa la gnas pa mtha' med par gyur pa rdzogs par byas nas/ gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang po bstan pas yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar
<p>26b.4</p>bya ba dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la nges par sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /de nas sa ma ya a zhes bzlas pas slob ma'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la/ de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa de bzhag la/ su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM a ho/ /badzra sid+d+h+ya ya thA su khaM zhes bya ba'i snying po yang snying
<p>26b.5</p>gar bzlas la/ spyi bor spos chus brlan pa'i lag pa bzhag ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas shing / rdo rje bsam par bya'o/ /dpral bar yi ge traM las rin po che/ lkog mar yi ge hraM las pad+ma/ spyi bor kaM las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la/ badzra satwa badzra rat+na/ badzra d+harma/ 
<p>26b.6</p>badzra karma zhes zlos shing / rang gi snying ga la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje dris de rnams kyi lag par dri sbyin par bya ste/ me tog gis me tog go/ /bdug pas bdug spos dbul lo/ /mar mes mar me'i snang ba bya'o/ /de nas u dum+WA ra dang a shwad+tha la
<p>26b.7</p>sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa rtse mor me tog bcings pa/ rdo rje bzhad pa bzlas la sbyin par bya'o/ /des kyang shar ram byang du bltas te rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya'o/ /de nas ku sha sar pa la rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su bzlas pa byin nas/ 
<p>27a</p>
<p>27a.1</p>'dis ni gdan du gding zhing / 'dis ni sngags su gyis la nyol cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas dpung pa g.yon par ni/ /rdo rje srung ba bzlas pa yi/ /srung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa'i/ /bdag nyid kyis ni legs par bcing / /de nas zab cing rgya che ba'i chos
<p>27a.2</p>ci nus par bstan pas/ thams cad la gzengs bstod pa byas nas/ bzhin bzangs dag longs shig /nang par dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas nyi ma shar kar dkyil 'khor de de bzhin du steng
<p>27a.3</p>du nam mkha' la bzhag la thig gdab par bya'o/ /de la dang por re zhig tshon rtsi sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po dri zhim pos bsgos pas srad bu so sor bsgyur la/ go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag nas/ de la hUM drAM hrIHa oM
<p>27a.4</p>zhes bya bas rang rang gi sa bon las mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu la bkod de/ dIp+ta dr-iSh+Ti aM ku sha dzaHzhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la/ /rab tu g.yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig /mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni/ /zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa
<p>27a.5</p>la bskul zhing / bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab par bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig /ces bya bas kyang bskul bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis bskul ba'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pas btab pa'i srad bu 'bar ba'i
<p>27a.6</p>lcags kyus bkug ste/ rang gi lag na gnas pa la/ /srad bu des gang bar byas la/ a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harmAHspa ra spa ra a nu pra biSh+Ti sarba d+harmAHa t+yan ta/ a nu pra biSh+Ta/ sarba d+harmAHoM badzra satwa hUM zhes zlos shing bsgril bar bya'o/ /bsgril nas mig g.yas
<p>27a.7</p>dang g.yon gnyis su ma dang Ta las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la/ badzra dr-iSh+Ta ma Ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas la/ srad bu de dris byugs pa'i gser la sogs pa'i snod du legs par bzhag la/ dri dang me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pas mchod la/ oM badzra sa ma ya sU traM mA
<p>27b</p>
<p>27b.1</p>ti kra ma hUM zhes bya ba rdo rje bsdams pas bzung ste/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas sems dpa' bcu drug bzlas pa'i dris/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi yang byugs la/ phyi rol kun du me tog gis mdzes par byas nas/ bar snang la bzhugs pa'i rigs
<p>27b.2</p>thams cad la mchod yon phul te/ me tog la sogs pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pas thams cad mchod la/ phyag byas te/ mig g.yas dang g.yon du yi ge dza ser po bkod la/ nyi ma dang zla ba ser por snang ba bskyed de/ glu dang rol mo la sogs pa dang bcas
<p>27b.3</p>pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya'o/ /de la re zhig sngar sngags bzlas pa'i srad bu dri zhim pa tha ma dkar po dang ldan pa/ yid kyis badzra d+hA tu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas la rnam par snang mdzad du gyur par byas nas/ sgrub pa po'i grogs mchog badzra karma zhes
<p>27b.4</p>brjod de rang gi snying gnas rdo rje las kyi gzugs su sprul bar bya'o/ /de nas badzra satwa zhes brjod de/ rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la srad bu de g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la/ dza zhes bya bas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rdo rje las kyi gzugs can
<p>27b.5</p>gyi lag tu srad bu de btang la/ phyogs thams cad du mnyam pa nyid du bsgom zhing / shar phyogs su bltas te/ rdo rje srad bus gdab par bya'o/ /yang slob dpon lhor 'dug la byang du bltas te/ gnyis pa gdab par bya'o/ /de nas me'i phyogs kyi char
<p>27b.6</p>gnas pa la/ byang du bltas te phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar du thig gdab po/ /rlung gi phyogs su gnas te/ lho phyogs su bltas la nub kyi thig gdab po/ /de nyid du 'dug ste byang gi thig gdab po/ /yang me'i phyogs su 'dug ste lho phyogs kyi thig gdab par
<p>27b.7</p>bya'o/ /kha khyer gyi thig kyang gdab par bya'o/ /yang me'i mtshams su gnas te rlung gi mtshams kyi bar gyi thig gdab pa dang / yang bden bral gyi mtshams su gnas te dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi bar du thig gdab par bya zhing / slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i
<p>28a</p>
<p>28a.1</p>grogs mchog bskor phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o/ /de la re zhig srad bu'i sngags ni/ oM badzra sa ma ya sU traM mA ti kra ma hUM zhes bya ba dang / dza dza dza zhes bya ba gsum gyis sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis drang bar bya'o/ /de la sgo ni cha brgyad pa'o/ /sgo khyud
<p>28a.2</p>ni sgo'i tshad kyi phyed do/ /kha khyer phyi'i thams cad dang nang gi kun ni sgo'i phyed do/ /tshon sna lnga'i sa ni kha khyer gyi phyed kyi tshad du bya'o/ /rta babs ni sgo'i sum 'gyur du bya'o/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed la zur bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba/ ka
<p>28a.3</p>ba brgyad dang ldan par thig btab la/ seng ldeng gi phur bu 'og rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu la/ steng rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i dbyibs can gyi phur bu la/ rdo rje phur bu'i sngags bzlas la/ rdo rje tho bas brdungs te snga ma bzhin du btab la/ de la brtod pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor
<p>28a.4</p>dang / phyi'i rdo rje'i phreng ba dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te g.yas nas bskor ba'i rim gyis gdab par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyi nyis 'gyur la/ mtha' skor khru drug par bya ba ni tshad chung ngu yin te/ gzhan dag tu ni ji tsam 'tsham par bya'o/ /da ni lung las gsungs
<p>28a.5</p>pa'i thig gi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste/ sar pa las ni bkal nas kyang / /tshad dang ldan pa mdzes pa yi/ /thig gis mkhas pa ci nus kyis/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab po/ /gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang / /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la/ /thig bzhi
<p>28a.6</p>dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol thig gdab po/ /de li rim pa'i nang zhugs la/ /'khor lo 'dra bar rdo rje yi/ /thig gis yongs su bskor
<p>28a.7</p>bya zhing / /ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis par/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab po/ /shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /nang dang phyi rol gyi kha khyer dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang /
<p>28b</p>
<p>28b.1</p>rnga yab dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang bri ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi grwa'i mtshams thams cad du/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bu btags pa'i ba dan sna tshogs btags pa dang / de'i sgo rnams kyi ni khyud kyi mtshams rnams su/ zla ba phyed pa la gnas pa'i rdo
<p>28b.2</p>rje rin po ches mdzes par bri bar bya'o/ /gal te bgegs byung ba bzlog par 'dod na/ phur bu'i sngags len 'bum bzlas pa'i phur bu dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te gdab par brtan pa dang / dbyibs 'dra ba'i phur bus bgegs thams cad la
<p>28b.3</p>gdab par bya'o/ /de yang ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la btags nas/ shar nas bskor phyogs su zlum por bskor ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor thig btab pa de'i phyi rol tu khor yug chen po/ de bzhin du zlum por thig btab la/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor der
<p>28b.4</p>grog mkhar gyi sa la sogs pa las bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas la/ brgya byin gyi gzugs brnyan shar phyogs na gnas pa la/ yi ge i las brgya byin mdog ser po'o/ /me la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan la yang de bzhin te/ raM las me lha dmar po/ oM haM
<p>28b.5</p>las gshin rje mdog nag po/ kaM las srin po nag po/ /baM las chu lha dkar po/ yaM las rlung lha dud ka /phaT las lus ngan po ser po/ sum+b+ha zhes bya ba las dbang ldan dkar po bskyed la/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug ta bcug la bcings te dbang du byas
<p>28b.6</p>nas phur bus gdab po/ /shin tu yang yun ring du bgegs med par byed 'dod pas sas dgab par bya'o/ /de lta na yang gal te bgegs byed na/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug nas/ lcags kyu la sogs pas kyang dgug pa la sogs pa byas te/ 
<p>28b.7</p>rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ rkang pa g.yon pas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan mnan te/ hUM baM hUM zhes bya ba la sogs pas spel ba'i tshul gyis/ g.yon pa brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la/ bgegs byed pa'i sprin la sogs pa la mngon par bltas te/ phyag
<p>29a</p>
<p>29a.1</p>rgya 'phangs te bstan la nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pas 'od zer 'bar ba kun du 'khrug pa'i rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis/ rkang pa bteg cing bsnun pas/ sprin la sogs pa thal bar byas par bsam par bya ste/ de lta bus ni bcom pa nyid du
<p>29a.2</p>'gyur ro/ /yang na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas la/ de'i 'og tu a las rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas/ rgyud las bshad pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur nges par byas la haM las 'phags pa mi g.yo ba yid kyis thugs ka nas phyung ste/ badzra haM ban+d+ha zhes yid
<p>29a.3</p>la brjod la/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du rlung gi phyogs su dri'i thig le bdun byas te/ thig le re re zhing yang re re'i nang du chud par byas la/ dbus ma dang tha ma yang thig le bdun dang ldan par byas te/ thig le bdun po de dag kyang rlung lha bdun po ri dwags la zhon pa
<p>29a.4</p>mdog nag po/ 'phags pa mi g.yo bas zhags pas bkug nas bcings par gyur par bsams la/ de rnams kyi dbus ma gcig ni gtso bo yin la/ lhag ma thig le drug po ni de bskor te kun nas gnas par bsam mo/ /de nas kham phor a las ri rab tu bsams la/ de'i
<p>29a.5</p>steng du a nyid las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rjes g.yogs pa/ dbus su yang rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi ge hUM gi sa bon las byung ba mtshams rnams su mdung rtse gsum pa rnam par bsams la/ de bzhin du badzra haM ban+d+ha zhes brjod de/ kham phor des ji skad du bshad pa'i
<p>29a.6</p>thig le bdun dgab par bya'o/ /de nas kham phor dang ri rab kyi steng du oM las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams te/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g.yon brkyang bas ri rab mnan nas/ ral gri dang zhags pas rlung rnams la
<p>29a.7</p>sdigs mdzub mdzad par bsams te/ de lta bus ni rlung rnams thams cad bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /de la chu la sogs pa'i bgegs bzlog par bshad par bya ste/ haM las rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i 'phags pa mi g.yo bar bdag nyid
<p>29b</p>
<p>29b.1</p>bskyed la/ grog mkhar gyis 'am/ ba glang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas/ khaM las ral gri/ raM las me'i snying po bskyed la/ kiM las zhags pa dang / lcags kyu bskyed de/ lag pa g.yon pas bzung la/ lag pa g.yas
<p>29b.2</p>pas lcags kyu dang zhags pas drangs nas/ bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi nang du bcug ste/ g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas la/ rkang pa g.yon pas spyi bo nas btsir la/ 'di skad ces brjod do/ /na maHsa man+t+ra badzrA NAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ 
<p>29b.3</p>tra ka haM maM zhes brjod nas gzugs brnyan de ral gris gtub par bya'o/ /dug dang ske tshe dang lan tshwa la sogs pas gzugs brnyan bskus la mes gdung bar bya'o/ /me yis gdungs pas de nyid kyang / /gdungs par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /tshangs pa'am brgya byin
<p>29b.4</p>yin na yang / de yi mod la myur du 'tshig /ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /las 'di dag kyang 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor gyis de'i gsang sngags khri bzlas pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas de'i 'og tu las bya'o/ /yang
<p>29b.5</p>oM AHhUM zhes bya ba 'dis 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ zhabs drug pa/ phyag g.yas gnyis na ral gri dang dgra sta bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gnyis na zhags pa gtun shing bsnams pa/ lho phyogs
<p>29b.6</p>su gzigs pa/ khro bo'i tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha'i khams kun du gang bar mdzad pa rnam par bsams la/ mdung thung gi phyag rgya bcings la/ sprin la sogs pa bzlog pa'i bsam pas/ tsham ngam dang bcas pas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa
<p>29b.7</p>nang du bcings la/ mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba ni mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o/ /de ltar na yang gal te bgegs rnams zhi bar ma gyur na/ kham phor som btang ba gnyis kyi nang du khrag dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang / da du ra'i lo ma'i khu bas sngags
<p>30a</p>
<p>30a.1</p>bris la/ yungs kar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ kham phor kha sbyar te/ de'i nang du bzhag la/ me'i bgegs la sogs pa bsams la/ sreg blugs brgya'am sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas de dag 'jig
<p>30a.2</p>pa'am/ 'chi ba'am/ mi ma yin pas gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor bas yi ge hUM bzlas brjod 'bum byas la/ /mi rus kyi rgyu las byas pa'i phur bu sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam la/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la
<p>30a.3</p>sogs pas bkug cing bcug ste bcings nas/ gzugs brnyan la phur bus gdab bo de nas me'i tshe ba zhi bar bshad par bya ste/ me'i steng du baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa'i 'khor lo/ de'i steng du baM gnyis nas bcom ldan 'das
<p>30a.4</p>rnam par snang mdzad dung dang kun+da ltar dkar bar bzhugs te/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa 'dra ba'i rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las/ chu bo bzhi 'bab pa lta bu'i char gyi rgyun babs pas phyogs bcur 'gengs par gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /rdo rje can dang rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kham phor gyi
<p>30a.5</p>ri rab dang / phur bu yang dag par bsrungs la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed can dag gis/ de rnams kyi nam mkha' bcing bar byas la/ rdo rje bcings pas dra ba bya'o/ /yang na mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gis bgegs bzlog par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
<p>30a.6</p>gyi dbus na gnas pa'i phur bu hUM bzhis bton la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i bu ga bkang la/ mnyam por gzhag go/ /de nas hi zhes bya bas mig g.yas pa dang / g.yon par nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la/ khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas la/ sgo rnams bya'o de nas
<p>30a.7</p>tshon rtsi byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM zhes bya ba 'dis phyag rgya dang ldan pas tshon rtsi thams cad la lan bdun gyi bar du mngon par bzlas na/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje'i
<p>30b</p>
<p>30b.1</p>phyag rgya gnyis las ni/ /mdzub mo rtse mo mnyam sbyar ba/ /byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni/ /'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya/ /hi zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtha' sbyar bar bya'o/ /oM badzra tsitra sa ma
<p>30b.2</p>ya hUM zhes zlos shing dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams te/ g.yas nas bskor bas g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis tshon rtsi dgye bar bya ste/ phyis ci bder bya'o/ /de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang dkar ba'i rim pa 'dis ci bder dgye'o/ /
<p>30b.3</p>khru drug par bya ba ni tshon rtsi'i ri mo chung tshad yin te/ de phan chad khru bskyed pas rkang pa yang bskyed par bya'o/ /de yang rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las/ sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin/ /gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste/ /pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin gzhan/ /de bzhin gzhan dag mar gta 'dra/ /
<p>30b.4</p>dkar po nang du shes bya ste/ /'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /shar phyogs su ni sngon po che/ /lhor ni ser po dang ldan pa/ /nub kyi phyogs ni dmar po ste/ /byang ni ljang gur yang dag ldan/ /dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni/ /shel
<p>30b.5</p>ltar snang ba bla na med/ /rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing / /rab mnyam gzhag ste de yis bri/ /rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs gzhag cing / /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs
<p>30b.6</p>kun gyi/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus rnams su/ /rim bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog /bzhi po legs par gzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag tu/ /rdo rje gom pas song nas ni/ /mi g.yo ba la sogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad gzhag /mi g.yo
<p>30b.7</p>ba yi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje 'dzin sogs mnyam par gzhag /rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par gzhag /tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje spyan sogs rdzogs par bzhag /gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje
<p>31a</p>
<p>31a.1</p>rgya gram la sogs gzhag /'khor lo yi ni grwa rnams su/ /rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang gzhag /dkyil 'khor phyi rol grwa rnams su/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang gzhag /sgo rnams kun gyi nang du ni/ /sgo srung bzhi yang gzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor
<p>31a.2</p>phyi rim phyogs su ni/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag /de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra be gA kra ma hUM/ de la 'di'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni/ /rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung / /phyir byung nang du zhugs kyang rung / dam
<p>31a.3</p>tshig nyams pa de mi 'gyur/ /de la bcom ldan 'das rnam par rdo rje snang mdzad ni/ sku mdog dkar po seng ge'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od mnga' ba/ dar la'i
<p>31a.4</p>stod g.yogs dang / smad g.yogs man bas pa/ rin po che'i cod pan dang / dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa/ zhal bzhi pa zhal dang po shar du gtsigs pa'o/ /de bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs yang de bzhin te/ sku mdog kyang sngon po dang / ser po dang / 
<p>31a.5</p>dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / glang po che la sogs pa'i gdan la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / rdo rje rin po che dang / rdo rje pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje la sogs pa bsnams pa'o/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i cod pan dang / 
<p>31a.6</p>dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig pa rnam par snang mdzad la mngon sum du phyogs pa rnams rang rang gi phyag rgya chen po dang badzra d+hA tu zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i snying po zlos shing bzhugs su gsol la/ bris pa ltar bar snang la mngon du
<p>31a.7</p>bzhugs pa rnams kyang de bzhin du phab ste gcig tu bya'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar/ satwa badzra zhes bya bas rdo rje sems ma sku mdog sngon mo/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po bkod la/ badzra A be sha a zhes bya bas dbab par bya'o/ /
<p>31b</p>
<p>31b.1</p>g.yas su rat+na badzri zhes bya bas rin chen sems ma sku mdog ser mo/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rtse mo rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'o/ /rgyab tu d+harma badzri zhes bya bas rdo rje chos ma sku mdog dmar mo/ pad+ma dkar dmar 'dab ma bcu drug pa la 'dab ma brgyad thur du gyes pa/ 
<p>31b.2</p>'dab ma brgyad gyen du bltas pa/ kha ma bye ba'i nang na rdo rje rtse lnga pa chud pa'o/ /g.yon du karma badzri zhes bya bas/ rdo rje las ma sku mdog ljang gu/ /sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa/ kha dog lnga pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs nas bskal pa bzang po'i
<p>31b.3</p>mthar thug pa'i bar ni/ phyag rgya chen pos rang rang gi mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs pa bsnams pa/ rab tu dgyes pas spyan gdangs pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa yin no/ /rnam par snang mdzad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin la/ 'di dag thams cad
<p>31b.4</p>kyang chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir/ rnam par snang mdzad la mngon par phyogs par bya'o/ /mi bskyod pa'i mdun du ni rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /g.yas su ni rdo rje rgyal po'o/ /g.yon du ni rdo rje chags pa'o/ /rgyab tu ni rdo rje
<p>31b.5</p>legs pa'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gyi mdun du ni rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /lhag ma ni shes pa kho nar zad do/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams la byams pa la sogs pa/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhis
<p>31b.6</p>stong du ma tshang ba/ shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs su cha mnyam po go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /de la shar phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o/ /lho phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje rin po che bsnams pa'o/ /nub phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje pad+ma bsnams
<p>31b.7</p>pa'o/ /byang phyogs pa rnams ni sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /de nas 'di rnams kyi dgod pa'i rim pa dang / mtshan ni 'di dag yin te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga gnas mud+ga te ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ zhes bya ba 'di ni rig pa'o/ /de la de rnams kyi
<p>32a</p>
<p>32a.1</p>mtshan ni/ byams pa/ seng ge / rab gsal/ thub pa/ me tog /me tog gnyis pa/ spyan legs/ ded dpon/ lag chen/ stobs chen/ rgyu kar rgyal po/ rtsi sman/ snyan pa/ tog /'od chen po/ grol ba'i phung po/ rnam par snang mdzad/ 
<p>32a.2</p>nyi ma'i snying po/ zla 'od 'phro/ 'od bzang / mya ngan med/ skar rgyal/ rab gsal/ phreng thogs/ yon tan 'od/ don gzigs/ mar me/ mthu ldan/ sman pa/ des pa/ mdzod spu/ bstan ldan/ lha'i dpal/ gdul dka'/ yon tan rgyal mtshan/ sgra gcan/ tshogs
<p>32a.3</p>can/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ tshig brtan/ mi 'gying pa/ 'od mdzad/ lhun chen/ rdo rje sdom pa can/ mi bsnyengs pa/ rin chen/ pad+ma'i spyan/ stobs sde/ me tog 'od zer/ ye shes dgyes/ gzi chen/ tshangs pa/ 'od dpag med/ klu sbyin/ brtan par gshegs/ 
<p>32a.4</p>don yod mthong / brtson 'grus sbyin/ bzang skyong / dga' bo/ 'chi med/ seng ge'i rgyal mtshan/ rgyal ba/ chos/ mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po/ kha lo sgyur/ dgyes par gshegs/ chu lha/ yon tan lag /spos kyi glang po/ rnam par gzigs/ 'brug sgra/ 
<p>32a.5</p>legs sems/ yid bzangs/ dri med/ zla ba grags chen/ gtsug na nor bu/ drag shul can/ seng ge stabs/ ljon pa/ rnam par rgyal ba can/ shes rab brtsegs/ legs gnas/ blo gros/ yan lag skyes/ blo mtha' yas/ gzugs bzang / mkhyen ldan/ 'od
<p>32a.6</p>zer/ brtul zhugs brtan/ bkra shis/ bden pa'i tog /pad+ma/ sred med kyi bu/ lag bzangs/ ye shes 'byung gnas/ yon tan 'od 'phro/ tshangs pas byin/ rin chen 'byung gnas/ lha'i me tog /don legs sems dpa'/ chos kyi dbang phyug /blo gros grags pa/ spobs
<p>32a.7</p>pa brtsegs pa/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan/ phan par bzhed pa/ rnam par rol ldan/ mun pa dang bral ba/ sgra gcan lha/ ri bo'i rgyal mtshan/ tshogs can 'od/ rin chen snying po/ /shin tu mthor gshegs/ skar rgyal/ ru rings/ yon tan grags/ nyi zla/ nyi ma'i 'od/ skar mkhan/ seng
<p>32b</p>
<p>32b.1</p>ge'i tog /dus mkhyen rgyal po/ dpal gyi snying po/ srid mtha' gzigs pa/ glog gi 'od/ gser gyi 'od/ seng ges byin pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan/ mchog dga' grags pa/ brtson 'grus brtan pa/ grags pa rdzogs pa/ bsnyengs pa dang bral ba/ mchod 'os lha/ 
<p>32b.2</p>sgron ma chen po/ 'jig rten 'od/ spos dri zhim pa/ yon tan mchog 'dzin/ mun pa dang rnam par bral ba/ seng ge'i 'gram pa/ rin chen grags pa/ skyon rab zhi ba/ bdud rtsi 'chang ba/ /mi'i zla ba/ shin tu gzigs pa/ rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu'i 'od/ ri bo brtsegs pa'i tog /
<p>32b.3</p>chos kyi 'byung gnas/ tshe sbyin/ rin chen 'byung gnas/ skye dbang mtshungs pa/ stobs kyis gshegs pa/ blo gnas/ gdugs mdzes pa/ gtso bo shin tu 'phags dpal/ seng ge'i sgra/ rnam rol ldan pa/ klu'i 'od/ me tog ri bo/ klu dga'/ spos kyi
<p>32b.4</p>dbang phyug /shin tu grags pa/ stobs kyi lha/ yon tan phreng ldan/ klu'i lag pa/ mig brgyan pa/ legs par sbyang ba'i blo/ zil gnon ye shes/ mtha' yas pa'i spyan/ bden bar gsung / nyi ma'i 'od/ nges pa'i blo/ mtha' yas gzugs/ rnam par
<p>32b.5</p>snang mdzad/ rin chen tog /the tshom rnam par spangs pa/ 'jig rten 'das pa/ don yod/ rnam par gnon pa/ rtog par mdzad pa/ me tog rgyal mtshan/ ri dbang rgyal po/ gzi brjid chen po/ don mdzad gzigs pa/ grags pa mtha' yas/ rin chen lha/ don
<p>32b.6</p>gnas mkhyen pa/ blo rdzogs pa/ mya ngan med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba/ tshangs lha/ sa'i dbang phyug /me tog spyan/ rnam par 'byes pa'i sku/ chos kyi 'od/ kun gzigs/ yon tan/ 'od gsal/ zla ba'i zhal/ rin chen 'od/ rin chen tog /grags pa'i bla ma/ 'od
<p>32b.7</p>byed/ /gzi brjid dpag med/ dus mkhyen/ seng ge'i sku/ mkhas blo/ /rgyal bar dka'/ yon tan phung po/ zla ba'i tog /mthu thob/ mthu stsal mtha' yas/ zla ba/ dri med/ don thams cad gzigs pa/ dpa' bo/ 'byor ldan/ bsod nams/ sgron ma/ yon tan
<p>33a</p>
<p>33a.1</p>'od 'phro/ blo yangs/ legs skyes/ nor lha/ yid gnyis spong / 'dzin pa dpag med/ mchog sred/ chom med/ mi gnas pa/ der gnas/ tshogs can gtso bo/ 'gro ba'i 'od zer/ phal chen rgyal ba/ gzi brjid mtha' yas/ don gyi blo
<p>33a.2</p>gros/ sman pa'i rgyal po/ tha ba spangs pa/ rims nad med pa/ legs sbyin/ grags sbyin/ me tog byin/ skyes bus byin/ rdo rje sde/ phal chen sbyin/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ spos kyi glang po/ sred med kyi bu/ des pa/ mi tshugs pa/ nyi zla/ glog gi tog /mchod pa
<p>33a.3</p>zhes bya ba ste/ nyis brgya lnga bcur gcig gis ma tshang ba ni shar phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bri bar bya'o/ /dpal sbas/ ye shes nyi ma/ don grub/ lhun po brtsegs/ dgra 'dul/ pad+ma/ dgra bcom grags pa/ ye shes 'gros/ nyon mongs bral/ 'dam bu/ 
<p>33a.4</p>spos bzangs/ yul 'khor rangs/ lha grags/ srid mtha' gzigs/ zla ba/ sgra gcan/ rin chen zla ba/ seng ge'i rgyal mtshan/ bsam gtan dgyes/ rdzogs ldan/ rnam par rol pa/ yon tan rin chen/ dgra bcom grags pa/ pad+ma'i ngos/ mdzod spu ldan/ 
<p>33a.5</p>spobs pa grags/ rdo rje nor bu/ tshe dpag med/ nor bu bkod/ dbang chen/ yon tan 'byung gnas/ lhun po grags/ 'od zer bcu pa/ ma smad pa/ glang po'i 'gros/ yid 'thad/ rin chen zla ba/ zhi ba/ rab gsal rgyal po/ kha lo sgyur/ dga' ba'i dbang
<p>33a.6</p>phyug /gtsug na rin po che/ bsnyengs bral/ rin chen snying po/ zla zhal/ dri ma med par grags pa/ zhi ba'i gzi brjid/ dga' ba'i tog /sgra gcan lha/ na tshod bzang po/ lha dga'/ rin chen phung po/ mdzes par gshegs/ seng ge'i phyogs pa/ shin tu
<p>33a.7</p>mthor gshegs/ skye ba'i dbang po/ blo gros bzang po/ 'jig rten 'od/ rin chen gzi brjid/ skal ldan/ shing rta/ kun du rgyal ba/ dga' ba bkod pa/ stegs mdzad pa/ spos kyi glang po/ blo gros 'od 'phro/ ri bo'i rgyal mtshan/ rin chen spos bzangs/ 
<p>33b</p>
<p>33b.1</p>chos brtan/ gzi brjid drag shul can/ chos kyi nor bu/ bzang pos byin pa/ bde gshegs zla ba/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ seng ge'i zla ba/ /tshungs pa med pa'i dpal/ legs par skyes pa/ thub pa med pa'i tshogs/ grags pa'i bshes gnyen/ bden pa/ dka'
<p>33b.2</p>thub chen po/ lhun po'i 'od zer/ yon tan brtsegs pa/ mchod pa grags pa/ chos grags/ sbyin pa'i 'od/ glog 'byin/ bden par gsung ba/ 'tsho byed/ na tshod bzang po/ legs pa'i tshogs can/ rnam par nges pa'i blo gros/ srid mtha' nor bu'i spos/ 
<p>33b.3</p>rgyal bas dgyes pa/ seng ge'i 'od zer/ rnam par snang mdzad/ grags pa mchog /thugs rab tu gzhungs pa/ nor bu'i zla ba/ drag shul 'od zer/ brtul zhugs thub med/ 'gro bas mchod pa/ nor bu'i tshogs/ 'jig rten bla ma/ glang chen seng ge / zla ba/ rin chen
<p>33b.4</p>'od zer/ sgra gcan sped pa/ yon tan rgya mtsho/ 'od zer ldan pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i stobs/ 'jig rten bzang po/ mya ngan med pa/ shugs bcu pa/ stobs la dgyes pa/ mthu dpal/ mthu thob pa/ mthu chen po/ yon tan snying po/ bden par spyod pa/ dge mchog
<p>33b.5</p>rgyal po/ skar rgyal/ 'od zer chen po/ glog gi 'od/ yon tan rgya chen rin po che/ dpal 'od/ bdud 'dul bar mdzad pa/ go cha bgos pa/ seng ge'i phyag /me tog bzang po/ rin chen mthon po/ rgya mtsho/ sa 'dzin/ don gyi blo mnga' ba/ yon tan bsags pa/ yon tan
<p>33b.6</p>tshogs/ rin chen me/ 'jig rten 'das pa/ 'jig rten zla ba/ dbyangs snyan pa/ tshangs pa'i tog /tshogs can gtso bo/ seng ge'i stabs/ drag shul gyis byin pa/ chos kyi dbang phyug /gzi brjid 'od/ 'od zer chen po/ rin chen snying po/ rin chen grags pa/ tshogs
<p>33b.7</p>can gsal ba/ grags pa mtha' yas/ 'od zer don yod/ lha'i drang srong / skye ba'i dbang po/ dge 'dun brtan/ phyogs bzangs/ tog /yul 'khor me tog /chos kyi blo gros/ rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs pa/ legs bsam grags pa/ snang ldan/ lha tshogs/ 
<p>34a</p>
<p>34a.1</p>yon tan srung / don gyi blo gros/ bsnyengs med/ grogs brtan/ 'od gnas/ mtshungs med/ nor bu'i zhabs/ thar pa'i gzi brjid/ ngos bzangs/ blo bzangs/ kun du gzi brjid/ ye shes mchog /tshangs par gnas/ bden pa gsung ba/ blo
<p>34a.2</p>bzangs/ stobs byin/ seng ge stabs/ me tog /ye shes 'byung gnas/ me tog byin/ yon tan snying po/ rin chen grags pa/ grags pa rmad du byung ba/ mi mtshungs pa/ bsnyengs med/ nyi ma'i 'od/ tshangs par gshegs pa/ lha'i mthu rtsal/ ye shes dgyes/ lha
<p>34a.3</p>bden/ nor bu'i snying po/ ye shes dpal/ bcings med/ brtul zhugs brtan/ lha'i gzi brjid/ tshangs pa thub/ dal gyis bzhud/ brtul zhugs/ dka' thub/ 'od zer phung po/ gzi brjid chen po/ tsam pa ka /dga' mdzad/ tshogs can bzang po/ dbang
<p>34a.4</p>po'i rgyal mtshan/ dgyes pa chen po/ /sna ma'i me tog 'od/ tshogs can 'od/ bskrun par mdzad/ mdangs 'gro/ don legs nges/ khyu mchog /lag bzangs/ 'od zer chen po/ bsam pas byin/ bsod nams 'od/ rin chen dbyangs/ rdo rje'i sde/ 'byor ldan/ 
<p>34a.5</p>seng ge'i stobs/ dri ma med pa'i spyan/ 'od srungs/ blo gsal/ ye shes blo gros/ gzi brjid drag shul can/ 'od zer chen po/ nyi ma'i 'od/ dri ma med pa'i 'od/ gzi brjid rnam par 'byes pa/ khengs med/ sbrang rtsi'i zhal/ zla 'od glog sbyin/ rab tu zhi bar
<p>34a.6</p>gshegs/ mi 'khrugs pa/ dgra bcom grags pa/ chos kyi yon tan/ zhing bzang po/ bkod pa'i rgyal po/ mngon par 'phags pa/ sbyin sreg 'od 'phro/ pad+ma'i dpal/ rin po che'i bkod pa/ shin tu bzang po/ rin po che'i mchog /thugs shin tu gzhungs pa/ 
<p>34a.7</p>'od dpag med/ rgya mtshos byin/ tshangs pa'i tog /zla ba'i gdugs/ 'od 'phro ba/ dri med rgyal po/ 'di rnams ni lho phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bri bar bya'o/ /ye shes grags pa/ kun las rgyal ba/ yon tan 'od/ sgra rnam par grags pa/ zla ba rgyas pa/ 
<p>34b</p>
<p>34b.1</p>pad+ma'i 'od zer/ brtul zhugs bzang po/ sgron ma rgyal po/ glog gi tog /'od zer rgyal po/ skar mkhan/ grags pa rdzogs ldan/ pad+ma'i snying po/ rgyal spyan mdzes/ rnyog pa med pa'i don/ drag shul sde/ bsod nams gzi brjid/ mthu rtsal can/ thogs med blo/ 
<p>34b.2</p>sgra gcan lha/ ye shes phung po/ kha lo sgyur ba/ skye dbang mtshungs pa/ me tog tog /sgra gcan 'dzin/ rtsi sman chen po/ /rgyu skar rgyal po/ /sman pa'i rgyal po/ /bsod nams glang po/ gcod par mdzad pa/ rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po/ nyi ma'i 'od zer/ chos kyi mdzod/ 
<p>34b.3</p>blo gros bzang po/ /yon tan dbang mtshungs/ rdo rje'i sde/ shes rab brtsegs/ legs par gnas/ blo sbyangs/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ yon tan mchog /'brug sgra dbyangs/ mngon par shes pa'i tog /tog gi 'od/ mi 'dren dge ba/ tshangs pa/ skyes mchog spyan sdug /
<p>34b.4</p>klus byin/ bden pa'i tog /brgyan pa/ zhum pa med dbyangs/ rin chen 'od/ dbyangs byin/ seng ge 'od zer sna tshogs/ ye shes dpa' bo/ /pad+ma'i phung po/ me tog rgyas pa/ mthu rtsal stabs/ bsod nams phung po/ gzugs mchog /skar mkhan/ 
<p>34b.5</p>zla ba'i sgron ma/ gzi brjid phung po/ byang chub rgyal po/ mi zad pa/ mngon par rtogs pa'i spyan/ yan lag brgyad pa/ yul 'khor shes rab/ mchog /gzi brjid tshim mdzad/ shes rab byin/ 'jam dbyangs/ chags pa med mdzad/ gtso bos byin/ gtso bo/ ye
<p>34b.6</p>shes mthu tsal/ 'od 'phro can/ dbang po/ shugs 'chang / skar rgyal/ 'od bzang po/ grags pas byin pa/ gzugs bzang po/ /rgyal po/ don grub pa/ seng ge'i sde/ nor lha'i bu/ grags pa/ rgyal ba/ brgya byin snying po/ bsod nams 'od zer/ 'od zer
<p>34b.7</p>bzang po/ smrang 'don/ sgron ma'i rgyal po/ ye shes brtsegs/ lha mchog /sa'i bdag po/ rnam par grol ba brnyes pa/ gtsug gi gser/ sgra gcan bzang po/ thub dka'/ thub gsal/ zla ba'i 'od zer/ gser gyi 'od/ legs byin/ lha'i yon tan
<p>35a</p>
<p>35a.1</p>dbang po/ chos kyi gdugs/ bsod nams lags/ chags pa med pa/ ye shes gya nom/ blo gros zhib mo/ gzi byin thams cad pa/ rtsi sman rnam par grol ba'i tog /'od kyi mdzod/ ye shes rgyal po/ 'jigs mdzad/ chu bo'i spong ba/

<p>35a.3</p>pa bzang po/ mi 'khrugs pa'i mdog /gzi brjid rgyal po/ rtog mdzad spyan legs/ don la gnas pa'i blo mnga' ba/ snang ba'i 'od zer/ spos kyi gzi brjid/ kun du dga' bar mdzad pa/ don yod par gshegs pa/ khro ba bcom pa/ gzugs mchog /
<p>35a.4</p>legs gshegs/ rab tu sbyin par grags pa/ 'od bzangs/ lha'i nyi ma/ shes rab byin/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i bdag nyid/ gzi mdangs/ rgyal rigs/ skal ldan shing rta/ gser mchog /rnam par grol ba'i gtsug /chos ldan/ spos gnas/ dregs pa
<p>35a.5</p>spangs/ ye shes kyi mdzod/ tshangs par gshegs/ tsan dan mya ngan med pa/ seng ge'i 'od zer/ yul 'khor tog /pad+ma'i snying po/ gzi brjid mtha' yas/ lha'i 'od zer/ shes rab me tog /mkhas pa/ ye shes 'byor ldan/ tshangs pa dbyig /phyag na rin chen
<p>35a.6</p>dbang ldan rdzogs par gsung ba/ mchog gsung / mchod 'os/ skar rgyal nyi ma/ 'dam las rgal ba/ ye shes brnyes/ grub pa/ rma bya/ mchod sbyin/ phan par bzhed pa/ ye shes ldan pa/ grags pa 'od zer gyi dra ba/ rnam par bcom pa/ bai DUr+ya'i snying po/ me tog lha'i
<p>35a.7</p>rgyal po/ /zla ba dran pa'i 'od/ dge ba'i 'od/ /yon tan mchog ma/ kun 'od rin po che'i dpal/ skyes bu zla ba/ sgra gcan/ bdud rtsi'i 'od/ 'jig rten mchog /skar ma'i 'od/ zhi ba'i stabs/ ye shes rgya mtsho/ ri'i dbang po/ rab tu zhi ba/ yon
<p>35b</p>

<p>35b.2</p>lags khyad 'phags/ mchog tu mdzes par gshegs pa/ zhi ba'i don// skyon med blo/ dbyangs dge ba/ pad+ma'i mdzod/ 'od zer bzang po/ spobs pa'i mdog /stegs bzang po/ tshogs kyi dbang po/ bsnyengs pa dang bral ba/ ye shes bzhed pa/ spobs pa'i
<p>35b.3</p>spyan/ blo'i mchog /zla ba/ rin chen zla 'od/ bsnyengs pa med pa/ gzi brjid chen po/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ dbyangs bzang po/ shes rab chen po'i stegs/ blo gros zla med/ rdo rje mkhregs pa/ byang chub blo gros/ ljon shing dbang po/ gdangs snyan pa/ bsod nams stobs/ 
<p>35b.4</p>mthu'i dpal/ 'phags pa dgyes pa/ mthu stobs/ skar ma la dgyes pa/ sprin gyi rnga sgra/ 'di rnams ni nub phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bri bar bya'o/ /spyan sdug pa'i zhal/ ye shes bzang ldan/ 'byor par ldan pa/ yon tan phung po/ gsal ba/ 
<p>35b.5</p>chos kyi rgyal mtshan/ ye shes nga ro/ /nam mkha'/ mchod sbyin nga ro/ /shes rab rnam dgod nga ro/ /yon tan 'od zer gzi brjid/ drang srong dbang po/ /blo dang ldan pa/ spobs pa'i tshogs/ mchod sbyin/ bzang po/ zla ba'i zhal/ shin tu gzigs pa/ rdul
<p>35b.6</p>dang bral ba/ yon tan tshogs/ tog dang ldan pa/ bsod nams rgyal mtshan/ yul 'khor spobs pa/ rin chen rab sbyin/ zla ba dgyes pa/ seng ge'i stobs/ dbang sgyur rgyal po/ bdud rtsi gsal ba/ bsam gtan snyoms pa/ 'khrugs pa med pa/ dri ma
<p>35b.7</p>rab zhi/ phyogs ma bslad pa/ mdzes pa zhal bzangs/ shugs gnas/ ye shes ldan pa/ gsungs pa'i dbang po/ gzi brjid chen po/ blo gros zab mo/ bdud rtsi/ chos kyi stobs/ mchod par ldan/ me tog 'od/ khams gsum mchod gnas/ sgra gcan nyi ma'i
<p>36a</p>
<p>36a.1</p>snying po/ lha'i mchod pa/ thar pa'i rgyal mtshan/ dge ba'i gtsug /bdud rtsi 'od/ rdo rje brtan pa/ rin chen phung po/ mdzes par gshegs pa/ nyi ma ltar gshegs pa/ dga' ba'i 'od/ yon tan gtsug /dpal rdzogs/ seng ge'i stabs/ gyen

<p>36a.3</p>dga' bar mdzad pa/ rma bya'i nga ro/ ma zhum pa/ srid pa'i sred pa/ dri ma spangs pa/ spyod pa'i stegs/ lha mang pos snyan par grags pa/ rin po che'i stabs/ phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/ dpal/ dgra las rgyal ba/ 'byor ldan grags pa/ yul 'khor bzang po/ me tog 'od/ 
<p>36a.4</p>seng ge'i nga ro/ zla ba ltar shar ba/ 'joms pa'i mchog /mi g.yo ba/ phan pa dang ldan par gshegs pa/ bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal po/ dbyangs kyis bskul ba/ gau ta ma/ mdangs stobs/ blo gnas pa'i rang bzhin/ zla ba bzang po/ byang chub yan lag me
<p>36a.5</p>tog /bkra shis legs don/ ye shes gzi brjid/ stobs/ dge ba'i sgrol ma/ mthu stsal brtan po/ lha sgra/ rab tu zhi ba/ nyi ma'i zhal/ thar pa'i brtul zhugs/ tshul khrims 'od/ brtul zhugs gnas/ rdul med snying po 'phags/ mig sman/ 'phel bar mdzad
<p>36a.6</p>pa/ spos kyi 'od/ dus mkhyen 'od/ dran pa'i dbang po/ /thogs pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan/ byang chub mchog bgrod/ spyod pa gsal/ rin chen dgyes/ chos kyi dbang phyug /lha thams cad pa/ bshes gnyen chen po/ bshes gnyen bzang po/ /rab tu zhi ba'i stabs/ 
<p>36a.7</p>bdud rtsi'i bdag po/ /lhun po'i 'od/ 'phags pas bstod pa/ snang ldan/ gzi brjid 'bar ba/ snang ba gzigs/ legs spyad rnam par smin/ legs dgyes/ mya ngan bral/ rin chen 'od/ spyod pa dang ldan pa/ bsod nams stobs/ yon tan rgya mtsho/ rmad du byung
<p>36b</p>
<p>36b.1</p>ba/ nga rgyal spong / bdud brlab par mdzad pa/ bag chags las rgal ba'i stobs/ mi phyed pa'i blo mnga' ba/ rgya mtsho/ dag par mdzad pa/ tshogs can grol ba'i rgyal po/ dga' ba'i 'od/ byang chub rgyal mtshan/ ye shes rin chen/ shin tu bsil ba/ 
<p>36b.2</p>tshangs pa rgyal ba/ ye shes dgyes/ rdzu 'phrul tog /skye dbang mtshungs pa/ sa'i dbang phyug /nyi ma dgyes/ sgra gcan zla ba/ me tog 'od/ sman pa'i bdag po/ mdangs mnga'/ bsod nams dgyes/ dga' ba'i stobs/ dbyangs snyan pa/ chos kyi
<p>36b.3</p>dbang phyug /tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ spyod pa bzang po/ /'khrul pa med pa'i blo/ dbyangs chen po/ snyan par grags pa/ tog ldan/ gzi brjid/ rnam par grags pa/ 'gro ba'i dbang phyug /ljon pa/ gti mug rab zad/ dpag tu med pa/ zla ba bzang po/ spobs
<p>36b.4</p>pa mtha' yas tog /brtul zhugs bstar ba/ mchod pa'i gnas/ mya ngan rgal/ dge ba dgyes pa/ 'gro ba'i blo gros/ dgyes par gshegs pa/ zhabs mdzes/ ut+pal/ dul gnas me tog /spobs pa mtha' yas/ 'od zer/ drang srong gsal ba/ yon
<p>36b.5</p>tan brtson 'grus/ snying po/ lha'i bdag po/ rin chen mthon po/ gsal ba/ skal ldan shing rta can/ bsod nams blo gros/ sbyin sreg 'od 'phro/ yon tan mtha' yas/ gzi brjid phung po/ seng ge'i stabs/ mi g.yo ba/ rab gsal/ 'od spyod pa/ 
<p>36b.6</p>glu dbyangs/ 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ dbyig gi mchog /'jig rten dga' ba/ dga' ba mtha' yas grags pa/ sprin gyi tog /shes rab 'gros/ spos bzangs/ nam mkha'i dbyings/ lha'i rgyal po/ nor bu gsal ba/ nor bzangs/ sgron ma/ rin
<p>36b.7</p>chen nga ro dbyangs/ skye dbang rgyal po/ sgra gcan sped pa/ dge ba mdzad/ seng ge'i blo gros/ rin chen grags pa/ don mdzad pa/ mdzad mtha' gzigs pa/ srid pa'i me tog /mdzod spu ldan pa/ spobs pa mtshungs med/ rgyal po/ ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro/ 
<p>37a</p>
<p>37a.1</p>seng ge'i mche ba/ mdzes par gshegs pa/ bsod nams sgron ma/ bkra shis ldan pa/ yul 'khor mya ngan med pa/ blo gros sems dpa'/ blo dang ldan pa/ chos kyi sgron ma/ spyan/ shin tu gzigs pa/ shugs kyis 'dor ba/ stobs chen/ 
<p>37a.2</p>shes rab me tog /brtan pa'i dbyangs/ bde dang ldan pa/ don gsung ba/ dgyes pa gsal ba/ seng ge'i zhal/ gtsug phud snang bar mdzad pa/ 'di rnams ni byang phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bri bar bya'o/ /yang na byams pa dang / mthong ba don yod dar/ 
<p>37a.3</p>ngan song kun 'dren dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros/ spos kyi glang po/ dpa' bar 'gro ba/ nam mkha'i mdzod/ ye shes tog /'od dpag tu med pa/ zla ba'i 'od/ bzang spyod/ dra pa can gyi 'od/ rdo rje snying po/ blo gros mi zad pa/ spobs
<p>37a.4</p>pa brtsegs pa/ kun du bzang po zhes bya ba/ bcu drug po ji ltar mngon par dga' ba'i sku mdog dang / rgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan dang / dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o/ /phyogs bzhir yang rta babs bzhi dang ka ba brgyad/ khru drug gam bdun
<p>37a.5</p>gyi tshad tsam rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyu las byas pa/ me tog gi phreng ba dang / dril bu dang dar la sogs pas brgyan pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par bzlas par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi char/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
<p>37a.6</p>sdong pos brgyan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gser 'od dam pa klog tu gzhug go/ /chos smra ba de dag kyang sangs rgyas ltar ci nus pas mchod par bya'o/ /de lta bus ni bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang / dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs
<p>37a.7</p>mtshams brgyad du spos snod brgyad las ga pur dang / a ga ru dang / tu ru ska dang tsan+dan la sogs pa rgyun mi 'chad par gtul bar bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor legs par bkod nas/ phyi rol nye 'khor kun du dris nye bar byugs la/ me tog gi sil ma bkram nas/ dgongs ka'i dus su/ 
<p>37b</p>
<p>37b.1</p>rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la/ rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya zhing / oM badzra satwa hUM/ zhes kyang brjod par bya'o/ /yang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lhag pa dang / ma tshang ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bltas la/ 
<p>37b.2</p>rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing dkyil 'khor lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la/ phreng ba phul te/ rdo rje gar byas nas blangs la rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o/ /oM badzra satwa hUM zhes kyang rgyun mi 'chad pa kho nar bzla bar bya'o/ /de yang / rdo rje
<p>37b.3</p>dril bu rab bskul bas/ /sangs rgyas ma tshang yongs su bskor/ /lhag pa gang yin 'dor mdzad pas/ /'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de'i rjes la yi ge hUM las bdag nyid rdo rje hUM mdzad du bsam par bya'o/ /de nas dbus su 'dug nas
<p>37b.4</p>ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas/ /rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi'o/ /yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya/ /oM badzro g+ha TA sa ma ya/ prA be sha hUM/ rdo rje mdzub mo yang dag sbyar/ /sbyar ba bkan te bsdams nas su/ /rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni/ /sgo dbye ba yi mchog yin no/ /de nas rin
<p>37b.5</p>po che'am/ sa las byas pa'i bum pa/ rtsa ba mi gnag pa gsus pa che ba mgrin pa ring ba/ mchu 'phyang ba/ byi ru dang / gser dang / dung dang / mu tig dang / pad+ma rA ga ste rin po che thams cad dang / br-i ha ti dang / kaN+Da ka ri dang / ha sa dang / daN+Do ta pa la dang / shwe ta a pa
<p>37b.6</p>ra dzi ta ste sman thams cad dang / 'bras dang / nas dang / gro dang / til dang / ma sha ste/ 'bru thams cad dang / spos chu dri zhim pa dang / me tog dkar po dri zhim pas yongs su bkang la/ dris kun du byugs pa'i me tog gi phreng ba btags la/ mgul pa ras dkar po
<p>37b.7</p>bzang pos bcings pa/ 'dab ma dang 'bras bu dri zhim pas kha brgyan pa/ sngar bsnyen pa byas pas mchod yon phul la/ rdo rje bsdams pa la sems ma rdo rje mas yongs su gzung ba'i rdo rje me tog gi lcug ma las/ oM badzra satwa hUM/ zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ 
<p>38a</p>
<p>38a.1</p>badzrod ka hUM zhes bya ba yang bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan sngar gzhag go/ /gnyis pa la yang rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ 'jug pa'i sgor mngon par phyogs par bya zhing / chu des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar
<p>38a.2</p>bya'o/ /'jug pa'i dus su slob ma byang chub sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings pa'am/ 'ching du gzhug go/ /dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bum pa la yang / so so rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan la/ de rnams kyi rang rang gi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi
<p>38a.3</p>mtshams su gzhag par bya'o/ /de rnams kyi yang phyi rol du ni bum pa gang ba'o/ /ma rnyed par gyur na bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pas/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bum pa dang / bum pa gang ba yang dbul bar bya ste/ rdo rje sems
<p>38a.4</p>dpa' dang / rin po che dang / chos dang / las kyi rdo rjes mtshan la/ rang gi rigs kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas pa'i bum pa bzhi dang / bum pa gang ba bzhi dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mngon sum lta bur bsams la/ me tog
<p>38a.5</p>la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas/ sdom pa gzung la/ rdo rje sems ma ji lta ba bzhin du bcings la 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i chu ji lta bar 'thungs la/ bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste/ g.yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur
<p>38a.6</p>gyis lag pa g.yas pa'i sems ma rdo rje ma'i gung mo yang dang yang du dral zhing / a zhes bya bas ji lta ba bzhin du brtan par byas la/ dbab pa nas/ de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung / /chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher/ /byin gyis brlabs
<p>38a.7</p>nas snying po bzla/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyi cho ga sngar bshad pa rnams byas la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba dang / gzengs bstod pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags kyang blang bar bya'o/ /de nas
<p>38b</p>
<p>38b.1</p>bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas/ bdag rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ming gang yang rung ba brjod la/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te/ de'i gnas su badzra d+hA tu a zhes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid du phab la/ badzra
<p>38b.2</p>haM zhes brjod do/ /de nas badzra d+hA tu ra haM byas pas rdo rje dbyings su bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyis phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ de'i gnas su badzra A be sha aHzhes bya bas/ rdo rje dril bu bdag nyid la phab ste/ badzra g+haN+Do\u0f85haM/ de nas badzra A be+e shA haM zhes bya bas dril bu
<p>38b.3</p>der bsgom par bya ste/ de ltar na rdo rjes bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni/ /se gol mang po brdabs bgyis la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi/ /oM badzra sa ma ya dza dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa'
<p>38b.4</p>yi/ /phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing / /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi/ /de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/ dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs thams cad bskrad pa dang / ra ba dang dra
<p>38b.5</p>ba byas te/ dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcad la/ yi ge gnyis kyis go cha'i srung bas thams cad yang dag par bsrungs nas/ mchod yon phul la sngon du 'gro ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis blta ba byas la/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a haM zhes brjod
<p>38b.6</p>par bya zhing / rang rang gi snying po dang / sngags kyis kyang mthar yang dag par bskul la/ chos dang las kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis kyang phyag rgyas btab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa nas/ bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya
<p>38b.7</p>rnams kyis kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de la rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i rang gi snying po nyid chos kyi phyag rgya yin no/ /rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / chos dang las ma rnams kyi phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje la sogs pa'i nang du tshud pa'i bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin
<p>39a</p>
<p>39a.1</p>pa dang / yang na de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs can no/ /g.yon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bkan la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mo gnyis kyi mthe'u chung nas brtsams nas phye la/ thal mo khong stong du byas pa
<p>39a.2</p>'di ni/ byams pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste/ 'di rnams kyi rig pa ni sngar bshad pa yin no/ /rig pa de dag nyid de rnams kyi ljags la bkod pa 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /yi ge a las rang gi thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la/ bris pa dang de'i rjes
<p>39a.3</p>su mthun par/ de rnams phyag rgya chen por bcing ba ni/ de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga par bsams la/ bris pa dang rjes su mthun pa kho nar de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o/ /rig pa de nyid kyang spyi'i yin nom/ /de nas mchod yon phul nas mchod par bya ste/ 
<p>39a.4</p>ras zung 'bum mam/ zung khri'am/ zung stong ngam/ zung brgya'am/ zung re re'am/ thams cad la spyir zung gcig dbul ba'am/ bla re rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / grwa bzhir ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs gdags pa dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams
<p>39a.5</p>kyang yi ge oM dang rdo rje sems dpa' lan bdun bzlas la dbul bar bya'o/ /me tog gi shing brgya'am/ bzhi'am me tog thams cad kyang snga ma bzhin du mngon par bzlas la/ oM badzra s+pha ra Na khaM zhes bya bas dbul bar bya'o/ /dril rig pa bzlas pa'i dris byugs
<p>39a.6</p>la/ dri zhim pa'i dri bzang po thams cad dang / bdug spos kyi rig pa bzlas pa'i/ ga pur a ka ru dang tu ru ska dang / tsan+dan la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba'i bdug pa gtul ba'i spos snod 'bum mam/ khri'am/ stong ngam/ brgya dbul bar bya ste/ bcu las
<p>39a.7</p>nyung ba ni mi bya'o/ /mar me'i snod 'bum mam/ khri'am stong ngam brgya'am bcu'am bzhi la snga ma bzhin du mar me'i sngags bzlas pa dang / swa sti ka la sogs pa'i lha bshos kyi kha zas bza' ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas gang ba'i snod 'bum mam/ 
<p>39b</p>
<p>39b.1</p>khri'am/ stong ngam/ brgya'am/ bcu la a kA ro mu khaM zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du bzlas te/ lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/ /rol mo'i cha byad stong phrag bcu snying la yi ge hUM dang rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyis rol mo brdungs pa lta bu'i
<p>39b.2</p>phyag rgya rnams kyis/ rol mo bcu po 'di lta ste/ pi waM dang / gling bu dang / rnga dang / cang te'u dang / cha lang dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga rings dang / guny+dza dang / ti mi li dang / brdung ba'i tshul du byed pas dbul bar bya'o/ /phyi rol du gar mkhan dang / rol mo
<p>39b.3</p>dang / cod pan dang / gdu bu dang / rna rgyan la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang / oM dang hUM mngon par bzlas la dbul bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du dar dpyangs dpyang bar bya ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga yab kyis brgyan cing / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas spras pa/ 
<p>39b.4</p>zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ rta dang glang po che dang / ba lang gi khyu shin tu btags pa rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o/ /rta babs yid du 'ong ba'i dril bu la sogs pa dang bcas pa yang dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang yang dag par mchod la/ 
<p>39b.5</p>dngos grub thams cad grub pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzod cig ces de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la/ phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/ 'bras yos bcas
<p>39b.6</p>shing til dang bcas/ /'bras chan me tog chu dang bcas/ /sran chen bcas shing mang du bya/ /snum khur la sogs bza' ba rnams/ /zhes bya ba'i gtor ma la/ a kA ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzlas nas/ shar phyogs nas brtsams nas/ gtor ma gsum gsum gtor
<p>39b.7</p>bar bya zhing / dri dang spos dang / me tog dang / mchod yon rnams kyang thog ma dang mtha' mar dbul bar bya'o/ /de la dang por re zhig maN+Dal rnams byed du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas spyan drang ngo / /de nas dam tshig bstan la/ mchod yon yang phul te/ dri la sogs
<p>40a</p>
<p>40a.1</p>pas legs par mchod la gtor ma phul te/ de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de la sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin te/ shar phyogs su kha bltas te/ rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug nas/ lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya
<p>40a.2</p>bstan la/ g.yas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya sta zur phyogs su bzhag ste g.yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni/ brgya byin spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar ma byas pa ni brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /rkang pa g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug la/ 
<p>40a.3</p>spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang pa ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas de'i sngags ni/ na mo badzra s+ya tsa di shi di shi badzra pA Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ me'i phyogs su bltas nas/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum por bkug ste/ gung mo'i tshigs
<p>40a.4</p>gsum par btsugs la/ mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag pa 'di ni/ me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong gi ngos la/ mdzub mo btsugs pa ni/ me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo mthe bong ngos la btsugs
<p>40a.5</p>te/ phyir drag tu brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /'di'i sngags ni ag+ni e h+ye hi ka pa li a ka pa li/ dz+wa la dz+wa la da ha shi khi tod rU pA k+Sha swA hA/ gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas nas snyim pa mdun du bzhag ste/ sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba la khu tshur bcings nas srin
<p>40a.6</p>lag gnyis bsgrengs te gshibs la g.yabs te/ de nang du bzhag pa ni/ gshin rje spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /srin lag gnyis yang phyi rol du de bzhin du gshibs te/ bsgrengs la snying gar gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las srin lag sbyar ba ni slar
<p>40a.7</p>btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni ya ma ye swA hA/ bden bral gyi phyogs su bltas te/ rkang pa mnyam par 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las/ mdzub mo dang gung mo ral gri 'dra bar gshibs te/ bsgreng la bzhag /lag pa g.yon pa yang
<p>40b</p>
<p>40b.1</p>de ltar byas te/ sta zur logs su bzhag la/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste/ g.yab pa ni bden bral spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las g.yon pa sta zur logs su ral gri 'dra bar bzhag pa ni/ bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drangs
<p>40b.2</p>ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni/ slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni sarba b+hU ta b+ha yaM ka ra ku ru ku ru swA hA/ chu lha'i phyogs su rkang pa mnyam par 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcings nas/ mthe bong dang mdzub mo gnyis gcig tu sbyar te/ 
<p>40b.3</p>zhags mig ltar byas la g.yon pa'i khu tshur yang de ltar byas te/ snying gar bzhag ste/ g.yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g.yab pa ni/ chu lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyi tshul du bzhag pa las/ zhags
<p>40b.4</p>mig ltar byas pa ni chu lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa'i phyag rgya las/ mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni tri tri pu sha/ tri tri shi gi to li bi ru pA k+Sha swA hA/ rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug la/ lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur
<p>40b.5</p>bcangs te/ gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs dang por/ mdzub mo bkug pa'i thor to btsugs la/ lag pa g.yas brkyang de bzhin du bya ste/ sta zur logs su bzhag cing / mthe bong bsgul ba ni/ rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bong snga ma bzhin du
<p>40b.6</p>gzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni/ slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni/ oM sA saM khA khA khu kha swA hA/ ku be ra la mngon du bltas te/ 'dug nas/ lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la/ rdo rje
<p>40b.7</p>bcing pa nang du bzlog ste/ mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs la brkyang / de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas/ gung mo gnyis rdo rje ltar bkug ste/ g.yabs pa ni ku be ra spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje bcings
<p>41a</p>
<p>41a.1</p>pa'i tshul du bzhag pa de ni/ ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las/ gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni/ slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni/ oM ku be rA ya swA hA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la/ lag pa gcig tu
<p>41a.2</p>sbyar te/ thal mo sbyar ba byas la/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang du bkug ste/ bsnol ba gung mo gnyis gshibs te/ bsgreng ba'i rgyab logs su mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bya/ mthe bong gnyis par du gshibs te bzhag la/ de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phan
<p>41a.3</p>tshun rtse mo sprad nas nang du g.yab pa ni/ dbang ldan gyi spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag pa ni/ dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /
<p>41a.4</p>sngags ni/ oM dzum dzum shi ba swA hA/ steng gi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la/ g.yon brkyang pa'i gnas pas 'dug la thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus ni/ tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang bar bya'o/ /de nyid las
<p>41a.5</p>mdzub mo gnyis snga ma ltar bzhag pa ni/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni/ slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM u r+b+haM brah+ma ne swA hA/ sUr+ya ya gra ha a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ tsan+d+ra ya na k+Sha tra ya a d+hi pa ta ye
<p>41a.6</p>swA hA/ rkang pa gnyis mnyam par gnas pas 'dug la/ lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te sor mo rnams par mtshams med par rtse mo phan tshun sbyar te/ mthe bong zlum por byas la/ 'og gi phyogs su bltas te/ sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo'i lcags kyus spyan
<p>41a.7</p>drangs pa ni/ 'og gi sa'i lha mo spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las/ snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo bzhag pa ni/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis btang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni/ a d+hi pri th+wi de bya swA hA/ a su re b+h+yaHswA hA/ nA ge
<p>41b</p>
<p>41b.1</p>b+h+yaHswA hA/ de nas rang gi sngags de nyid kyis thams cad la 'thor 'thung phul la/ bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su bcas pa la/ bgegs med par mdzod cig /las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la stsol cig ces brjod la thams cad slar gtang ngo / /yang na dpung bzangs
<p>41b.2</p>kyis zhus pa las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po/ /dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang / /gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /
<p>41b.3</p>bu smad tshogs bcas g.yog 'khor bcas rnams la/ bdag gi pus mos la btsugs nas su/ /thal mo sbyar te khyod la gsol 'debs kyis/ gsan nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir spyon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang / /dga' ba'i tshal
<p>41b.4</p>dang lha yi gnas rnams dang / /shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang / /ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang / /chu bo kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang / /rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang / /mtsho dang rdzing dang ldeng ka'i chu ngogs dang / /g.ya' chu sil ma

<p>42a</p>
<p>42a.1</p>'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas ni/ /de nas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /shar phyogs rdo rje can de lha tshogs bcas/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i
<p>42a.2</p>bdag /chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po ste/ /dbang ldan lha de 'byung po'i bdag po dang / /steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang / /lha rnams dang ni sa yi klu rnams dang / /ri yi lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams la/ /sa sa so sor gtor ma phul ba rnams/ /rab tu dgyes

<p>44a.1</p>'das mi chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba la/ /khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing / /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang / /mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o/ /'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /des kyang 'di skad

<p>44b</p>
<p>44b.1</p>dgos te/ de lta bu'i rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig /khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa dang / gyen du bstan pa bcings
<p>44b.2</p>la rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis/ gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas pa'i chu rdo rje slob ma 'thung
<p>44b.3</p>du bcug la/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /de la dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /oM badzra u da ka Tha zhes bya'o/ /de nas slob ma la
<p>44b.4</p>'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis/ ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas yi ge
<p>44b.5</p>a zhes bya bas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar por bsam par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la rang gi snying gar yi ge a rdo rje'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan pa bsam par bya'o/ /yi ge hUM gis kyang slob ma rdo rje sems dpa' rdul dang bral zhing shin tu dang bar bsams la/

<p>44b.7</p>la/ slob ma'i snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blos bcug ste/ lus thams cad gang bar gyur par bsams la/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig /
<p>45a</p>
<p>45a.1</p>ces smros shig /de nas slob dpon gyis myur du rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ de'i snying gar gzhag ste/ 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go/ /'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med ni/ /de ring

<p>45a.3</p>'di yang brjod la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'od zer dmar po 'bab pas kun du khyab pas kun du gang bar bsams la/ lan brgya'i bar du bzla bar bya'o/ /de lta bus kyang gal te 'bab par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dril bu dang bcas pa
<p>45a.4</p>bcings la/ rkang pa g.yon pas de'i rkang pa g.yas pa mnan la/ nam mkha'i phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa'i steng na dpal rnam par snang mdzad de la dbab par bya ba'i phyir bris pas/ yi ge hUM gi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis 'bebs par mdzad pa dang / 'og nas kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil
<p>45a.5</p>'khor dang / yi ge hUM gis bteg par bsam pa dang / de bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa shar phyogs la sogs par bzhugs pas/ hUM hrIM hrIHa zhes bya ba'i rang rang gi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs yang dag par 'bebs par mdzad par bsams la/ badzra satwa A A
<p>45a.6</p>A AHzhes bya ba yang de bzhin du bzla bar bya'o/ /gal te sdig pa shin tu che bas de lta bus kyang 'bab par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas yang dang yang du sdig pa dral la/ yam shing dmar po rnams kyi me/ /rab 'bar rdo rje khro bo yi/ /mnyam par gzhag
<p>45a.7</p>pas snyoms zhugs la/ til sreg pas ni sdig bsregs shing / /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du til nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la/ hUM dbus su bsam pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bos sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de
<p>45b</p>
<p>45b.1</p>nas sbyin sreg gi thab khung las byung ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje de'i lus la 'bab pas/ sdig pa rnams bsregs par gyur par bsams na nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /yang de lta bus kyang 'bab par ma gyur na/ de la dbang bskur bar mi bya'o/ /babs
