<p>85a.2</p>mchod nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba phur bu'i 'gros su 'gro bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo'i phur bus dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su phur bus gdab par bya'o/ /stang stabs byed pa'i dus 'dir khro bo'i tshig gis hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra rgyun mi 'chad
<p>85a.3</p>par gdon par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i 'dug stangs phyed kyis 'dug la/ oM badzra dz+wa la a na lA rka hUM zhes zlos shing g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag nas/ g.yas pas rdo rje bsor zhing bgegs rnams la bsnun par bya'o/ /yang rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas kyang bgegs
<p>85a.4</p>rnams bsreg pa la sogs pa bya ste/ hUM badzra a na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hUM phaT rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la/ sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba ltar byas la mthe bo rdo rje ltar bsgreng ba ni rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzra ne tri ban+d+ha sar ba big+h+TA zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan pas bgegs
<p>85a.5</p>rnams bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong gnyis brkyang ste snyoms la bzhag pa ni rdo rje spyan dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang la bzhag ste/ oM badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sarbaM swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang 'og bcing bar bya'o/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang sngags/ 
<p>85a.6</p>oM badzra yak+Sha hUM zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas nam mkha' bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo mthe bong gnyis brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis mche ba lta bur bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /yang rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyis rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi steng du nam mkha' bcing bar bya'o/ /
<p>85a.7</p>oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor te/ mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du gzhag pa ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas shar phyogs bcing bar
<p>85b</p>
<p>85b.1</p>bya ste/ oM hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du sbrel/ mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo sbyar la bzlog ste spyi bor gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /yang rdo rje zhags pas de nyid bcing bar bya ste/ hUM badzra pA sha hrIHrdo rje
<p>85b.2</p>khu tshur gnyis kyi mkhrig ma mdud pa byas pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'o/ /rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ oM badzra pA tang ki pA tang ki ni ra Ta rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe bong gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du byas la/ mdzub mo gnyis mnyam nas srin lag phye ste/ mthe'u chung
<p>85b.3</p>gnyis ba dan gyi rtse mo ltar byas pa ni ba dan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rdo rje nag mos byang phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ oM hrIHbadzra kA li ru Ta ma Ta rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya nyid snying gar bzhag la brtan par byas pa ni rdo rje nag mo'i'o/ /rdo rje rtse mos lho phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ oM badzra shi Sha
<p>85b.4</p>ra ru Ta ma Ta rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul du bya ba ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor bcing bar bya'o/ /hUM badzra karma yaM hUM zhes bya ba rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi rab byas nas rdo rje bsdams pas rdo rje dra ba bya'o/ /sngags ni badzra b+han+d+ha baM/ de'i rjes la sgo dbye
<p>85b.5</p>ba'i phyag rgyas sgo phye la/ rdo rje'i rgyu'i rang bzhin can gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bzhi pa badzra maN+Da la hUM dzaHzhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas dgug par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo dang mthe bong rdo rjer bya ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs
<p>85b.6</p>pa'o/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya/ oM ma hA badzra tsakra a d+hi tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha hUM zhes bya ba dang bcas pas dgug pa ni dkyil 'khor des byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul gyis bskor ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas seng ldeng gi rdo rje phur
<p>85b.7</p>bu yi ge hUM las mtha' yas dang rnam par rgyal ba dang / sprin sgra dang / gsus po che zhes bya/ stod khro bo'i gzugs la smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i rnam par bsams la tsan+dan dmar po'i byug pas byugs shing / sras bu dmar pos bcing bar byas la/ oM kro d+ha ya sa hi Ta Ta Ta Ta
<p>86a</p>
<p>86a.1</p>tri ta ma Ta zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad zlos shing g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir rdo rjes brdung bar bya ba'am/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs la/ lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa lta bur byas
<p>86a.2</p>pas dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir ji skad du bshad pa'i phur bu bzhi sngags 'dis skyed cing brdung par bya'o/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba du Sh+TAM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha ro A dz+nyA pa ya ti
<p>86a.3</p>swA hA/ yang na oM badzra kI li kI lA ya sarba big+h+nAM hUM phaT/ ces bya ba phur bu bzhi la yongs su bzlas la 'di nyid zlos shing g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la g.yas pa'i 'bar ba'i rdo rjes brdung zhing dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir gdab par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis
<p>86a.4</p>bgegs bsal ba dang / ra ba dang dra ba yang byas la/ dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad de/ rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya oM truM zhes bya ba'i sngags dang bcas pas lha rnams dang bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs nas/ rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i bum pas bsang
<p>86a.5</p>gtor bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i sgor bzhag la rdo rje gnod sbyin zlos shing bdag nyid dam/ grogs dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gyi shar nas brtsams te byug par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis bdag po lnga'i gnas su tsan+dan dang gur gum la sogs pas dkyil
<p>86a.6</p>'khor gru bzhi pa bya/ lha lhag ma rnams kyi gnas su ni dkyil 'khor zlum por bya zhing rang rang gi sngags lan bdun bdun bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la yid kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su brtag par byas nas nam mkha'i phyogs nas de bzhin
<p>86a.7</p>gshegs pa la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la gur gum la sogs pa'i thig le de rnams su rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang rang gi sngags kyis bzhugs su gsol la mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod par bya'o/ /
<p>86b</p>
<p>86b.1</p>de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la nye reg byas nas/ mchod yon la mchod yon gyi phyag rgya dang / yi ge hUM brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ 'di skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum par spos chu cung zad blugs la/ hU~M las rdo rje gnod sbyin bskyed de/ rang gi phyag rgya bzhis
<p>86b.2</p>rgyas btab la dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur nas/ mchod yon phul nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang yang dag par mchod nas/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang me tog gi lcug ma las oM badzra yak+Sha
<p>86b.3</p>hUM zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas me tog gis sil mar gtor nas spos kyang gtul bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du rdo rje me dang rdo rje hUM mdzad gnyis yongs su bzlas pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing / dkyil 'khor gyi zhag ni thun gsum du bzla'o/ /de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi spyan sngar
<p>86b.4</p>gzhag par bya'o/ /bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje me dang / rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / mA ma kI la re re zhing mar la sogs pa'i rdzas las brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o/ /lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
<p>86b.5</p>'khor dang bcas pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de/ sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad dang / me tog la sogs pas kyang yang dag par mchod la phyag byas nas mchod yon phul la/ slob ma lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de la re zhig dang por legs par khrus
<p>86b.6</p>byas la/ gos gtsang ma bgos shing lag par me tog thogs pa'i slob mas/ slob dpon la phyag byas la 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen pos tshul brtan pa/ /mgon po chen
<p>86b.7</p>po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang stsal du gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang stsal du gsol/ /thar pa chen pos grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyi/ /de nas slob
<p>87a</p>
<p>87a.1</p>dpon gyis slob ma'i snying gar hUM las rdo rje bskyed la/ khu tshur g.yas pas rdo rje bzung ste/ snying po de'i snying gar gzhag par bya'o/ /su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho sid+d+hi badzra ya thA su kha zhes bya ba brjod nas de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug
<p>87a.2</p>par bya ste/ rtog pa ma lus legs par bsdus nas ni/ /shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas gson/ /brjod pas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob/ /dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang / /rjes su yi rang yang
<p>87a.3</p>na bgyid stsal gang / /de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni/ /spyan sngar ma lus so sor bshags par bgyi/ /bde gshegs sras kyi tshogs gnyis zab pa dang / /rgya chen 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don/ /sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan pa la'ang / rtag tu bdag ni rjes
<p>87a.4</p>su yi rang ngo / /thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cing / /blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom/ /ma lus rigs kyi pad+ma'i nang bzhugs pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi/ /blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' rab ste/ /dman pa'i
<p>87a.5</p>'jigs pa nyid kyi rgyal byed tshal/ /srid pa'i 'byor pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog /gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing / /blo gros rnam rgyal thugs rje cher ldan pa'i/ /brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la
<p>87a.6</p>skyabs su mchi/ /srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid/ /'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rgyal gyur pa/ /snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cing yang dag rtogs/ /mnyam med byang chub rnam gsum gzung bar bgyi/ /
<p>87a.7</p>sems can rnams ni yongs su smin pa'am/ /yang na yongs su bskyab par bya phyir ram/ /rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /'di dag thams cad rtswa sogs bzhin du btang / /de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan shes rab bla na
<p>87b</p>
<p>87b.1</p>med pa ni/ /bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bgyi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags la mkhas pa yi/ /chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni/ /'gro ba 'di yis thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /khyad 'phags gnas la bdag
<p>87b.2</p>ni gnas par bgyi/ /zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod do/ /bdag ni de skad ces brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag gis log pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /
<p>87b.3</p>bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang / thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyis btul nas/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab tu gzhag par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang / 
<p>87b.4</p>sems can 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do zhes sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtogs par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis ma yengs pa'i sems dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin
<p>87b.5</p>pa drug la bslab par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis theg pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtogs par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas pa'i so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bgyi'o/ /bdag ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
<p>87b.6</p>so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa ma lus pa'i bar la mngon par gnas par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /
<p>87b.7</p>'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub chen por sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo
<p>88a</p>
<p>88a.1</p>ste/ 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po'o/ /de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs par byas pa'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la gnas pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba sgo mtha' yas pa la
<p>88a.2</p>gnas pa mtha' med par gyur pa rdzogs par byas nas gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang po bstan pas yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la
<p>88a.3</p>nges par sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /sdom pa don du gnyer ba la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga 'dzin du gzhug go/ /de nas slob ma'i lag tu rdo rje dris dri/ me tog gis me tog sbyin zhing bdug pas kyang slob ma yang dag par bdugs la/ mar me mas mar mes snang bar bya'o/ /de nas u dum
<p>88a.4</p>bA ra'am a shwad+tha'i so shing spos dang / me tog la sogs pa dang ldan pa la khro bo rdo rje bzhad pa bzlas pa dang / ku sha sar pa ma nyams pa la khro bo rdo rje rnon po bzlas la de la sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas khro bo rdo rje srung ba bzlas pa'i srung skud mdud pa gsum dang ldan pa/ de'i
<p>88a.5</p>dpung pa g.yon par bdag nyid kyis bcing bar bya zhing / rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis yang dag par bsrung ba dang / byams pa'i go cha bskon la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ bzhin bzangs longs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byos shig /nang par
<p>88a.6</p>dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su lha thams cad de bzhin du bar snang la bzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi gnas spos chus byugs la me tog la sogs pas kyang mdzes par byas nas/ tshon sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / 
<p>88a.7</p>ljang gu dang / dkar po dri zhim pos bsgos pas srad bu so sor kha bsgyur la go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag nas hUM hrAM hrIHa A zhes bya ba rang gi sa bon 'di las byung ba'i thig gi 'od zer gyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rang rang gi phyogs na bzhugs par yang dag par btang
<p>88b</p>
<p>88b.1</p>ba dang / 'bar ba'i lcags kyus drangs te rang gi lag na gnas pa'i srad bu legs par dgang bar bya zhing / oM a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harmAHs+pha ra s+pha ra a nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmAHa t+yan+ta a nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmA hU~M zhes zlos shing bsgril bar bya'o/ /de nas srad bu de tsan+dan bzang
<p>88b.2</p>po la sogs pas byugs pa'i gser gyi snod la sogs par bzhag la/ me tog gis mchod de rdo rje bsdams pas bzung la thig gdab pa'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad la sogs pa bdag po rnams kyi sngags kyang brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar
<p>88b.3</p>bya'o/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod la phyag byas nas langs te yid kyis rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas/ phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas rdo rje'i grogs mchog hUM zhes bya ba 'dis khro bo'i rdo rje las kyi gzugs su dbyung bar bya'o/ /yang de nyid
<p>88b.4</p>rdo rje hU~M mdzad du gyur pa la mig g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su yi ge dza las zla ba dang nyi ma ser po snang ba bskyed la/ dza zhes bya bas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi lag du srad bu de btang la/ srad bu dang po g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la phyis ni ci bder bya zhing phyogs
<p>88b.5</p>thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsam mo/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab ste/ /shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /oM badzra sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM zhes bya ba 'di dang / sangs rgyas
<p>88b.6</p>kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can gyi don gyi phyir 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes bskul bar bya'o/ /grwa bzhir bya zhing sgo bzhir gdod/ /rta babs bzhis kyang rab tu brgyan/ /srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ /dar dang phreng
<p>88b.7</p>bas shin tu brgyan/ /zla ba phyed par rab gnas pa'i/ /khyams kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / /dra ba dra phyed dag gis spras/ /sgo rnams dang ni rgyan cha can/ /rlung gis bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog /ba dan dril bu sgra sgrogs pa/ /khyams ni med par gyur pa'i sgo/ /me tog
<p>89a</p>
<p>89a.1</p>chun 'phyang rgyan gyis bskor/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa rnams dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen brgyan par ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim srad bu bre/ /shes rab can gyis de nang du/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan te/ /gru bzhi
<p>89a.2</p>pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /ka ba brgyad dang rta babs bcas/ /rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa ste/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor srad bu bre/ /srad bu bres pa tshon gyis dgang / /lhag ma ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor yin par blta'o/ /gal te bgegs zlog
<p>89a.3</p>par byed 'dod par gyur na seng ldeng gi phur bu stod rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rnam pa la/ smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu la snga ma bzhin du rdo rje phur bu'i sngags bzlas te dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar rdo rjes brdung bar bya'o/ /yang dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i dbus su sngar bstan pa'i phur bu
<p>89a.4</p>dang 'dra ba'i phur bu gzhan dag la phur bu'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas go rims 'di bzhin du bgegs thams cad la phur bus gdab par bya'o/ /ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la btags pa'i srad bus bskor phyogs su/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor
<p>89a.5</p>zlum po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa'i yang phyi rol du/ de bzhin du 'khor yug chen por zlum por thig legs par gdab par bya'o/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor der grog mkhar gyi sa la sogs pas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas brgya byin gyi gzugs
<p>89a.6</p>brnyan rang gi phyogs na gnas pa la i las brgya byin ser po/ me la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan la'ang de bzhin te/ raM las me lha dmar po'o/ /oM haM las gshin rje nag po'o/ /kraM las srin po nag po/ bam las chu lha dkar po/ yang las rlung lha dud ka /phaT las
<p>89a.7</p>lus ngan po ser po/ sum+b+ha las dbang ldan dkar po bskyed la 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug ste/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas nas phur bus gdab bo/ /shin tu yun ring du bgegs med par byed 'dod nas sa
<p>89b</p>
<p>89b.1</p>dgab par bya'o/ /de ltar na yang gal te bgegs byed na rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas kyang dgug pa la sogs pa byas la/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ rkang pa g.yon pas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan
<p>89b.2</p>mnan te/ hUM baM hUM zhes bya ba la sogs pa spel ba'i tshul gyis zlos shing g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas na/ de lta bus bgegs bcom par 'gyur ro/ /yang na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin sngon du bya ba'i rjes thogs la/ a las rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas/ rgyud
<p>89b.3</p>las gsungs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur nges par bsams la/ rang gi snying gnas haM las 'phags pa mi g.yo ba yid kyis phyung ste/ badzra haM ban+d+ha zhes yid la zlos shing / phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du rlung gi mtshams su dris thig le bdun byas te/ thig le re re zhing
<p>89b.4</p>yang nang du chud par byas la/ dbus ma dang thig le bdun dang ldan par bya'o/ /thig le bdun po de dag kyang rlung lha bdun po mdog nag po ri dwags la zhon par bsams la/ 'phags pa mi g.yo bas bkug nas zhags pas bcings par gyur par bsam mo/ /de rnams kyi dbus
<p>89b.5</p>ma gcig ni gtso bo yin la/ lhag ma rlung lha drug ni de'i 'khor du kun nas gnas pa yin no/ /de nas kham phor a las ri rab tu bsams la/ de'i steng du a nyid las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rjes g.yogs la/ dbus su yi ge hUM gi sa bon las
<p>89b.6</p>byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa mtshams rnams su mdung rtse rnam par bsams la/ de bzhin du badzra haM ban+d+ha zhes zlos shing kham phor des ji skad bshad pa'i yi ge yaM bdun po dgab par bya'o/ /de nas kham phor dang ri rab kyi steng du yi ge oM las sngar bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam
<p>89b.7</p>par snang mdzad bsams la/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas ri rab bzung nas ral gri dang zhags pas rlung lha rnams la bsdigs pa mdzad par bsam par bya ste/ de lta bus ni rlung lha thams cad bcing bar
<p>90a</p>
<p>90a.1</p>byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas chu la sogs pa'i bgegs bzlog pa bshad par bya ste/ yi ge hUM las 'phags pa mi g.yo ba rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bdag nyid bskyed la/ grog mkhar gyi sa'am/ ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba las
<p>90a.2</p>bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas/ yi ge khaM las ral gri dang / raM las nang na me yod par bskyed cing / k+ShaM las zhags pa dang / lcags kyu bskyed de/ de lag pa g.yon pas bzung la/ lag pa g.yas pas ral gri dang / zhags pas drangs nas bgegs kyi
<p>90a.3</p>gzugs brnyan gyi nang du bcug ste/ g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas la/ rkang pa g.yon pas spyi bo nas btsir nas/ na maH sa man+ta badzrA NAM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha na s+pho Ta ya hUM Ta ga haM maM zhes zlos shing gzugs brnyan de ral gris gtub par bya ba'am/ dug dang ske tshe dang
<p>90a.4</p>lan tshwa la sogs pas gzugs brnyan la bskus la me yis gdung bar bya'o/ /me yis gdungs pas de nyid kyang / /zhi bar 'gyur bar the som med/ tshangs pa'am brgya byin yin na yang / /de'i mod la myur du tshig /ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /
<p>90a.5</p>las 'di yang 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor gyis gsang sngags 'di khri bzlas pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas de'i 'og tu las brtsam par bya'o/ /yang na oM AHhU~M zhes bya ba 'dis 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi
<p>90a.6</p>pa zhabs drug pa/ phyag g.yas gnyis na ral gri dang dgra sta bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gnyis na zhags pa dang gtun shing bsnams pa/ lho phyogs su khro bo'i tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha'i gtos kun du gang bar mdzad pa bsams la/ mdung thung gi phyag rgya
<p>90a.7</p>bcings te/ sprin la sogs pa bzlog pa'i bsam pas tsham rngam dang bcas pas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la/ mdzub mo gnyis nang sbyar ba ni mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o/ /de ltar na yang gal te bgegs rnams zhi bar ma gyur na/ kham phor so
<p>90b</p>
<p>90b.1</p>ma btang ba gnyis kyi nang du khrag dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang / da du ra'i lo ma'i khu bas gsang sngags bris la/ yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ kham phor kha sbyar te de'i nang du bzhag la/ mi'i bgegs la sogs pa
<p>90b.2</p>bsams te/ sreg blugs brgya'am sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas de dag 'jigs pa'am/ 'chi ba'am/ mi ma yin pas gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor bas yi ge hUM bzlas brjod 'bum byas la/ mi rus kyi rgyu las byas pa'i phur bu sor bzhi
<p>90b.3</p>pa'i tshad tsam la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba byas nas gzugs brnyan phur bus gdab par bya'o/ /de nas me'i tsha ba zhi ba bshad par bya ste/ me'i steng du yi ge baM las chu'i dkyil
<p>90b.4</p>'khor/ de'i steng du pad+ma'i dbus na gnas pa'i 'khor lo de'i steng du yi ge baM de nyid las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dung dang kun da ltar dkar ba steng na bzhugs te/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa 'dra ba'i rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu bo chen po bzhi 'bab pa lta bu'i char gyi
<p>90b.5</p>rgyun sar pas phyogs bcur 'gengs par 'gyur bar bsam par bya'o rdo rje spyan can dang rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kyang kham phor gyi ri rab dang phur bus yang dag par bsrungs la rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan dag gis de rnams kyi nam mkha' bcing bar byas la rdo rje bsdams
<p>90b.6</p>pas rdo rje dral bar bya'o/ /yang na mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gis bgegs rnams bzlog par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i phur bu hUM bzhis bton la/ rang gi lag na gnas pa'i rdo rje bcug ste 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i bu ga bkang la mnyam
<p>90b.7</p>por byas nas thig skud tshon dkar po dri zhim par spangs pa gdab par bya'o/ /de ltar thig legs par btab nas hi zhes bya ba las mig g.yas pa dang g.yon par nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la khro bo'i la bas kun du bltas la sgo rnams dbye'o/ /de nas tshon rtsi byin gyis brlab par
<p>91a</p>
<p>91a.1</p>bya ste/ oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ye hUM/ zhes bya ba 'dis phyag rgya dang ldan pas tshon rtsi thams cad la lan bdun bzlas na rdo rje'i dbang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis las ni/ 
<p>91a.2</p>mdzub mo'i rtse mo mnyam sbyar ba/ /byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni/ /'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya'o/ /hi zhes bya ba dang rdo rje nyi ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya mthar spar bar bya'o/ /de la 'bar ba'i lta ba ni 'di yin te/ rab tu 'bar ba mig bsgul zhing / /mig gi rdzi ma 'gugs
<p>91a.3</p>byed pa/ /lta ba gzi can yin par bshad/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed pa'o/ /dI p+ti dr-i Sh+Ta aM ku sha dzaHzhes bya ba 'di yang mig tu dgod do/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM zhes zlos shing g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te g.yas nas bskor bas
<p>91a.4</p>tshon rtsi dgye bar bya ste/ phyis ci bde bar bya'o/ /de la rim pa ni 'di yin te/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po'o/ /de yang / sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin/ /gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste/ /pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin gzhan/ /de bzhin
<p>91a.5</p>gzhan dag ma rgad 'dra/ /dkar po nang du shes bya ste/ /'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /shar phyogs su ni sngon po ste/ /lhor ni ser po dang ldan pa/ /nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste/ /byang ni ljang gu yang dag ldan/ /
<p>91a.6</p>dbus kyis yi cha nyid ni/ /shel ltar snang ba bla na med/ /rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing / /rab mnyam gzhag pas bri bar bya'o/ /yang na snga ma bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas nas/ gser ram dngul las byas pa 'am/ sa yang rung ste legs bris pa'i/ /pha
<p>91a.7</p>gu gru bzhir byas pa la/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya/ oM badzra dz+wa la ag+ni pra dIp+ta A kaR+Sha ya sarba thA ga ta ma hA badzra sa ma ya hU~M dzaH sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni/ /'bar bas bskor ba gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin rin chen 'od bskor ba/ /pad+mo rdo rje kun de bzhin/ /
<p>91b</p>
<p>91b.1</p>snying po ni 'dis bya'o/ /oM badzra satwa badzri dz+wa la mA la hU~M phaT/ oM rat+na badzri dz+wa la mA la hUM trAM/ oM d+ha rma badzri dz+wa la mA la hUM trIH/ oM karma badzri dz+wa la mA la hUM AHrdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar de bzhin du/ /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin bri ba/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad dkyil
<p>91b.2</p>'khor ro/ /de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra be gA kra ma hU~M/ de nas 'di yi phyag rgya bshad/ /yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni/ /rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung / /phyir byung nang du zhugs kyang ni/ /dam tshig 'gal bar de mi 'gyur/ /de yi dbus su sems
<p>91b.3</p>dpa' che/ /phyag na rdo rje bri ba ni/ /ut+pal che sngo mtsher ba'i mdog /rdo rje hUM mdzad bsdus pa ni/ /khro dang bcas pas 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /g.yon brkyang tshul du gnas pa ste/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /g.yon pa'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni/ /dbang phyug
<p>91b.4</p>chen po mnan par bya/ /g.yas pa'i zhabs kyis u ma yi/ /nu ma'i steng du gnon pa bri/ /'di yi snying po 'di yin no/ /hU~M oM ni sum+b+ha badzra bid+yot+ta ma hUM phaTaHces bya ba dang / oM badzra shUl zhes bya ba'i snying po gnyis ni lha chen po'i'o/ /oM kro d+ha badzra ag+ni dz+wA la ya tri shU
<p>91b.5</p>laM b+hin+da badzra hr-i da yaM badzre Na hU~M phaT/ ces pa ni u ma'i'o/ /de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje khro bo gzhag pa ni/ /khros pa mche ba 'byung ba ste/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra satwa kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ 
<p>91b.6</p>oM badzra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra karma kro d+ha rA gA ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra tuSh+Ti kro d+ha sA d+hu sA d+hu hU~M phaT/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par yang / /der ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ /rdo rje khro bos bskor ba bri/ /de nas de rnams kyi
<p>91b.7</p>snying po ni 'di yin no/ /trAM oM badzra bi shud+d+he kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/ oM badzra sU r+ya ma hA dz+wa la ma la kro d+ha dz+wa la ya sarban hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ke tu de hi hUM phaT/ oM badzra At+ta sa ta kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa
<p>92a</p>
<p>92a.1</p>yang / /rdo rje'i sde ni bri bar bya/ /khro bo bdag nyid chen pos bskor/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad do/ /hrIHoM badzra d+harma kro d+ha bi nA sha ya bi sho d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na kro d+ha ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM badzra ke tu kro d+ha pra be sha ya maN+Dale sarba na hU~M
<p>92a.2</p>phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha b+hA Sha ba da ba da hU~M phaT/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par yang / /rdo rje dbab pa bri ba ni/ /rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad do/ /aHoM badzra karma hUM phaT/ oM badzra ka pa tsa
<p>92a.3</p>kro d+ha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ya k+Sha kro d+ha khA da khA da hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha muSh+Thi sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnams su/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul bzhin du/ /ji ltar go rims bzhin du ni/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa kun bri'o/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /
<p>92a.4</p>oM badzra lA s+ya rA ga ye hU~M phaT/ oM badzra mA le a b+hiShiny+tsa hU~M phaT/ oM badzra gI te ga ta hU~M phaT/ oM badzra nr-i t+ye ba shaM ku ru hU~M phaT/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa'i phyi rol tu/ de yi grwa rnams nyid du ni/ /mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi rnams bzhag /de nas de
<p>92a.5</p>rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra d+hU pe pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ oM puSh+pe pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ oM badzra A lo ke pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badzra gan+d+he pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ sgo rnams kun gyi dbus su ni/ /lcags kyu la sogs gzhag par bya/ /dkyil
<p>92a.6</p>'khor phyi rol gnas rnams su/ /phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams so/ /de nas de dag gi snying po bshad de/ /oM badzra oM ku sha ma hA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya sarba sa ma ya na hUM dzaH/ oM badzra ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha ya sarba sa ma ya na hUM hU~M oM badzra s+pho Ta ma hA kro d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sarba sa ma ya na hUM baM/ oM badzra A be+e sha
<p>92a.7</p>ya ma hA kro d+ha A be sha ya sarba sa ma ya na hUM hoH/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams la/ shar phyogs su byams pa dang / mthong ba don yod dang / ngan song thams cad sbyong ba dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams par bri'o/ /
<p>92b</p>
<p>92b.1</p>lho phyogs su spos kyi glang po dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / ye shes tog rin po che bsnams par bri'o/ /nub phyogs su 'od dpag tu med pa dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / bzang skyong dang / dra ba can gyi 'od pad+ma bsnams par bri'o/ /byang gi char rdo rje
<p>92b.2</p>snying po dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / kun du bzang po sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams par bri'o/ /yang na 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs dang / shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po ma gtogs pa/ byams pa la
<p>92b.3</p>sogs pa bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhis stong du ma tshang bar shar phyogs nas brtsams te khyams la'o/ /oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /yang phyi'i dkyil
<p>92b.4</p>'khor gyi khyams la shar phyogs su sgyu ma'i rdo rje/ rdo rje dril bu/ thub pa'i rdo rje/ rdo rje mtshon cha chung ma dang bcas pa/ lhor bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/ rdo rje 'od/ rdo rje dbyig pa/ rdo rje gser smug chung ma dang bcas pa'o/ /nub tu rdo rje glang po sna/ rdo rje phreng ba/ rdo rje dbang / rdo rje
<p>92b.5</p>rnam par rgyal ba/ rdo rje gtun shing / rdo rje rlung / rdo rje me/ rdo rje 'jigs pa chung ma dang bcas par ro/ /byang phyogs su ni rdo rje lcags kyu/ rdo rje dus/ rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo/ rdo rje chu klung chung ma dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /khyab 'jug la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad
<p>92b.6</p>'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams kyi sku'i phyed kyi tshad tsam du thams cad khyams la brten par bya'o zhes rdo rje rtse mo las gsungs pa yin no/ /de nas rdo rje gser la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi snying po dang rig pa rnams bshad do/ /oM badzra tsakra hUM/ oM badzra he me tshin+d+ha tsakre na
<p>92b.7</p>badzri Ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra g+haN+Da ke hUM/ oM badzri ni kau ma rI shI g+h+raM A be sha ya gan+d+ha sha b+de na/ badzra pA Ni pI ye badzra sa ma ye ma nu smra ra ra Na hUM phaT/ oM badzra dan+ta tiSh+Tha hUM/ oM badzra shAn+ti dza pa dze pa a k+Sha ma la ya sarba na mA ra ya shAn+ta tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badzra a yu d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra muSh+Ti ha na ha na
<p>93a</p>
<p>93a.1</p>badzre Na b+hi n+da b+hin+da pi Da ya sarba du Sh+TAM hr-i da ya ni oM sum+b+ha hUM phaT/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa li ta dIp+ta badzra hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i te sarba du Sh+TAM gr-i h+na ban+d+ha na ha na pa tsa bid+h+wa n+sa ya bi nA sha ya tshin+da b+hen+da b+hasmi ku ru murta na ha da ya/ badzre Na ye ke tsita ma ma a mu ka s+ya
<p>93a.2</p>bi g+h+na bi nA ya ka s+t+waM da ma ya dIp+ta kro d+ha badzri Ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra so mya hUM/ oM badzra kan+ti mA ra ya so mya rA pe pra dIp+ta rA ge na shI g+h+raM s+pho Ta ya hr-i da yaM/ badzra d+ha ra sa t+ye na ma hA badz+yo da na ka ra li shi ta ra sh+mi badzri Ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra da N+Da hU~M phaT/ oM badzra daN+Da ag+hi g+ha ta ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra bi
<p>93a.3</p>kr-i ta hU~M phaT/ oM badzra me kha le kha Ni kha Nu sha b+de na bi sha ku ru triSh+Ta mA ra ya bi sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra ma de hU~M phaT/ oM badzra bi la ye hU~M/ tshin+da a si na b+hin+da badzre Na mA ra ya un+ma da ya bi ba pi ba hU~M phaT/ oM badzra mA ya hU~M/ oM badzra A sha na ni b+ha k+Sha ya sarba du Sh+TA na badzra da sha ni shak+ti
<p>93a.4</p>da ra Ni ma nu Sha mAM sa A ha re na/ na ra ru d+hi rab sa pri ya madz+dza sa mu le ba Na bi lip+ta ga te a na ya sarba d+ha na d+ha n+ya hi ra n+ya su bar+Na a tri Ni saM tra ma ya ba ra te bak+Shi ni hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ma d+ha hU~M/ oM badzra ba shi ni a na ya b+ha smiM ku ru sarba pu ru Sha d+ha si ku ru truM d+ha ma pra sA da ya bya ba ha ra b+h+yo/ 
<p>93a.5</p>b+hU ta ba ra bi dza yaM ka ri badzra pa ti ka ra Ni hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ma si hU~M/ oM badzra ba si ni a na ya sarba bas+t+raM/ aN+Na ba na di t+yu pa ka ra NA Ni shI g+h+raM ba shI kurbi dam+me pra yats+tsha a bi sha sa t+yaM ka tha ya/ badzra ko sha d+ha ri Ni hU~M phaT/ oM mu sa la hU~M phaT/ oM badzra d+hu ti a na ya sarbaM maN+DalaM pra
<p>93a.6</p>dza sha ya/ A be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ sarba karma Ni me ku ru shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM/ la g+hu la g+hu trA sa ya mA ra ya/ na rA be Na badzra kha T+wAM ga d+ha ri Ni hU~M phaT/ oM badzra pa ta hUM phaT/ oM badzra bi ga badzri ni g+hu g+hu g+hu g+hu sha b+de na mA ra ya/ bi ga ri bi d+h+wa n+sa ya badzra pa ta d+ha ri Ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra
<p>93a.7</p>dz+wa la ni hUM/ oM badzra dz+wa la ya sarbaM badzra dz+wa la ya da ha da ha b+ha smiM ku ru hUM phaT/ oM badzra gra ha hUM/ oM badzra bste pra bak+ta daMSh+T+ra ka ra ya b+hi Sha Na na bak+te shI g+h+raM gr-i h+Na A be sha ya/ b+ha k+Sha ya ru d+hi ra Na pi ba ma hA ya k+Sha Ni badzra pA sha d+ha ri Ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra daMSh+Ta hUM/ oM badzra mu kha a na ya
<p>93b</p>
<p>93b.1</p>badzra daM Sh+T+re ba ya Na ke pA tA la ni ba si ni kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ sarba mu khe/ pra be sha ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ marma NI sarba duSh+TA na badzri Ni sid+d+ha a d+ha ri Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ma ra Na hU~M/ oM badzra kA li ma hA pre ta rU bi ni ma nu Sha/ mAM sa ru d+hir bri ye e h+ye hi gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na gr-ih+Na b+ha k+Sha ya badzra DA ki ni
<p>93b.2</p>badzra shaM ka le sarba de ba ga Na ma tra b+hU te ha ra ha ra prA NA na a mu ka s+ya ka pA la a laM kr-i ta sarba kA ye ki ny+tsir ya si/ badzra kha T+wAM d+ha ri Ni pre ta ma Nu Sha/ sha rI re shI g+h+raM/ A be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ba shi ku ru mA ra ya badzra rak+Sha si hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra big+h+naM hU~M/ oM badzra b+hU
<p>93b.3</p>ta ne ma nu Sha mAn+sa ba sa ru d+hi ra mu tra pu ri sh+le Sh+ma shiM g+ha na/ ka re to gar+b+ha hA ri NA ya hi shI g+h+raM i daM a mu ka s+ya ku ru badzra sho d+ha ni ka da ri ni sarba karma Ni me/ ku ru ku ru hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ha ra Na hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ma ka re gra sa shI g+h+raM/ pra be sha ya/ pA tA laM b+ha k+Sha ya badzra ma ka ra
<p>93b.4</p>d+ha ra ni hU~M phaT/ me'i mtshams nas brtsams te/ bskor phyogs su b+hi ma dang / dpal mo dang / dbang ldan ma dang / dka' thub bzlog ma yang 'dis bri bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ga mi ni sarba b+ha k+She sA d+ha ya gu h+ya badzra Ni hU~M phaT/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zla
<p>93b.5</p>ba'i mdog can zhal bzhi pa/ rdo rje skyil mo krung dang / phyag gnyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M mdzad sngon po ji skad bshad pa'i phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa/ khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' yang sku mdog sngon po/ rgyal po gser gyi mdog
<p>93b.6</p>can/ chags pa dmar po/ legs pa margad kyi mdog can/ rin chen hUM mdzad dang / rdo rje rin chen gser gyi mdog can/ nyi ma mdog dmar po/ rgyal mtshan nam mkha'i mdog can bzhad pa dkar ser/ chos kyi hU~M mdzad dang / rdo rje chos kyang sku mdog dkar
<p>93b.7</p>dmar/ rnon po nam mkha'i mdog can/ rgyu gser gyi mdog can/ smra ba zangs kyi mdog can/ las kyi hU~M mdzad dang / khro bo rdo rje las sna tshogs pa'i mdog can/ srung ba gser gyi mdog can gnod sbyin nag po/ khu tshur ser po/ khro bo sgeg mo sngon mo/ khro mo khu
<p>94a</p>
<p>94a.1</p>tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje gnyis bsnams te/ rdo rje bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis chung zad 'dud pa/ cha lang brdung ba la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhis bskor ba/ phreng ba ma ser mo khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje phreng ba 'dzin pa/ man ta li ka brdung ba'i lha mo bzhis bskor
<p>94a.2</p>ba/ glu ma mdog dmar gyi pi wang len pa la brtson pas gnas pa'i lha mo bzhis bskor ba/ gar ma sna tshogs pa'i mdog can/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams te gar byed pa la brtson pa/ mu kun da thogs pa gnas pa'i lha mo bzhis bskor te gnas pa'o/ /bdug
<p>94a.3</p>pa ma mdog sngo ba g.yon pa'i khro bo khu tshur sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba/ g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis spos khang bsnams pa/ ru dung 'bud pa la brtson pa'i lha mo bzhis bskor ba/ me tog ma ser ba/ phyag g.yon pa me tog gi snod thogs nas/ g.yas kyis me tog gi
<p>94a.4</p>char 'bebs pa/ pa Ta ha thogs pa'i lha mo bzhis bskor te bzhugs pa/ mar me ma mdog dkar dmar/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur sdigs mdzub/ g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis mar me'i sdong bu bsnams pa/ ti mi la bdug pa la brtson pa'i lha mo bzhis bskor ba/ 
<p>94a.5</p>byug pa ma sna tshogs pa'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon pas dris gang ba'i dung chos bsnams pa/ g.yas pas dri 'thor ba d+ha ka brdung ba la brtson pa'i lha mo bzhis bskor ba/ lcags kyu sngon po zhags pa ser po/ lcags sgrog dkar dmar/ dril bu sna tshogs pa'i mdog
<p>94a.6</p>can/ bskal ba bzang po'i mthar thug pa 'di dag thams cad kyang gang la khyad par gyi bdag med pa der ni g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa/ thugs kar khro bo'i sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba la brtson pa/ g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi mtshan ma bsnams te
<p>94a.7</p>tsham ngam gyi tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /gzhan yang drag po la sogs pa phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs yang dag par bri bar bya'o/ /de la drag po ni mdog dkar po lag pa bzhi pa/ g.yas kyi lag pa gcig gis u mal 'khyud pa/ gnyis pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang bcas pas
<p>94b</p>
<p>94b.1</p>mchog sbyin pa/ g.yon pa gcig gis mdung rtse gsum pa/ gnyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa khyu mchog la zhon pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa yod pa/ rin po che'i cod pan zla ba phyed pas brgyan pa/ mgrin pa sngo bar bri bar bya ste/ /pa shu pa ti nI la kaN+Tha u ma bri ya zhes smos
<p>94b.2</p>pa'i phyir ro/ /khyab 'jug mdog nag po lag pa bzhi pa/ g.yas pa gnyis na dbyig pa dang rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon gnyis na dung dang 'khor lo thogs pa/ nam mkha' lding la zhon pa'o/ /rdo rje ser mo ni gser gyi mdog can/ lag pa na mtshon cha dang / stan khyab
<p>94b.3</p>'jug dang 'dra'o/ /rdo rje dril bu ni mdog dmar po gdong drug pa/ lag pa g.yas gnyis na mdung thung dang rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon gnyis na khyim bya dang dril bu thogs pa/ rma bya la zhon pa'o/ /rdo rje gzhon nu ma ni rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar shes par bya'o/ /thub pa'i rdo rje ni gser
<p>94b.4</p>gyi mdog can/ gdong bzhi pa lag pa bzhi pa/ g.yas gnyis na rdo rje dang bgrang phreng thogs pa/ g.yon gnyis na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs thogs pa/ ngang pa la zhon pa'o/ /rdo rje zhi ba ma ni tshangs pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje mtshon cha ni mdog ser ba lag pa g.yon na rang gi
<p>94b.5</p>rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yas na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje thogs pa/ glang po che dkar po la zhon pa/ rdo rje khu tshur ni rdo rje mtshon cha dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/ /khro bo rdo rje 'khyil pa ni mdog dmar po/ lag pa g.yas kyis pad+ma dang bcas pa'i rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon na
<p>94b.6</p>pad+ma dang bcas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa/ rtas drangs pa'i shing rta la zhon pa'o/ /rdo rje mi 'chi ba ni khro bo rdo rje 'khyil pa dang 'dra ba nyid do/ /khro bo rdo rje 'od ni mdog dkar po/ lag pa g.yas na rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon pad+ma dang bcas pa'i zla ba thogs pa/ 
<p>94b.7</p>ngang pa la zhon pa'o/ /rdo rje mdangs ni khro bo rdo rje 'od dang 'dra ba'o/ /khro bo rdo rje dbyig pa ni mdog sngon po/ /g.yas na rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon na dbyig pa thogs pa/ rus sbal la zhon pa'o/ /dbyug mchog ma ni khro bo rdo rje dbyug pa dang 'dra'o/ /khro bo rdo rje ser smug ni/ 
<p>95a</p>
<p>95a.1</p>mdog dmar po lag pa g.yas na rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon na mi mgo thogs nas za zhing gnas pa/ rdo rje rked 'chings ma ni khro bo rdo rje ser smug dang 'dra'o/ /rdo rje glang po'i sna ni tshogs kyi bdag po ste/ mdog dkar po lag pa g.yas na rdo rje thogs pa
<p>95a.2</p>g.yon na gshol thogs te gnas pa glang po che la zhon pa/ rdo rje 'ju ma ni glang sna dang 'dra ba las khyad par ni 'di yod de/ 'di ltar lag pa g.yon na kha T+wAM ga thogs pa'o/ /tshogs kyi bdag po khro bo rdo rje phreng ba ni mdog ljang gu/ lag pa g.yas na rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon
<p>95a.3</p>me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa/ khu byug la zhon pa'o/ /rdo rje za ba mo ni rdo rje phreng ba dang 'dra ba las/ de las khyad par ni 'di yod do/ /'di ltar lag pa g.yon na mdung rtse yod pa'o/ /rdo rje dbang ni mdog ser po lag pa g.yas na rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon na chu srin gyi rgyal
<p>95a.4</p>mtshan 'dzin pa phag la zhon pa'o/ /rdo rje rta mgo ma ni rdo rje dbang dang 'dra ba las/ khyad par ni 'di yod de 'di ltar kha dog dmar ba yin no/ /tshogs kyi bdag po ni rnam par rgyal ba ni mdog dmar po/ lag pa g.yas na rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon na ral gri thogs pa tsan du
<p>95a.5</p>ka la zhon pa'o/ /rdo rje dga' mo ni rnam par rgyal ba dang 'dra'o/ /pho nya rdo rje tho ba ni mdog ser po lag pa g.yas na rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon na gtun thogs pa/ me tog can gyi dri la zhon pa'o/ /rdo rje pho nya mo ni rdo rje tho ba dang 'dra ba las khyad par ni 'di yod de/ 'di ltar lag pa
<p>95a.6</p>g.yon na kha T+wAM ga thogs pa'o/ /pho nya mo rdo rje rlung ni mdog sngon po/ lag pa g.yas na rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon na ba dan thogs pa ri dwags la zhon pa'o/ /pho nya rdo rje ma ni mdog dmar po lag pa g.yas gnyis na rdo rje dang dgang gzar thogs pa/ g.yon gnyis na dbyug pa dang
<p>95a.7</p>spyi blugs thogs pa/ 'od zer gyen du 'bar ba 'bar ba'i rtse gsum pa/ ra skyes la zhon pa/ rdo rje 'bar ba mo ni pho nya rdo rje 'bar ba dang 'dra'o/ /mgyogs ma rdo rje ma ni pho nya rdo rje rlung dang 'dra'o/ /pho nya rdo rje 'jigs pa ni mdog sngon po/ lag pa g.yas na rdo rje g.yon na dbyig pa
<p>95b</p>
<p>95b.1</p>thogs pa mi ro la zhon pa'o/ /pho nya mo rdo rje 'khyor ma ni rdo rje 'jigs pa dang 'dra ba las/ khyad par ni lag pa g.yon na zhags pa thogs pa'o/ /bran mo rdo rje lcags kyu ni/ mdog sngon po/ lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon na lcags kyu thogs pa klu'i rgyal po
<p>95b.2</p>she sha la zhon pa'o/ /bran mo rdo rje kha ni mdog sngon mo/ phag gi mgo can lag pa g.yas na rdo rje/ g.yon na ral gri thogs pa mi la zhon pa'o/ /bran mo rdo rje dus ni mdog nag po lag pa g.yas na rdo rje/ g.yon na gshin rje'i dbyug pa thogs pa/ ma he la zhon
<p>95b.3</p>pa'o/ /bran mo rdo rje dus ma ni mdog nag mo/ lag pa g.yas na rdo rje g.yon na kha T+wAM ga thogs pa ro langs la zhon pa'o/ /bran rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo ni mdog dkar po glang po'i mdog can/ lag pa g.yas gnyis na rdo rje dang dgra sta thogs pa/ g.yon gnyis
<p>95b.4</p>nam dung rtse gsum pa dang so thogs pa/ lug thug la zhon pa'o/ /pho nya mo rdul ma ni mdog sngon mo/ lag pa g.yas na rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon na sen ma dza ka ni ka thogs pa/ byi ba la zhon pa'o/ /bran rdo rje glu ma ni mdog dkar po lag pa g.yas na rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon na
<p>95b.5</p>rdo rje zhags pa thogs pa/ gdengs ka brgyad yod pa/ chu srin la zhon pa'o/ /bran mo chu srin ma ni mdog dkar po/ lag pa g.yas na rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon na rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin thogs pa/ chu srin la zhon pa'o/ /'jigs ma mdog ljang gu lag pa g.yas na rdo rje
<p>95b.6</p>thogs pa/ g.yon na ral gri dang phub thogs pa'o/ /dpal mo mdog ser mo lag pa g.yas na rdo rje/ g.yon na pad+ma thogs pa'o/ /dbyangs can ma mdog dmar mo/ /lag pa g.yas na rdo rje/ g.yon na pi wang thogs pa'o/ /dka' thub bzlog pa mdog ljang gu/ lag
<p>95b.7</p>pa g.yas gnyis na rdo rje dang 'khor lo thogs pa/ g.yon gnyis na pa ti sa dang ral gri thogs pa ma mo thams cad dang / drag po la sogs pa nas chu lha'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi lag pa g.yas na rdo rje thogs pa gang yin pa de rtse gsum pa yin pa shes par bya'o/ /'jig rten
<p>96a</p>
<p>96a.1</p>dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mngon sum du phyogs par bri'o/ /de nas dgongs ka'i dus la babs pa na/ rdo rje ti rIn+ti ri'i phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la/ yi ge hU~M bzhi zlos shing dkyil 'khor du 'jug
<p>96a.2</p>par byas la/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lhag pa dang / mtshang ba nye bar zhi ba'i phyir bltas la/ rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phreng ba 'di phul te/ rdo rje'i gar byas la blangs la yi ge hU~M bzhis
<p>96a.3</p>rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o/ /de yang / rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas/ /mkhas pas mtshang yongs su bskang / /lhag pa gang yin 'dor mdzad pa/ /'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam
<p>96a.4</p>gzhag pas/ /rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po/ /yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya/ /oM badzrod g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha hU~M/ 'di'i phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje mdzub mo yang dag par/ /sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su/ /rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni/ /sgo 'byed pa yi mchog yin no/ /de nas
<p>96a.5</p>rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bya'o/ /de nas rin po che sna bdun nam/ sa las byas pa'i bum pa rtsa ba mi gnag pa/ gsus pa che ba/ mgrin pa ring ba/ mchu 'phyang ba/ chu bzang po dang / rin po che dang / sman dang / 'bru thams cad kyis yongs su dgang zhing / 'bras
<p>96a.6</p>bu dang bcas shing lo ma dang bcas pa'i ldum bus kha brgyan pa/ mgrin pa ras dkar pos bcings nas srung ba byas la phyi rol kun du dri zhim pos byugs te/ steng du rdo rjes mtshan pa'i me tog gi phreng ba dang / rdo rje chen pos byin gyis brlab par bya zhing / khro bo ti rIn+ti ris yongs
<p>96a.7</p>su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang / me tog gi lcug ma las/ oM badzrod ka hUM/ zhes bya ba 'dis lan stod rtsa brgyad bzlas pa dang / hU~M bzhi pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi spyan sngar legs par gzhag go/ /bum pa gnyis pa
<p>96b</p>
<p>96b.1</p>la hUM bzhi lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ 'jug pa'i sgor mngon par phyogs par gzhag go/ /chu des bdag nyid dang slob ma dbang bskur bar bya ba'am/ 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /byi ru dang ni sa le sbram/ /dung dang mu tig nor bu dang / /rin chen kun zhes bya ba
<p>96b.2</p>la/ lnga po 'di dag shes par bya/ /sing ha byA g+h+ri ki ri kar+Ni/ ha sa sa ha de ba ste/ /sman rnams kun zhes bya ba la/ /lnga po 'di dag shes par bya/ /'bras kyi so ba mon sran gre'u/ /nas dang gro dang til dag ste/ /'bru rnams kun zhes bya ba la/ /lnga po 'di dag shes par
<p>96b.3</p>bya/ /de'i rjes la phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas/ sdom pa gzung bar byas nas ras sngon po la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas te/ sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi gtsug tor bcing ba dang / gdong g.yogs byas la/ rdo rje go chas stod g.yogs dang / gtsug
<p>96b.4</p>tor la brtsegs pa bgos nas/ slob dpon khro bo ti rIn+ti ris me tog gi phreng ba sngon po bzung la/ oM badzra sa ma ya pra be sha mi zhes zlos shing zhugs la/ bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ zhes bya ba la sogs
<p>96b.5</p>pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la bdag nyid la dbab par byas nas/ me tog de dkyil 'khor chen por dor la rang gi mgo la bcings nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te/ dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bltas nas/ 
<p>96b.6</p>tiSh+Tha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol bar byas la/ chu'i dbang bskur ba dang / sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang / dar dpyangs dang / rdo rje phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i bdag po dang / rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas
<p>96b.7</p>te/ bcom ldan 'das las de blangs nas/ /de kho na nyid dang / chos dang dam tshig dang / rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang blangs nas me tog la sogs pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa lngas rjes su gnang ba dang / hU~M bzhi pa dang
<p>97a</p>
<p>97a.1</p>gzengs bstod pa dang / lung bstan pa yang blangs la/ yang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhin du bzlas pa byas nas bdag gi hU~M mdzad rdo rje'o zhes rang gi ming nas brjod pa byas la/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya
<p>97a.2</p>chen po bcings te/ de'i sngags a zhes bya ba'i mtha' dang bcas pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab par bya'o/ /badzra haM zhes rdo rje'i nga rgyal du rnam par bsgoms la/ rdo rje de badzra d+ha tu ra haM zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad du bsgom par
<p>97a.3</p>bya'o/ /de bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ byang phyogs kyi sgor/ de'i sngags a zhes bya ba'i mtha' dang bcas pas rdo rje dril bur bdag nyid dbab par byas la/ badzra g+haN+De ho zhes nga rgyal bskyed nas/ de badzra A be sha kro d+ha haM zhes khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa bsgom
<p>97a.4</p>par bya ste/ de ltar na rdo rje bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni/ /se gol mang po brdab bgyis la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi/ /oM badzra sa ma ya dzaHdzaHhU~M baM hoHzhes lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje khro
<p>97a.5</p>bo yi/ /phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing / /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi'o/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas rang rang gi sgo nas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la/ hU~M bzhi pas mchod yon phul la/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
<p>97a.6</p>bzlas nas bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya ste/ rang gi sngags brjod la/ dr-i sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoH sa ma ya s+t+waM/ A ha zhes brjod do/ /de nas rang gi sngags dang snying po brjod par bya ste/ de ltar na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
<p>97a.7</p>dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams bshad de/ rdo rje gnyis las byung ba ni/ /dam tshig mchog tu grags pa yin/ /de dag bcing ba bshad bya ba/ /khro bo bcing ba bla na med/ /lag ngar rdo rjer byas nas su/ /mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcing bar bya/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni/ /'jig
<p>97b</p>
<p>97b.1</p>rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya/ /de bzhin mdzub mo ngos sbyar te/ /nor bu 'dra bar rab tu dgug /gung mo mnyam bsgreng pad+mar bya/ /gung mo mdzub mo gnyis kas bsdigs/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka rdo rjer bya/ /g.yas pa lcags kyu dgug par bya/ /de nyid hU~M zhes bya bar
<p>97b.2</p>'dud/ /legs pa sbyin pa de bzhin te/ /mdzub gnyis dpral ba'i gnyer mar gzhag /snying gar mdzub mos nyi mar bskor/ /lag pa brkyang ste spyi bor gzhag /mdzub mo kha nas dgod ltar byas/ /mdzub mo'i sen mo sbyar bar bya/ /g.yas pas ral gri bcings pa'o/ /gung
<p>97b.3</p>mdzub mnyam bsgreng 'khor lo yi/ /kha yi nang nas dbyung ba dang / /mdzub mo gung mor rdo rjer bya/ /mdzub mo yis ni mgul bar bskor/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni mche ba che/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni rdo rjer bcings/ /sgeg mo la sogs pa'i ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa nyid la hU~M zhes bya
<p>97b.4</p>bas rdo rje bsdams pa de ji lta ba bzhin du bcings so/ /snying gar mthe bo bsnyams la gzhag /rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba'o/ /thal mo sbyar te kha nas byung / /gar las thal sbyar spyi bor gzhag /rdo rje bcings pa thur du blugs/ /rang gi thal sbyar gyen du gtor/ /mthe bong mnyam
<p>97b.5</p>ste rab tu bsdams/ /rab tu brkyang ste byug pa'o/ /mdzub mo gcig po dgug pa'o/ /mthe bo gnyis ni mdud pa dor/ /mthe bo mdzub mo gdu bur bcing / /rdo rje khu tshur mdzub mo bsdams/ /thugs kar yi ge hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsams la/ yi ge hU~M nyid
<p>97b.6</p>zlos shing phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya'i nges pa bshad de/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang / rin chen hUM mdzad dang / chos kyi hU~M mdzad dang / las kyi hU~M mdzad kyi gnas nyid do/ /de nas rin chen hU~M mdzad
<p>97b.7</p>la sogs pa'i sngags bshad de/ oM badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha na ya sarba rat+na ma hrIHphaT/ oM badzra dr-iSh+TI kro d+ha dri shu mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra bi shwa kro d+ha ku ru sarba bi shwa rU pa tra ya sa da ya hU~M phaT/ 'di'i phyag rgya ni sems ma rdo rje ma nas brtsams te blta bar bya'o/ /de yang / rig pa dam pa thams
<p>98a</p>
<p>98a.1</p>cad kyi/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad/ /ces bshad pa yin no/ /rdo rje de dang hU~M mdzad kyis phyag rgya'i tshogs bsdus pa ni/ 'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M mdzad yin par bshad kyi/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad gzhan du gyur pa ni mi rigs te/ rgyud
<p>98a.2</p>thams cad las khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba nyid rdo rje hU~M mdzad yin par bstan to/ /de'i rjes la de bzhin du ljags la rdo rje bkod de/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi yi ge dgod par bya'o/ /de ni 'di yin te/ hU~M ni rdo rje sems dpa'
<p>98a.3</p>'o/ /trAM ni rin chen sems ma'i 'o/ /hrIHni chos kyi sems ma'i 'o/ /a ni las kyi sems ma'i 'o/ /hU~M badzra satwa badzri/ trAM rat+na badzri hrIH/ d+harmA badzri/ a karma badzri hU~M he traM ta/ hi hi de ha d+hika/ /d+hi hU~M/ graM kri/ baM dri aHzhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'o/ /ma hA ra he hU~M/ rU pa shwo
<p>98a.4</p>b+he hU~M/ shro tra sau khye hU~M/ sarba pU dze hU~M/ pra h+la da ni hUM/ pha la ga me hUM/ su ti dzA tri hU~M/ su gan+d+ha ki hU~M/ a ya hi dza hU~M/ a hi hU~M hU~M hUM he s+pho Ta baM hUM/ g+haN+Da a a hU~M zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa nas/ rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi yin no/ /de'i rjes la yi ge a las thugs kar sna tshogs
<p>98a.5</p>rdo rje bskyed la las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /de ni 'di yin te/ khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis byas la/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni/ /g.yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'di/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o/ /bsgying bcas bsor bas gnyis ga
<p>98a.6</p>yis/ /zhes pa ni rin chen hU~M mdzad dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sems ma rdo rje ma'i'o/ /lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang / /mda' 'phang ba yi tshul dang ni/ /legs so zhes pa snying gar bshad/ /dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis/ /zhes bya ba ni rin chen hU~M mdzad dang / 
<p>98a.7</p>khro bo rdo rje khro gnyer can dang / rin chen sems ma'i'o/ /snying gar nyi ma brtan par bya/ /g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs/ /de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya/ /g.yas pa yi ni g.yon pa dbye/ /zhes bya ba ni chos kyi hU~M mdzad dang / rdo rje chos dang / chos kyi sems ma'o/ /
<p>98b</p>
<p>98b.1</p>snying gar g.yon pa ral gri mdung / /mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung / /rdo rje gar bskor dgrol ba yis/ /thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag /ces bya ba ni las kyi hU~M mdzad dang / rdo rje las dang / las kyi sems ma'o/ /go cha mthe
<p>98b.2</p>chung mche ba mchog /khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o/ /rdo rje bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis su/ /bsam pa g.yos pas sdud par bya'o/ /phreng ba bcings pa kha nas dbyung / /gar las thal sbyar spyi bor bzhag /thur du blugs dang gyen du gtor/ /mthe bong mnyam
<p>98b.3</p>te rab tu bsdams/ /rab tu brkyang nas byug pa ni/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bstan/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni/ /mthe chung las te lcags kyu che/ /mchod pa'i mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub/ /rgyab gnyis kyang ni mnyam ste mnan/ /sgo srung gi ni phyag rgya
<p>98b.4</p>kun/ /las kyi phyag rgya gar las byung / /de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni ji ltar bris pa'i rjes su 'brangs te bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi khro bo rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni
<p>98b.5</p>sems ma rdo rje dang / rin chen ma dang / chos ma dang / rdo rje las ma yang yin pa las 'di rnams ni rdo rje'i nang du chud pa'i lha mo'i gzugs 'dzin ma yin/ /bdag nyid chen po gang gang gis/ /phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa/ /bzlas pa'i snying po'i don du ni/ /der
<p>98b.6</p>ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi dam tshig go/ /g.yon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bkan la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang / mthe bo gnyis kyi mthe'u chung nas brtsams te/ phye nas thal mo khang stong du bya ba 'di ni
<p>98b.7</p>byams pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste/ 'di rnams kyi rig pa yang sngar bshad pa yin no/ /rig pa de nyid de rnams kyi ljags la bkod pa 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /yi ge a las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la bris pa dang / rjes su mthun
<p>99a</p>
<p>99a.1</p>par de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing ba ni las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la bris pa dang rjes su mthun pa kho nar de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o/ /rig pa de nyid kyang spyi yin no/ /mthe bos
<p>99a.2</p>mthe'u chung bcings nas ni/ g.yon pa sor mo dbus ma gsum/ /rtse gsum pa yi dbus ma rtse/ /rdo rje phyag rgyar bzung ba ste/ /rdo rje rig pa dam pa ste/ /rdo rje mthu zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas rab tu bshad pa ni/ /rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs btags/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas
<p>99a.3</p>te/ /g.yon pa rdo rje bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad de/ /rdo rje rigs ni kun gyi 'di'o/ /rdo rje de ni gnyis byas te/ mtshan ma kun ni nges gzhag go/ /rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya rnams kyang 'byung ba de/ /mdun du brkyang ste bzhag pa dang / /
<p>99a.4</p>mdzub mo mtheb bstan bcas pa dang / /oM zhes bya ba spyi bor sbyar/ /rdo rje steng du bzhag pa'o/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs rnams so/ /rab tu brkyang nas lag gnas pa/ /lag pa'i rgyab tu de bzhin te/ /khu tshur brkyang la lag ngar bskum/ /kha
<p>99a.5</p>phyogs su ni bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /g.yon pa'i mthe bo'i steng du gzhag /phreng ba bcings pa'i thabs su sbyar/ /nor sbyin par ni g.yas pa ste/ /ral gri phyag rgya khu tshur gcig /tshogs kyi bdag po chen po'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /g.yas
<p>99a.6</p>pa mdun du mdung ring 'dzin/ /lag pa brkyang pa'ang de bzhin te/ /g.yas pa 'od ni 'bar ba bstan/ /rdo rje khu tshur bskyod pa'o/ /pho nya'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so/ /bsgyings bcas mdzub mo khar mche ba/ /dbyug pa bsnun cing mnan pa dang / /dpung pa
<p>99a.7</p>bskum zhing bcar ba dang / /g.yas pa g.yon gyi 'dren pa'o/ /bran gyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so/ /de nas u ma la sogs pa'i ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya bshad par bya ste/ g.yon pa rdo rje mdzub bcings pas/ /rtse gsum mtshan ma mnan par bya/ /'di
<p>99b</p>
<p>99b.1</p>bcings pas ni yang dag par/ /rig pa dam pa rang 'grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyi/ /g.yon pa rdo rje gtso bor 'dus/ /dam tshig go na ji bzhin par/ /phyag rgya bcing bar bshad par bya/ /thams cad 'khor lo sor rtse gsum/ /dril bu'i phyag rgya de bzhin
<p>99b.2</p>no/ /de bzhin oM gyi phyag rgya dang / /seng ge'i rnam par yongs su bzung / /rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya rnams so/ /'bar ba kun du 'dzin pa dang / /'di ni yang dag 'dus pa nyid/ /dbyig pa'i khu tshur 'dzin pa dang / /kha 'gram phyag rgya bskor ba'o/ /khro bo'i
<p>99b.3</p>dam tshig rnams so/ /btud pa'i phyag rgya dang phrad pa/ /rdo rjes mnan nas btud pa ste/ /spyi bor gzhag pa tshogs kyi ste/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni bsrung ba'o/ /tshogs rnams kyi ni dam tshig go/ /lag pa bskum pa khar bzhag ste/ /rgyab tu yang ni bskor bar bya/ /
<p>99b.4</p>'bar dang me stag stong pa ste/ /de nas khar yang gnas par bya/ /pho nya mo'i dam tshig rnams so/ /mtha' ma gnyis ni khar bcug dang / /gcod cing rab tu gnon pa'o/ /dpung pa bsnol bas bsnol ba dang / /myur du phyogs pa'ang de bzhin no/ /bran mo rnams kyi
<p>99b.5</p>dam tshig go/ /de nas lha chen po la sogs pa'i lce la de'i sngags dgod pa 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /yi ge a las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje de bzhin du bskyed la/ de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing ba ni/ las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi snying gar
<p>99b.6</p>rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms la/ phyag rgya chen po bris pa dang rjes su mthun par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / bskal pa bzang po rnams dang / phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /dpal hU~M mdzad
<p>99b.7</p>la sogs pa ni sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang / rdo rje phreng ba dang / dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod yon phul la mchod pa bya ste/ de la re zhig rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyu las byas pa'i bum pa sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/ 
<p>100a</p>
<p>100a.1</p>rdo rje la sogs pa rang rang gi mtshan ma can la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang gi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa dang bum pa gang ba rnams phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dbul bar bya'o/ /ras zung 'bum mam/ khri 'am/ brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ re re zhing
<p>100a.2</p>ngam/ thams cad la spyir zung gcig dbul ba'am/ bla re rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / grwa bzhir ba dan sna tshogs btags pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyang oM dang rdo rje hUM mdzad yongs su bzlas shing badzra s+phar Na khaM zhes bya ba 'dis lha thams
<p>100a.3</p>cad la dbul bar bya'o/ /me tog gi shing brgya'am/ stong ngam/ bzhi'am/ shing dang me tog thams cad kyang rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang / oM badzra puSh+pe hU~M zhes bya ba me tog gi phyag rgya dang bcas pas me tog la mngon par bzlas pa dang / byug pa ni dri zhim zhing
<p>100a.4</p>dri bzang pos bsgos pa'i dri bzang po thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/ /rdo rje me dang / oM badzra gan+d+he zhes bya ba 'di'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang / ga bur dang / a ga ru dang / tu ru ska dang / tsan+dan la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba la/ rdo rje me dang / oM badzra d+hU pe hUM zhes bya ba
<p>100a.5</p>'dis bdug spos kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas/ spos snod 'bum mam/ khri'am/ stong ngam/ brgya'am/ ci 'byor pa rnams dang / mar me 'bum mam/ khri'am stong ngam/ brgya'am/ de bzhin du mar me'i snod chen po sdong bu 'bar ba dang bcas pa stong ngam/ brgya'am/ 
<p>100a.6</p>bcu 'am gcig la rdo rje me dang oM badzra A lo ke/ zhes bya ba 'di mar me'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas yongs su bzlas la/ badzra s+phar Na khaM zhes zlos shing dbul bar bya'o/ /swe b+hi ka la sogs pa lha bshos kyi zhal zas 'bum mam/ khri'am stong ngam/ brgya'am/ grangs bcu snyed
<p>100a.7</p>dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa la de bzhin du rdo rje me yongs su bzlas la/ a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nut+pa natwA ta ces zlos shing dbul bar bya'o/ /rol mo'i cha byad bcu po'am/ stong phrag brgya 'am stong ngam/ rol mo'i cha byad bcu po hUM zhes bya ba
<p>100b</p>
<p>100b.1</p>dang / rol mo'i phyag rgya rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi sor mo rnams kyis de'i tshul du byed pas dbul bar bya'o/ /rol mo'i cha byad bcu bo ni pi wang gling bu dang / mu ra dza dang / mu kun da dang / ka na sam dang / ma rI dang / mr-i tang ga dang / pa Ta ha dang / kuny+dza dang / ti mi li brdung ba'i
<p>100b.2</p>tshul du byed pa'o/ /phyi rol du gar dang rol mo bya ba dang / cod pan dang gdu bu dang / rna rgyan la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang / oM zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas te dbul bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du dar dpyangs par bya ba dang / me tog chun 'phyang gi rnam par
<p>100b.3</p>brgyan pa dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa dang / rta dang glang po che dang / ba lang gi khyu shin tu btags pa rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o/ /rta babs yid du 'ong ba dril bu la sogs pa btags pa yang badzra s+pha ra Na khaM zhes bya ba 'dis 'bul
<p>100b.4</p>lo/ /oM badzra satwa su saM gra ha ta/ badzra rat+na ma nut+ta raM/ badzra d+harma ga ya ne/ badzra karma ka rot+b+ha be/ zhes zlos shing gar byas la/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis ma gtogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad
<p>100b.5</p>mchod par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /yang rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcu drug gis yang dag par mchod la/ khro bo'i rigs thams cad
<p>100b.6</p>la dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzod cig ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la/ phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/ 'bras yos bya zhing til dang bcas/ /'bras
<p>100b.7</p>chen me tog chu dang bcas/ /sran chan bcas shing mang du bya/ /snum khur la sogs bza' ba rnams/ /zhes bya ba'i gtor ma la a kA ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzlas nas/ shar phyogs nas brtsams te gsum gsum gtor bar bya zhing dri dang me tog dang / 
<p>101a</p>
<p>101a.1</p>bdug pa dang / mar me dang / mchod yon rnams kyang thog ma dang tha mar 'bul lo/ /de la dang por re zhig maN+Dal rnams byed du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas ni spyan drang ngo / /de nas dam tshig bstan la mchod yon phul te/ dri la sogs pas legs
<p>101a.2</p>par mchod la gtor ma phul te de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin te/ shar phyogs su kha bltas te/ rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug nas/ lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan la/ g.yas
<p>101a.3</p>pa'i rdo rje phyag rgya sta zur phyogs su bzhag ste/ g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar spyan drangs pa ni brgya byin gyi spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de la mdzub mo lcags kyur ma byas pa ni brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /rkang pa g.yon brkyang pa'i tshul gyis 'dug la/ 
<p>101a.4</p>spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas 'di'i sngags na mo badzra s+ya tsa di shi di shi badzra pa Ne rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ me'i phyogs su bltas nas lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum por bkug ste/ gung mo'i tshigs gsum par btsugs
<p>101a.5</p>la/ mthe bo lag mthil du bzhag pa ni me lha spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bo ngos la mdzub mo btsugs pa ni me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo mthe bo'i ngos la btsugs te phyir drag tu brkyang ba ni slar btang
<p>101a.6</p>ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni ag+na ye hUM e h+ya kA ba li dz+wa la dz+wa la dA ha shi khi to li pi rU pak+Sha swA hA/ gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas nas snyim pa mdun du bzhag ste/ sor mo phan tshun bsnol la khu tshur bcangs nas srin lag gnyis bsgrengs te/ gshibs la g.yab ste
<p>101a.7</p>nang du bzhag pa ni gshin rje spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /srin lag gnyis ka yang phyi rol tu de bzhin du gshibs te bsgreng ba snying gar bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las srin lag sbyar ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni ya mA ya swA hA/ bden
<p>101b</p>
<p>101b.1</p>bral gyi phyogs su rkang pa mnyam pas 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo dang gung mo ral gri 'dra bar gshibs te bsgreng la bzhag /lag pa g.yon pa de ltar byas te/ sta zur phyogs su bzhag la/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste g.yab
<p>101b.2</p>pa ni bden bral spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa g.yon pa sta zur phyogs su ral gri 'dra bar bzhag pa ni bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni sarba b+hu ta ba yaM ka
<p>101b.3</p>ra ku ru ku ru swA hA/ chu lha'i phyogs su rkang pa mnyam pas 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la/ mthe bo dang mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar te/ zhags mig ltar byas la g.yon pa'i khu tshur yang de ltar byas te/ snying gar bzhag la g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur
<p>101b.4</p>byas pa ni chu lha spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyi tshul du bzhag pa las zhags mig ltar byas pa ni chu lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni oM trIng tI
<p>101b.5</p>bu tra trI trI shi khi ti/ li pi rU pa k+Sha swA hA/ rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug la/ lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs dang por mdzub mo bkug pa'i thor to btsugs la/ lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du byas te/ sta zur logs su
<p>101b.6</p>bzhag cing mthe bong bsgul ba ni rlung lha spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni oM swa sa kha kha mu kha swA hA/ 
<p>101b.7</p>ku be ra la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la rdo rje bcing ba nang du bzlog ste/ mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs la brkyang de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor gnas nas/ gung mo gnyis rdo rje ltar bkug ste g.yab pa ni ku be ra spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /
<p>102a</p>
<p>102a.1</p>phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du bzhag pa ni ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang pa ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni oM ku be rA ya swA hA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su
<p>102a.2</p>bltas te 'dug la lag pa gcig tu thal mo sbyar ba byas la/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang du bkug ste bsnol la/ gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab logs su mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra ba bya/ mthe bo gnyis rab tu gshibs te bzhag la/ de gnyis
<p>102a.3</p>las mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse sprad nas nang du g.yab pa ni dbang ldan spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las snga ma ltar mdzub mo rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag pa ni dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i
<p>102a.4</p>phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni dzruM dzruM shi ba dzruM swA hA/ g.yon pa brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la/ lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la/ steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus ni/ tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang bar bya'o/ /de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis snga
<p>102a.5</p>ma ltar bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni 'di yin te/ ur+d+haM brah+ma Ne swA hA/ sU r+ya gra ha a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ tsan+d+ra ya na k+Sha tra a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ rkang pa mnyam par gnas
<p>102a.6</p>pas 'dug la/ lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te/ sor mo rnams mtshams med par rtse mo phan tshun sbyar/ mthe bo zlum por byas la/ 'og tu bltas te sa'i lha la sogs pa mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni 'og gi lha spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /spyan
<p>102a.7</p>drangs pa'i phyag rgya las snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis btang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni a d+ho pri thi b+h+yaHswA hA a su re b+h+yaHswA hA/ na ge b+h+yaHswA hA/ de nas rang gi sngags de nyid kyis thams cad la
<p>102b</p>
<p>102b.1</p>'thor 'thung phul ba bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su bcas pa la bgegs med par mdzod cig /las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la stsol cig /ces brjod la thams cad slar btang ngo / /yang na dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa
<p>102b.2</p>rnams kyis gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po/ /dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang / /gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bu smad tshogs bcas g.yog 'khor
<p>102b.3</p>dang bcas la/ /bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs kyis/ /gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir byon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang / /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang / /shar nub ri dang
<p>102b.4</p>nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang / /ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang / /chu bo kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang / /rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang / /mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka chu ngogs dang / /g.ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang / /grong dang phyugs lhas grong
<p>102b.5</p>khyer stong pa dang / /khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang / /gtsug lag khang ngam grong khyer gnas dag gam/ /dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni/ /rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang / /lam srang bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang / /gang dag lam chen dang ni
<p>102b.6</p>shing gcig dang / /dur khrod chen po'am nags tshal chen po'am/ /seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas dag dang / /'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang / /gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang / /lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams/ /rab tu dgyes
<p>102b.7</p>shing mgu bar gyur nas su/ /phreng ba me tog dri dang byug pa rnams/ /bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus 'bul bas/ /'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams nas su/ /las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas ni/ /de nas
<p>103a</p>
<p>103a.1</p>phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /shar phyogs rdo rje can de lha tshogs bcas/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag /chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po ste/ /dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i
<p>103a.2</p>bdag po dang / /steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang / /lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang / /ri yi lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams la/ /so so so sor gtor ma phul ba rnams/ /rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas kyang / /rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas
<p>103a.3</p>su/ /rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang / /nang mi dmag dang dpung dang thabs cig tu/ /me tog dri dang byug pa gtor mar bcas/ /'di rnams btung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang / /bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de la 'di ni phyi dang
<p>103a.4</p>nang du bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin pa'i sngags so/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM A d+ya nut+pan natwa ta/ de nas nye reg byas la shar phyogs kyi sgo la mngon par bltas te/ gnas pa'i las thams cad pa'i thab khung gi dbus su dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil
<p>103a.5</p>'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi sngags zlos shing me tog gis bzhugs su gsol la/ sbyin sreg gi cho gas dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sngags kyis pa'i mar las sbyin blugs brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo/ /dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags kyis kyang khro bo rdo rje 'bebs
<p>103a.6</p>pa'i mthar thugs pa'i bar yang sreg blugs bdun bdun dbul lo/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa me thab las me tog gis spyan drangs te rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bris pa'i dkyil 'khor du rang rang gi gnas su bzhugs su gsol bar
<p>103a.7</p>bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir
<p>103b</p>
<p>103b.1</p>zhugs pa la snod du gyur pa dang / ma gyur pa brtag mi 'tshal lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa yang mchis te/ de dag gis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs te mthong na ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur
<p>103b.2</p>ro/ /bcom ldan 'das nor dang bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la sogs pa dang / dam tshig la mi dga' ba dang / sngar spyad pa la sogs mi nus pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du
<p>103b.3</p>bgyid cing zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dang / glu dang gad mo dang / rtsed mo dang / kha zas dang / spyod pa la dga' ba rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po
<p>103b.4</p>mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid khong du chud pas lha gzhan gyi rigs dang dkyil 'khor du 'jug gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor re ba thams cad yang dag par 'gyur ba bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs par 'gyur ba der ni bslab pa'i
<p>103b.5</p>tshig gis 'jigs shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug par kha bltas shing gnas pa rnams kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba'i dam pa 'grub cing / bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang / ngan
<p>103b.6</p>song gi rgyud thams cad du kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du/ rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug tu rung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das chos can gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes
<p>103b.7</p>rab dam pa 'grub pa'i thabs kyis 'bad cing / nyon mongs pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang 'grub par dka' ba ma lags na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes zhu bar
<p>104a</p>
<p>104a.1</p>bya'o/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su gzung ba'i dge bsnyen nam/ dge sbyong ngam dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su blangs la/ slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pas slob dpon gyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas
<p>104a.2</p>te/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang stsal du gsol/ /
<p>104a.3</p>de nas slob ma la rdo rje srung ba yongs su bzlas pa'i ras sngon po'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs bskon zhing / rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sgo srung bzhi bzlas pa'i gdong g.yogs bcings la/ phyag bzhi byed du gzhug par bya'o/ /yang lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob
<p>104a.4</p>mas/ slob dpon la phyag byas la/ lag na me tog thogs pa nyid dang / bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba yang byas nas/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol/ /thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa/ /sangs
<p>104a.5</p>rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba'i/ /mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor par ldan/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi/ /gsang
<p>104a.6</p>ba'i rigs mtho thams cad du/ /slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod/ /mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba/ /skal ba chen po bdag la stsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing / /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas kun ni yid 'ong ba/ /slob dpon
<p>104a.7</p>chen po bdag la stsol/ /dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che/ /sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /de nas slob dpon gyis rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni/ byang chub
<p>104b</p>
<p>104b.1</p>sems ni yongs 'dzin cing / /dam tshig sdom dang gsang ba yi/ /'khor lo 'dir yang 'jug par 'tshal/ /de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod
<p>104b.2</p>dam/ /des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song / /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis/ /
<p>104b.3</p>byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po dang / /nyin dang
<p>104b.4</p>mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bya/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'o/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /las kyi rigs
