<p>124b.7</p>gshegs te/ /dbang bcas lhas bskor ba yi bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /lo ma me tog 'od 'bar lum+bi'i tshal/ /lha mo dag gis brten par mgon po bltams pa na/ /srid pa mthar phyin pa yi bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni
<p>125a</p>
<p>125a.1</p>skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du/ /lhums na bltams pa ston pa bde gshegs zas gtsang sras/ /myur bskrun bdud rtsi'i chus gtor ba yi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer dam pa
<p>125a.2</p>ser skya'i gnas zhes bya bar ni/ /rmad du grags pa che ba lha yis mngon bstod pa/ /bsam yas dge bsgrubs bsod nams phung po'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /dgyes shing nam phyed grong khyer mchog nas mngon byung ste/ /dka' thub tshal du mngon par
<p>125a.3</p>gshegs shing tshangs la sogs/ /lha yi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /bai DUr+ya ltar sngo ba'i rtswa bting steng bzhugs te/ /skyil mo krung bcas mi g.yo mchog gi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la
<p>125a.4</p>zhi byed shog /chu bo'i 'gram na rtswa sha'i phreng gis yongs bskor ba/ /shin tu rmad du byung ba srid pa sel mdzad pa/ /klu yi rgyal pos phyag byas pa yi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /shing rgyal drung gshegs byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi phyogs/ /
<p>125a.5</p>mang po btul tshe sa steng dang ni nam mkha' la/ /bcom ldan bkra shis rnam pa sna tshogs gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /sdug bsngal mtha' dag gzhig phyir rdo rje gdan bzhugs te/ nam gyi tho rangs bdud bzhi po dag rnams 'dul ba/ ston pa bde bar
<p>125a.6</p>gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer bA rA Na sIr grong khyer mchog zhugs nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo mchog bskor ba yi bkra shis gang / /lha yul dang 'dir shin tu rmad du byung 'gyur ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
<p>125a.7</p>shog /bkra shis gang zhig phan byed dam pa dag byed pas/ /bsod nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa/ /bcom ldan shAkya thub pa seng ges kun gsungs pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /mu stegs byed pa kun gyi nga rgyal gzhom pa dang / /'gro
<p>125b</p>
<p>125b.1</p>la bde ba bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa dag /nye bar ston pa rgyal ba'i bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /'gro la phan phyir mtho ris gnas nas 'dir gshegs te/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs lag na rnga yab gdugs/ /sna tshogs thogs
<p>125b.2</p>pas yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba mchog tu nyer gshegs pa/ /man+dA ra ba'i me tog mang pos mngon mchod pa/ /lha mchog rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis
<p>125b.3</p>des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas pa/ /nam mkha'i gnod sbyin dri za'i dbang pos mchod gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /de nas mtshan brgya rtsa
<p>125b.4</p>brgyad pas yang dag par bstod la/ dang por bum pa gang ba dang / rdo rje gzugs la sogs pa de dag dang / de nas bum pa de rnams kyis so/ /de'i 'og tu rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la/ de bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya zhing gzung du yang gzhug go/ /de nas phyag rgya'i
<p>125b.5</p>dbang bskur ba dang / cod pan dang / dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang / rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / ming gi dbang bskur ba yang byin la/ dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs yang sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa dang / rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag
<p>125b.6</p>rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis dum bu gnyis pa'i rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la/ chos dang de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig rnams sbyin par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du yang mchod pa bcu gnyis po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu
<p>125b.7</p>tshur gnyis las byung ba'o/ /rdo rje rigs las khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis las byung ba'o/ /pad+ma'i rigs las pad+ma'i khu tshur gnyis las byung ba'o/ /rin po che'i rigs las ni rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis las byung ba gzung bar bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'o/ 
<p>126a</p>
<p>126a.1</p>de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni dkar po'o/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor la ni sngon po'o/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la ni dmar po'o/ /rin po che'i dkyil 'khor la ni ser por shes par bya'o/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du cho ga rnams bzhin rjes su spyad la/ yi ge phras byin gyis brlabs
<p>126a.2</p>pa'i rin po che'i thur ma'am/ gser gyi thur ma blangs la/ slob ma'i mig gnyis su pra bkod de/ thur ma des de'i mig tu byugs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams
<p>126a.3</p>kyis bsal/ /oM badzra ni tra a pa ha ra pa Ta laM hrIH/ de nas me long la sogs la chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las byung ba ste/ /ngo bo nyid med gnas med par/ /
<p>126a.4</p>de ltar chos nyid shes nas su/ /sems can don ni bla med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye/ /de nas yi ge hos mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu byin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod la/ phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi phan du gzhug /steng du
<p>126a.5</p>yang 'phen du gzhug la/ oM badzra rA ga hoHzhes kyang smrar gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas a badzra satwa/ zhes pas me long bstan la/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid ni/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying la
<p>126a.6</p>zhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag gang / /byang chub sems 'dir shes par gyis/ /de nas badzra he tu maM/ zhes bya bas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis su dgod pa dang / badzra b+ha Sha raM zhes bya ba dang / dung lag pa g.yas par byin la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ de ring phan
<p>126a.7</p>chad 'jig rten la/ /skyob pa rnams ni 'khor lo bskor/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pas/ /kun du ma lus gang bar gyis/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing / /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs/ /de ltar byas na sangs
<p>126b</p>
<p>126b.1</p>rgyas la/ /phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang / /kun du khyod la srung bar byed/ /mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems
<p>126b.2</p>can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can
<p>126b.3</p>kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje
<p>126b.4</p>sems dpa' dang / rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / nam mkha' snying po'i nga rgyal dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis rjes su gnang ba byin la/ rang gi lha'i snying po sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /gzengs
<p>126b.5</p>bstod pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ slob ma thams cad la dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa gsum du grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro dag las bton/ /kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
<p>126b.6</p>pa sid+d+hi sa ma satwaM b+hur b+hu ba swaHde la gzengs bstod pa ni 'di yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ g.yon pa chos gos kyi mthar 'dzin pa'i tshul dang g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i tshul byas la/ cho ga lhag ma rnams ni dum bu gnyis pa las shes par bya'o/ /rjes
<p>126b.7</p>su bsgrub pa dang / rjes su bsgrub pa'i yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg bya ste/ slob ma bsang gtor byas la/ g.yon logs su bzhag ste/ de'i g.yas pa'i mthe bong lag pa g.yas pa g.yon pas bzung nas/ hU~M gis mar gyi sbyin sreg lan bdun byas la/ blugs gzar
<p>127a</p>
<p>127a.1</p>gyis slob ma la bskor ba bya ste/ de nyid kyis dgang blugs gsum dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas spyan gyi de bzhin du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas slob ma'i lag par rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i gdu bu btags la/ de nyid bzlas pa'i chus bsang gtor bya'o/ /oM ru ru spu
<p>127a.2</p>ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ zhes bya ba sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags dang / snying gar byugs te slob ma gtang bar bya ba ni/ slob ma'i thun mong gi cho ga'o/ /gang zhig slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba la ni de la dmigs te/ mar gyi sreg blugs brgya hU~M zhes bya ba dang sbyin sreg bya'o/ /
<p>127a.3</p>de nas sangs rgyas spyan gyi yang sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang zho dang bsres pa'i til gyis sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags nyid kyis dbul lo/ /de nas de bzhin du gdu bu btags la bsang gtor byas te/ snying gar byugs nas yang snga ma bzhin du thab kyi nang du dkyil 'khor bsams la/ 
<p>127a.4</p>dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams la sbyin sreg phul nas/ yang dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod nas/ mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de/ /phyi rol du gtor ma byin la nye reg bya ste/ phyag rgya dgrol ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i cho ga
<p>127a.5</p>rnams rjes su spyad nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du rang gi lus la sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bcug la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas ba nyid pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /shes
<p>127a.6</p>rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas/ rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas/ chos thams cad du ma nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa nyid pas/ las thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid do/ /sems can
<p>127a.7</p>chen po legs so legs/ /bde ba chen po legs so legs/ /theg pa chen po legs so legs/ /blo gros chen po legs so legs/ /cho ga 'di ni legs par smras//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pra tiSh+Tha bid+d+hiH/ bod skad du/ spyan dbye ba'i
<p>127b</p>
<p>127b.1</p>cho ga /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyes pa kun dang rnam bral zhing / /sems can kun la phan bzhed pas/ rtag tu dngos po kun bdag 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen por dbang bskur bas/ /rdo rje
<p>127b.2</p>'dzin pa chen por dbang bskur ba/ mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pas/ rigs lnga'i lha rnams rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /de la slob dpon gyi yon tan 'di dag yin te/ brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan/ /bzod ldan drang la g.yo sgyu med/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ dkyil
<p>127b.3</p>'khor 'dri ba'i las la mkhas/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs shes pa/ /'di ni slob dpon yin zhes bya/ /de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags rnams/ /'grub 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni ting 'dzin mchog /phyag rgya stang stabs gdan dang ni/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg de
<p>127b.4</p>bzhin mchod/ /las kyi sbyor ba nyer bsdu ba/ /de ltar de nyid bcu shes shing / /dman pa'i sems ni dor ba'o/ /de la dang por legs par khrus byas la/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gtsug tor bcings shing bcas la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par byas pa'am/ yang na cha lugs ji
<p>127b.5</p>lta bas lha'i khang par zhugs la/ yo byad thams cad bsogs te/ tshes grangs dang rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa'i dus shes par byas shing / dpal dang rgyal ba 'phel bar byed pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pas gnas brgyan par byas shing sbyin bdag dang
<p>127b.6</p>'tsham pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa yang brtag par bya'o/ /de nas ba'i rnam lnga dang / spos chab la rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pas gnas nye bar byug par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra yak+Sha hU~M de'i 'og tu dri dang sbyar ba'i chus byugs la/ nang par
<p>127b.7</p>gyi dus su rang gi rigs kyi lha'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i sbyor ba'am/ rnal 'byor chen po bya'o/ /cho ga nyams pa mi bya ste/ /rab gnas rtag tu smad pa dang / /tshe 'dir sdug bsngal chen po dang / /'jig rten gzhan du'ang 'jigs chen 'byung / /de la dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /bdag
<p>128a</p>
<p>128a.1</p>nyid kyis ni ci nus dang / /de bzhin cho gar gsungs tshul dang / /kun nas rab tu 'bad de bya/ /de la dang por rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs gzhom pa la sogs dang / gzhal yas khang dang / gdan la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas la/ 'di ltar yid du 'ong
<p>128a.2</p>ba'i gnas su khrus sa'i stegs bu brtsig par bya ba ni/ zur bzhi pa la gru bzhi pa/ /dkyil 'khor gyis ni nyer mdzes pa/ /khru gang tsam gyi tshad du bya'o/ /med na legs par bri bar bya/ /der phyogs dang mtshams su mtshan ma la sogs bris pa'i bum pa brgyad gzhag par bya
<p>128a.3</p>ste/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang / me tog la sogs pa phyogs dang mtshams su gzhag par bya zhing / dbus su rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rigs lnga'i mtshan mas mtshan pa bzhag la/ de dag gi nang du/ 'bru lnga dang / sman lnga dang / rin po che lnga bcug la/ dri dang sbyar ba'i chus
<p>128a.4</p>bkang la/ ras zung gcig gis mgul ba bcings la/ 'dab ma dri zhim pos kha brgyan par bya ba dang / steng du bla re bre ba dang / gos dang dril bu dbyangs pas bskor ba'i stegs bur mkhas pas lha rnams khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig sems dpa' bsams la/ 
<p>128a.5</p>ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyal sogs pa dang ldan pas dgug pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas oM AHhU~Mzhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum mam/ lha de'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnam par dgod cing bsam par bya'o/ /de nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la
<p>128a.6</p>sogs pa phul la/ sarba pA baM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa bya ste/ yungs kar dang me tog gis/ sems can kun la phan bde'i phyir/ /sbyar ba la sogs rnams bya zhing / /rgyal 'gyur bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod/ /yang dang yang du bstod bya zhing / /rol mo'i
<p>128a.7</p>sgra ni sna tshogs dang / /ngo mtshar ca co rnams kyang bya/ /las kun byed na rigs snying dang / /rang gis rigs bdag gsang sngags ni/ /yongs bzlas sngar bshad bum pas ni/ /mkhas pas lha rnams khrus gsol lo/ /de nas gtsang ma'i mi rnams ni/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang
<p>128b</p>
<p>128b.1</p>sngags kyis/ /bzlas byas stan ni bzang po la/ /rigs pa rang gnas bzhugs su gsol/ /de nas rigs kyi bdag po'i sngags dang / de bzhin du rigs kyi rig pa yongs su bzlas te bzhugs su gsol nas/ sngags pas kyang rang gi gsang sngags dang / bskyed pa'i rim pas de rang
<p>128b.2</p>gi gnas su sprul nas sgo dbye ba bya ste rdo rje bsdu ba bya'o/ /oM badzra sa mA ya dzaH dzaHhU~M baM hoHde nas bgegs bsal la mchod yon dbul lo/ /de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la/ phyag rgya bstan nas/ gsang sngags rnams mngon par bzlas par bya ste/ oM badzra satwa hU~M/ 
<p>128b.3</p>rigs kyi bdag po'i snying po'o/ /oM b+ha ga wa ti ru ru spu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ne swA hA zhes pa'o/ /rigs kyi yum gyi sngags so/ /oM dzi na dzika swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi snying po'o/ /de bzhin du/ oM shaM ka ri shIn+taM ka ri g+hu Ta ni/ g+ha Ta la g+ha Ta ya g+hu Ta ni swA hA/ 
<p>128b.4</p>oM badzra d+h+r-ika swA hA/ oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te swA hA/ ka TaM ka Te ka ro Te bIr+ye swA hA/ oM A ro l-i ka swA hA/ oM rat+na d+h+r-ika swA hA/ oM tA re tu re tut+tA re swA hA/ oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni rigs so so'i rig pa dang snying po'o/ /de nas cod pan dang dar dpyangs bcings pa dang / go
<p>128b.5</p>bskon pa la sogs pa byas la/ me tog la sogs pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod la yongs su bzlas te/ gus par byas la mchod yon phul te/ lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol gtor ma byin la sbyin sreg bya ste/ dang por bgegs gzhom par bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje
<p>128b.6</p>mes sbyin sreg bya'o/ /tshim par bya ba'i phyir ni rang gi sngags kyis so/ /dgod par bya ba'i phyir ni rigs kyi rigs pas so/ /'byor par bya ba'i don du ni rigs kyi bdag po'i snying pos so/ /de ltar sbyin sreg byas nas/ lhag par gnas par bya ba ni/ /'di zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan
<p>128b.7</p>'das/ /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rab gnas/ /mgon po bdag nyid bgyi par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa lags/ /de bas gnang bar mdzad par rigs/ /
<p>129a</p>
<p>129a.1</p>bdag ming rdo rje zhes bya bas/ /rig pa'i rgyal po 'di zhes bya'i/ /yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni/ /nang par rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs brtse bar ni nyer gnas te/ /tshogs pa thams cad rab gnas la/ /byin
<p>129a.2</p>gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas pU dza sna tshogs kyis mchod la mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos la/ gshegs su gsol bar bya ba'i phyir 'dis bskul bar bya'o/ /oM khyed kyis sems
<p>129a.3</p>can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su grub bzhin stsal lags kyis/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ /slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol/ /bdag nyid bsrung ba'i phyir yi ge brgya pa bzlas par bya'o/ /de la yi ge brgya ba ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu
<p>129a.4</p>pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa/ tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su poSh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM shre yaH ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga bAn sarba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsa badzrI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa aH/ de nas de nyid du ku sha bting
<p>129a.5</p>la nyal bar bya'o/ /de nas nang par mal nas langs la de bzhin du ba'i rnam lnga dang / spos chus gnas kun byugs la/ lha'i rnal 'byor byas la/ bgegs la sogs pa bskrad par bya'o/ /de nas gzhal yas khang dang gdan la sogs pa bsams la/ de'i 'og tu zangs ma'i snod la
<p>129a.6</p>sogs par mchod yon la sogs pa bshams la/ sngags kyis gdab par bya'o/ /de nas lha rnams dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la/ bsgrub par bya'o/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings nas ni/ /mthe'u chung las te lcags kyu che/ /mkhrig
<p>129a.7</p>mar mdud pa mdzub gnyis 'dud/ /rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan/ /dzaHhU~M baM hoHzhes brjod do/ /spyan drangs la mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa dbul te/ sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyis sbyang ba byas la/ de'i sngags ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi
<p>129b</p>
<p>129b.1</p>sho d+ha ne swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i cho gas khrus gsol bar bya ste/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams kun gyis khrus gsol ba/ /de bzhin bdag gis lha yi chus/ /dag par khrus ni gsol bar bgyi/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hU~M swA hA/ de nas na bza'
<p>129b.2</p>dbul bar bya ste/ oM badzra bA sa se swA hA/ oM badzra gan+d+he swA hA/ oM badzra a b+ha ra ni bi b+hu Sha ni swA hA/ oM badzra pu Sh+pe hU~M/ oM badzra d+hU pe hU~M/ oM badzra gan+d+he hU~M/ oM badzra nai bid+ye hU~M/ de'i 'og tu dbang bskur bar bya ste/ mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas la/ /mdzub mo rtse mo dgug pas ni/ /gung mo
<p>129b.3</p>bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/ /oM b+h+rUM khaM zhes bya ba dang / a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du/ oM badzra satwa hU~M/ oM badzra rat+na trAM/ oM badzra d+harma hrIH/ oM badzra karma a zhes bya ba dang / thams cad la a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM zhes bya bas rdo rje bsdams pa'i
<p>129b.4</p>mthe bong gnyis bsnyams te bsgreng ba ni rdo rje sems ma'i'o/ /de las srin lag rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje rin chen ma'i'o/ /de nyid las gung mo gnyis pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje chos ma'i'o/ /thal mo sbyar ba bcings la gung mo dang mdzub mo dang mthe bong sbyar ba ni rdo rje las
<p>129b.5</p>ma'i'o/ /de nas oM TuM zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje khu tshur so sor bcings te/ mdzub mo gnyis bkug la go cha bya ste/ snying gar mdud pa ltar bya ste/ yang mgrin pa dang / rgyab dang / dpral ba'i steng du mdud pa ltar bya ste/ de nas phreng ba bcing ba'i tshul gyis mdud pa bya ba dang dar
<p>129b.6</p>dpyangs bcing ba yang ngos gnyis su tha ma la sogs pa nas sor mo thams cad bkrol ba de nas mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya ste/ de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod par bya'o/ /de nas sngags 'dis mig sman gyi thur mas byug ste/ oM badzra tsak+Shu tsak+Shu sa man+ta
<p>129b.7</p>tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ de nas sngags 'dis bshos dbul te/ oM dI pya in+na sa mA d+hi d+h+ya na sarba pri Na ne swA hA/ de nas lha bshos dang / me long dang / bshos gzhan dag la sogs pas kyang mchod par bya ste/ de ltar byas na de 'og tu yang slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ khyod kyis
<p>130a</p>
<p>130a.1</p>nga la gsol btab pa'i/ /sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du/ /ji ltar gsungs bzhin rab gnas par/ /de ni nges byas byed du bcug /khyod kyi de ni kun rdzogs pas/ /ci bde bar ni shes par gyis/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas rim pa 'dis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /thab
<p>130a.2</p>dang dgang gzar blugs gzar rdzas/ /shing dang sgrub pa po dang ni/ /rdzas bsang dgod dang me sbyang dang / /bsang gtor dang ni sbyar ba dang / /ku sha dgram dang gnas khang dang / /me bskyed spyan drang la sogs dang / /srung skud bcings dang mchod yon dang / /zhabs bsil
<p>130a.3</p>bsgrub dang dbang bskur dang / /dam tshig bsgo dang mchod yon mchod/ /bsang gtor 'thor 'thung sreg blugs dang / /me brtag bsang dang dgang blugs dang / /kun bsregs bsang gtor gsol ba dang / /thab dang me lha dgod pa dang / /bsdu dang bstod dang dgug
<p>130a.4</p>ba dang / /sngon bzhin phyag rgya dbang bskur dang / /mchod dang mchod yon 'thor 'thung bsang / /dgang blugs cig shos las bskal dang / /lha rnams gzi byin bskyed pa dang / /me lha dgang blugs mchod bsang dang / /'thor 'thung mchod ba gshegs gsol lo/ /spyan
<p>130a.5</p>dbye ba'i cho ga slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pra tiSh+Tha bid+hiH/ bod skad du/ spyan dbye ba'i cho ga /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/ /skad cig
<p>130a.6</p>gis ni khyab mdzad pa/ /thugs rje cher ldan 'gro ba'i skyabs/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid ldan pa dang / /bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med pas/ /lha yi gzugs la dmigs pa dang / /ras ris la sogs bzlas shing bsgom/ /blo dang
<p>130a.7</p>ldan pa gang zhig ni/ /bsod nams gzhan ni byed 'dod la/ /de ni rnal 'byor rgyud rnams kyi/ /rjes su mthun par 'di brjod bya/ /dang por khrus byas lus dris byugs/ /gtsang zhing dag pa'i gos gyon te/ /rgyu skar bzang po ldan pa la/ /mchod pa'i yo byad 'byor par bya/ /
<p>130b</p>
<p>130b.1</p>gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs dang / /bla re mchog ni bri bya zhing / /bkra shis rnams kyis brgyan pa yi/ /bum pa gang ba gzhag par bya/ /pi wang gling bu rdza rnga sogs/ /glu gar dga' ston cher bya zhing / /tsan+dan a gar nag pos byugs/ /me tog sil ma bkram par
<p>130b.2</p>bya/ /gnas ni nyams dga' 'du 'dzi med/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i/ /ba yi lnga dang tsan+dan gyis/ /byug cing bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung / /ma spyad pa yi ras rnyed pa/ /spos kyi chu yis bkrus nas ni/ /rang gi lha sbyor bdag nyid du/ /der ni de rab gnas par bya/ /sngar ni cho ga
<p>130b.3</p>rgyas byas la/ /spyan drangs mchod pa la sogs bya/ /brtson par byas nas de 'og tu/ /mtshan rnams rdzogs par ci bder ni/ /legs par bri ba'am bzo bo ni/ /nye bar 'ong ba 'dri ru gzhug /mkhas pas gshin rje gshed dam ni/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung bar bya/ /ri
<p>130b.4</p>mo'am sku gzugs gang yang rung / /'di 'dras yang dag rdzogs par bya/ /gnas de nyid du sngar bshad pa'i/ /khrus sa dag ni rab bshad de/ /zur bzhi pa la khru bzhi pa/ /bkra shis shin tu mdzes pa dag /dpangs su khru ni gnyis yod pa/ /yid 'ong zur rdul nyes 'bul bya/ /de
<p>130b.5</p>steng bstan pa'i rten bzhag pa/ /mkhas pas lha yi khrus gsol te/ /sems can kun la phan bde ba'i/ /sbyangs pa la sogs der bya'o/ /bkra shis rgyas par gyur pa dang / /yang dang yang du bstod bya zhing / /rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang / /ca co'i sgra ni gdon par
<p>130b.6</p>bya/ /rgyal ba'i dbang bskur tshul du ni/ /gdugs dkar po yang gzugs par bya/ /bris gzugs glegs bam 'jim gzugs sogs/ /lha la cho ga shes pa yis/ /me long la ni gzugs brnyan bkru/ /lugs ma sku gzugs nyid la'o/ /gsang sngags gang zhig
<p>130b.7</p>khrus dang dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ dzi na dzika la sogs pa rigs kyi bdag po'i snying po'o/ /de rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i snying po de me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i til la sogs pa las kun rig gi snying bo rig pa dang / ras ris bdag po'i gsang sngags
<p>131a</p>
<p>131a.1</p>bzlas/ /bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pas/ /'bru sman rin chen lnga rnams dang / /tsan+dan dag gi chus bkang ste/ /mgul pa gos bzang dag gis bcings/ /lo ma bzang pos kha dgab bya/ /rig snying rigs kyi bdag po dang / /rigs kyi las
<p>131a.2</p>kun byed par bzlas/ /sku yi spyi gtsug dbu dang ni/ /phyag dang thugs kar byug par bya/ /de nas pus mo btsugs nas ni/ /bdug spos rnams kyis bdugs nas ni/ /mgon po gshegs shing bskul ba'i phyir/ /tshig ni 'di skad brjod par bya/ /'di zhes bya ba bcom
<p>131a.3</p>ldan 'das/ /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la brtse bar gyur nas ni/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid rab gnas pa/ /mgon po bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /
<p>131a.4</p>de bas gnang bar mdzad par rigs/ /sangs rgyas mgon po brtser ldan dang / /byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang / /gang yang gsang ba'i lha rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang / /gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang / /gang yang lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i/ /
<p>131a.5</p>sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba ni/ /yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni/ /spyan dbye bar ni 'tshal lags na/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs ni brtse bar mdzad du gsol/ /tshogs
<p>131a.6</p>pa thams cad spyan 'byed pas/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ /ras ris la sogs snying gar ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rang gi sa bon las byung mtshan/ /chos tshul gsang sngags dgod cing bsgom/ /sngags dang phyag mtshan gyur
<p>131a.7</p>pa dang / /spro zhing bsdu ba byas pa la/ /lha yi sku ni ji bzhin par/ /de las skyes par mkhas pas bsam/ /rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/ /rang gi phyag rgya sku la sogs/ /byin brlab go rims bzhin du bya/ /de mdun ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /snga ma bzhin
<p>131b</p>
<p>131b.1</p>yang legs bsgrubs na/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/ /de dag dgug gzhug bcing ba dang / /dbang bya rang gi phyag rgya rnams/ /sgrub thabs las byung rim pas bya/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung ba dang / /bgegs bsal skyol sogs cho ga bya/ /gdan 'bul
<p>131b.2</p>la sogs byas nas kyang / /dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /mdun du ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /sgu yi lus la bcug nas ni/ /rang gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ /de nas mgon po 'dus pa bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sgra dbyangs dang / /yid 'ong glu yis bstod par bya/ /
<p>131b.3</p>snga ma bzhin du mchod yon sogs/ /dbul zhing bgegs bsal la sogs bya/ /gzugs brnyan gyi ni sku gzugs la/ /phyogs rnams kun nas lhag pa'i tshogs/ /mgon po dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ zhes brjod cing dgug par bya/ rang gi phyag rgya byin brlab cing / /yi ge brgya pas
<p>131b.4</p>brtan par bya/ /rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas/ /cho ga shes par byin gyis brlab/ /snga ma bzhin du gsol ba yang / /de la dang por gsol btab nas/ /de yi phyag rgya go rims bzhin/ /dbang bskur ba ni bstan par bya/ /lwa s+ya la sogs rnams kyis mchod/ /dri sogs
<p>131b.5</p>kyis kyang mchod par bya/ /gos dang rgyan dang so rtsi dang / /gdu bu gtsug tor me long dang / /gi wang dang ni li khri sogs/ /lha bshos rnams kyis rim bzhin mchod/ /de nas cho ga ldan pa yis/ /yid kyi mchod pas yang dag mchod/ /de yi sngags mang bzlas nas ni/ /phyi

<p>132a.1</p>bya/ /de yi lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /lag g.yas mthe bong bzung nas ni/ /de nas mar gyis bkang ba yi/ /dgang gzar gyis ni bskor bar bya/ /rang gi lha yi sngags kyis ni/ /dgang blugs brgya ni dbul bar bya/ /zho dang til dang bsres pa yis/ /

<p>133a</p>
<p>133a.1</p>ba shes/ /dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i las la mkhas/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes/ /de dag dang ldan slob dpon te/ /de la de nyid bcu po ni/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni ting 'dzin mchog /phyag rgya stang stabs dag dang ni/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg de nyid mchod/ /

<p>133a.6</p>ni rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rigs lnga'i mtshan mas mtshan pa bzhag la/ de dag gi nang du 'bru lnga dang / sman dang rin po che bcug la/ /dri dang sbyar ba'i chus bkang ste/ /gos kyis mgul pa dkri ba dang / /'dab ma dri zhim pos kha brgyan pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan

<p>133b.1</p>gshegs pa'i sku gdung la sogs pa la/ de'i nang du ting nge 'dzin gyis bkug pa la bkru bar bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig sems dpa' la/ /ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas oM AH
<p>133b.2</p>hUM zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum mam/ lha de'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnam par dgod cing bsam par bya'o/ /de nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul la/ sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ zhes bya bas 'dir sbyang ba la sogs pa bya ste/ de'i rjes la kun rdzob kyi lha de
<p>133b.3</p>dang por dar ram ras dkar po gtsang ma lag pur gyis bsgos pa blang bar bya'o/ /de nas de bkru ba'i 'dag chal dang / yo byad rnams ni 'di dag ste/ /sug pa dang ni sran phye dang / /ku sha ba yi rnam lnga dang / /de ltar so phag la sogs pas/ /khrus ni bya bar gsungs pa ste/ /
<p>133b.4</p>yungs kar dang ni me dag gis/ /sems can kun la phan bde ba'o/ /sbyang ba la sogs rnams bya zhing / /rgyal 'gyur bkra shis tshigs bcad gdon/ /yang dang yang du bstod bya zhing / /rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang / /ngo mtshar gyur pa'i rol mo'ang bya/ /las kun byed
<p>133b.5</p>dang rigs snying dang / /rang gi rigs bdag gsang sngags ni/ /yongs bzlas sngar bshad bum pa'i chus/ /mkhas pas lha rnams khrus gsol lo/ /de nas gtsang ba mi yis ni/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /bzlas byas stan ni bzang po la/ /

<p>133b.7</p>sprul la sgo dbye ba byas te/ rdo rje bsdu ba bya'o/ /oM badzra sa mA ya dzaHdzaHdzaHde nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la/ phyag rgya bstan nas/ gsang sngags mngon par bya ste/ oM badzra satwa hU~M/ rigs kyi bdag po'i snying po'o/ /oM b+ha ga wa ti ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la
<p>134a</p>
<p>134a.1</p>tiSh+Tha sing+b+ha lo tsa ni sarba a r+tha sA d+ha ne swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi yum gyi rig pa'o/ /oM dzi na dzika swA hA/ zhes pa ni rigs kyi snying po'o/ /de bzhin du/ oM shaM ka re shIn+taM ka re g+hu Ta g+hu Ti ni g+hU Ta ya g+hA Ta ya g+hu Ti ni swA hA/ oM badzra d+h+r-ika swA hA/ oM
<p>134a.2</p>ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te ka ro Ta bi r+ye swA hA/ oM A ro l-i ka swA hA/ oM rat+na d+h+r-ika swA hA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces bya ba ni/ rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rigs so/ /so so'i rig pa dang snying po'o/ /de nas cod pan dang dar dpyangs bcing ba dang / go cha
<p>134a.3</p>bskon pa la sogs pa byas la/ me tog la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la/ yongs su bzlas pas gus pas phyag byas la mchod yon phul te/ lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de nas phyir rol du gtor ma byin la sbyin sreg bya ste/ dang
<p>134a.4</p>por bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /tshim par bya ba'i phyir ni/ rang gi sngags kyis so/ /dgongs par bya ba'i phyir ni rigs kyi sngags kyis so/ /'byor par bya ba'i don du ni rigs kyi bdag po'i snying pos bya'o/ /de ltar sbyin sreg byas nas/

<p>134a.6</p>stsal lags kyis/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang / /slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas bsrung ba'i phyir yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas de nyid du ku sha bting la nyal bar bya/ /de nas mal nas langs pa dang / ba'i rnam pa
<p>134a.7</p>lnga dang / spos chus lus kun dang gnas kun byugs la/ lha'i rnal 'byor byas la/ bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas gzhal yas khang dang / rten la sogs pa bsams la/ de'i 'og tu zangs ma'i snod la sogs par mchod pa la sogs bshams
<p>134b</p>
<p>134b.1</p>te sngags kyis gdab po/ /de nas lha rnams dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la bsgrub par bya'o/ /spyan drangs nas mchod pa dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul te/ sngar bshad pa'i rigs kyi sbyang ba byas la/ de'i 'og tu dU ra ba'i pir
<p>134b.2</p>dang / til mar gyi sbyang ba byas te/ de'i sngags ni oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i cho gas khrus kyang gsol bar bya ste/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ba/ /de bzhin bdag gis lha yi chus/ /dad pas
<p>134b.3</p>khrus ni gsol bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ de nas na bza' dbul bar bya ste/ oM badzra b+ha Sha ne swA hA/ de nas rgyan la sogs pa thams cad rang rang gi sngags/ oM badzra mu ku Ta swA hA/ zhes pa la sogs pas dbul bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu
<p>134b.4</p>dbang bskur bar bya ste/ mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas la/ /mdzub mo rtse mo bkug nas ni/ /gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/ /oM b+hu khaM zhes bya ba dang / a b+hi Shiny+tsa swa mAM zhes pa dang / de bzhin du oM badzra satwa hUM/ badzra rat+na
<p>134b.5</p>trAMH badzra d+harma hrIH/ badzra karma aH/ zhes bya ba thams cad la a b+hi Shiny+tsa swa mAM zhes byas la/ so so'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ro/ /de nas oM hUM/ zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bsrung ba dang / dar dpyangs dang
<p>134b.6</p>cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba la gnas par bya'o/ /de nas mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya ste/ oM badzra tu Sh+ye ho/ /de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas mchod par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su sngags 'dis gser ram rin po che'i thur ma la mig sman bskus la mig dbye bar bya'o/ /
<p>134b.7</p>oM tsa k+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shu pi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ de nas bshos la ni/ oM di bya i n+ni sa mA d+hi d+h+yA nAM Na nai swA hA/ zhes pa'o/ /de nas me long dang / 'khor lo dang / rin po che bdun dang / ral gri dang / gdan dang / zhal zas dang / sna tshogs pa la mchod pa'i sngags kyis
<p>135a</p>
<p>135a.1</p>mngon par mchod de/ gong du gsungs pa'i bum pa rnams bu mo mdzes pa gzhon nu ma brgyad dam gcig gis mchod par bya'o/ /de nas la lar slob ma dag gnas pa na yongs su gzung ba'i cho gas/ slob ma bsnyen pa rim pa bzhin du dbang
<p>135a.2</p>bskur la/ mchod pa gyis zhes bya'o/ /de'i rjes la yang sreg blugs 'bum du tshang ba'am/ yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du bya'o/ /de la dkyil 'khor gyi lha la ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /gcig la sogs pa rnams la ni sangs rgyas thams cad pa'i yum gyi dkyil
<p>135a.3</p>'khor bris la bya'o/ /de bzhin du gtsug lag khang dang / sku gdung dang glegs bam thams cad la yang sangs rgyas thams cad pa'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor bya ba ste/ de yang mchog tu gsang ba'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil
<p>135a.4</p>'khor te/ /de yi bsdus pa de nyid do/ /gzhan du rab gnas thams cad la/ /sangs rgyas kun yum dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te/ de la sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ rigs lnga'i lha mo dang / rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs
<p>135a.5</p>pa lnga dang / sgo ba dang phyogs skyong du bcas pa'o/ /gtsug lag khang la ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs par ting
<p>135a.6</p>nge 'dzin dang sngags 'dis bskyed do/ /oM hU~M hrIHsu pra tiSh+Tha badzre swA hA/ oM hU~M hrIHb+h+rUM khaM badzrI b+ha ba dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha b+h+rUM khaM zhes bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gnas de la bum pa lnga'am/ bcu drug la sogs pa'i nang spos chus yongs su gang
<p>135a.7</p>ba dag la mngon par bsngags pas bsang gtor bya'o/ /de'i sngags ni/ oM badzro da ka sarba shud+d+he bi shud+d+he swA hA/ de'i rjes la gong ma'i sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyi
<p>135b</p>
<p>135b.1</p>dbyings su gyur pa khang pa brtsegs pa chen po 'og min nas bkug ste/ ngo bo nyid gcig par rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /de nas yang mchod pa'i tshogs byas la/ gtsug lag khang gi srung ma pany+tsi ka'am/ nag po chen po la sogs pa dgug pa'am/ gzhug
<p>135b.2</p>pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas nas/ rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas lung bsgo bar bya ste/ ji srid gtsug lag khang gnas pa de srid kyi bar du khyod kyis srungs shig /'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi bka' yang khyod kyis sgrubs shig ces
<p>135b.3</p>bsgos la/ mchod par bya ba dang / gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa'i mchod rten la rab tu gnas pa yang / mchod pa legs par bya zhing bkrus la yi ge b+h+rUM las rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma
<p>135b.4</p>yongs su gyur pa las mchod rten gyi gzugs su bskyed cing / de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur bsam par bya ste/ khrus dang bkra shis dang byin gyis brlab pa dang / sngags la sogs pa cho ga thams cad ni gong du gsungs pa dang mthun par bya
<p>135b.5</p>ba nyid do/ /dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam rab tu gnas par bya ba ni/ lhag par gnas pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du byas la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge'i rnam par yongs su gyur nas/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa ston par byed par bsams la/ 
<p>135b.6</p>oM pradz+nyA sru taM smr-i ti ma ti bi dza ye swA hA/ zhes pa dang mdo sde la ni/ oM sU tra se na d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra thams cad bkug ste yi ge rnams la bstims nas/ de nyid kyis sems can rnams la chos
<p>135b.7</p>ston par rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /gsang sngags kyi rgyud la ni/ rdo rje chos yi ge'i gzugs su gyur pas sngags kyi gzugs kyi skus 'khor ba na 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad pa dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje
<p>136a</p>
<p>136a.1</p>'chang thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bsams te/ oM hU~M hrIHsarba gu h+ya d+hA tu ta/ zhes pas rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /khrus la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin te/ gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten dang / ras ris dang / glegs bam
<p>136a.2</p>la sogs pa ni/ me long nyid la bkru'o/ /mchod pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga la sogs pa ni sngar gsungs pa las shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje la ni yongs su dag par khrus la sogs pa byas la/ lte ba la gnas pa'i hU~M las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje bskyed de/ ting nge 'dzin
<p>136a.3</p>gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes kyi rdo rje thams cad bkug pa de rnams nam mkha'i dkyil du pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa la gser gyi rdo rje chen po 'od sna tshogs dang ldan pa bsams la/ de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug pa
<p>136a.4</p>la sogs pa byas la/ ngo bo nyid gcig par bsams nas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra hU~M/ zhes pas byin gyis brlabs la rab tu gnas par bya zhing / de'i lte ba la rdo rje sems dpa'i bsam par bya'o/ /dril bu rab tu gnas par bya ba ni/ dril bu de a dkar po las
<p>136a.5</p>dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung chos kyi sgra chen por bskyed la/ khrus gsol ba byas nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyis mdun gyi nam mkha'i bar snang la/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ljags pad+ma chen po las/ gsung gi
<p>136a.6</p>sgra rgya mtsho ji snyed pas 'gro ba ma lus pa la/ dam pa'i chos ston pa dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rin po che dbyig gi dril bu rdo rje dang / pad+ma mnyam par 'dus pa las byung ba'i gzugs kha dog dmar po
<p>136a.7</p>'od sna tshogs dang ldan pa bsams te/ de nyid lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas ngo bo nyid gcig pa las/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra dz+wi hwa a/ zhes pas byin gyis brlab cing / de'i nang du a las rdo rje bsrung ba kha dog dmar po
<p>136b</p>
<p>136b.1</p>bsam par bya'o/ /phreng ba rab tu gnas par bya ba ni/ rdo rje la sogs par rigs ji lta bu'i rim pa las shes par bya zhing / de nyid kyang bkru ba la sogs pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpar phreng ba'i mdo 'dzin bsams la/ rang gi lha'i
<p>136b.2</p>snying po gang yin pa dang / chos kyi gzungs chen po'i snying po/ oM ma hA pad+me d+ha ra Ni zhes bya ba'i snying por bskyed de/ de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nyid mdun gyi nam mkhar bsams la/ de nyid las bsrung ba'i snying po ni/ rang gi
<p>136b.3</p>lha'i snying po'o/ /de las rang gi 'dod pa'i lhar bsams nas/ de nyid kyi bsrung ba'i sngags kyi yig 'bru rnams 'od zer dang bcas pa byung ba las/ dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas/ snying po dang yi ge 'bru rnams phreng ba gzhan la bstim/ rang gi lha
<p>136b.4</p>nyid chos kyi gzungs chen por 'gyur ba las/ mdo 'dzin la rab tu gnas par byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi brjed pa'i gzungs su gyur cig ces brjod la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA d+harmA a mr-i te su pra tiSh+Tha badzre hU~M/ zhes pas rab tu gnas par
<p>136b.5</p>bya'o/ /rdo rje la sogs pa la ni mchod pa dang / bkra shis la sogs pa ni snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du bya zhing / sku gzugs la sogs pa thams cad la ni/ rab tu gnas pa med par ni zhag 'ga' yang gzhag par mi bya ste/ de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gang
<p>136b.6</p>du sku gzugs zin nas ni/ /yun rings gnas kyang ma mchod na/ /ji srid rab tu ma gnas par/ /de las mi shis skye bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na mkhas pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyis bsod nams thob par bya ba'i phyir myur du
<p>136b.7</p>rab tu gnas par bya ba nyid do/ /de yi yo byad 'di dag ste/ /gang du rdzas ni nyams pa las/ /rdo rje slob dpon nyams gyur pas/ /de bas rdzas la rab tu 'bad/ /dar dang rna cha gdu bu dang / /sor gdub rnams ni gser las byas/ /de nyid kyi ni gnas kyi phyir/ /
<p>137a</p>
<p>137a.1</p>nang tshangs can stan khri dang bcas/ /de bzhin rgyab rten dag dang ni/ /gos bzang pos ni dgab par bya/ /sku gzugs la sogs dang por ni/ /gdan ni shin tu yid 'ong ba/ /mngon sum bya'am bsams nas ni/ /de steng bzhugs su gsol
<p>137a.2</p>bar bya/ /steng du bla re bre bya zhing / /sna tshogs gos la sogs pas brgyan/ /sa gzhi lhag par gnas bya bar/ /srad bu thod le kor dang bcas/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang / /de bzhin nag po lnga dang yang / /'dir
<p>137a.3</p>ni tshon ni bsdu bar gsungs/ /de la snod ni gang ba brgyad/ /bzhi'am gang yang yid kyis brtag /'bras dkar gyis ni bkang ba la/ /dbyig dag dang ni bcas par bya/ /bsang gtor mchod yon snod nyid dag /zangs ma las byas bum pa dang / /so shing
<p>137a.4</p>so phag dri zhim dang / /pir ni dri ma sbyong byed pa/ /ba gcin lci ba 'o ma dang / /zho dang mar sar ku sha'i chun/ /ba yi rnam lnga mnyam bsags la/ /snod gcig gi ni nang du gzhug /ljang dang dmar dang de bzhin ser/ /dkar dang nag po gnyis dag ste/ srad bu lnga
<p>137a.5</p>ni bsgril bar bya/ /mda' bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/ /til mar dri bzangs til mar nyid/ /sku gzugs sku dang mar me dag /bya ba'i phyir ni dbul bya zhing / /me long shin tu dri med bsags/ /sku gzugs lhag par gnas pa la/ /ras ser bzang
<p>137a.6</p>po kha tshar bcas/ /dri med rnam par dag pa dang / /a gar nag pos legs bdugs pa/ /ser dang dmar dang nag dang sngo/ /dkar dang mkha' 'dra sngo bsangs dang / /de bzhin dkar po'i ba dan rnams/ /phyogs mtshams brgyad du gzugs par bya/ /
<p>137a.7</p>dkyil 'khor lha yi grangs las ni/ /bum pa lhag par gnas bya'am/ /bcu'am brgyad dam lnga rnams ni/ /'byor dang 'tsham par bsag par bya/ /gos bzang sna tshogs mdog can gyis/ /bum pa'i mgul pa dkri bar bya/ /gser ram yang na dngul dag
<p>137b</p>
<p>137b.1</p>ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /br-i had kaN+Da ka ri dang / /ka ri ka ni ha sa mchog /daN+Da ut+pal dkar po ste/ /sman rnams lnga po bsags nas ni/ /btags te mnyam par sbyar ba yi/ sman rnams kun dang ldan pa la/ /de bzhin gshegs
<p>137b.2</p>sngags bzlas nas ni/ /bum pa rnams su'ang gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje mthon ka bai DUr+ya/ /pad+ma rA ga rdo rje ste/ /'di dag rin chen mchog gyur yin/ /med na tha mal pa yis bya/ /a mu bil ba se'u star ga dang / /gla gor zho sha dzA ti dang / /de la sogs pa gzhan
<p>137b.3</p>rnams ni/ /sna tshogs sman ni dbul bar bya/ /'bras yos bzang po dag dang ni/ /yungs kar bzang po so sor dbul/ /zho mar 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang / /'o ma can shing shing la sogs/ /me tog le brgan rtsi dag dang / /bag zan las byas snum khur mchog /spyan 'byed
<p>137b.4</p>kyi ni yo byad de/ /de dag so sor dbul bar bya/ /de bzhin khrus sa'i stegs bur ni/ /rin chen las byas khrus gzhong dang / /so shing so phag phye ma dang / /phag ze dUr ba'i pir dag dang / /ba yi rnams lnga cha mnyam dang / /sgyu ru la sogs 'dag chal chu/ /sbrang rtsi
<p>137b.5</p>dang sbyar mngar gsum chu/ /dri dang 'o ma'i chu rnams ni/ /bum pa re re dag tu bya/ /zhal long sku phyis ras yug dang / /gu gul la sogs spos rnams dang / /seng ldeng phur bu sngags gos dang / /tshon skud lnga dang 'dab bzhi dang / /tshon sna lnga yi phye ma dang / /sbrang
<p>137b.6</p>chu sug pa spos chu dang / /til mar dang ni sran phye dang / /'bras chan chang bu gnyis dag dang / /lha yi grangs dang rab sbyar ba'i/ /gur gum gyis bris lha yi mtshan/ /bris la bum pa gzhag par bya/ /gser las byas pa'i spu gri dang / /de bzhin so mangs smad tsher
<p>137b.7</p>dang / /shel sgong dris bsgos rna cha dang / /gser las byas pa'i thur ma dang / /gser gyi 'khor lo dar dpyangs dang / /gdugs dang rnga ma mchod pa'i tshogs/ /seng ge'i khri dang ku sha dang / /de bzhin yo byad ldan pa yis/ /rab tu gnas byas shis par 'gyur/ /rdo rje
<p>138a</p>
<p>138a.1</p>slob dpon gang zhig la/ /mtshan mi shes pa'i lha rnams ni/ /rab tu gnas par byed pa ni/ /the tshom gyur pas gzhag bya min/ /de bzhin gshegs kun sangs rgyas kyi/ /thugs kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems/ /yin pas gsal bar mi 'gyur bas/ /rdo rje sems
<p>138a.2</p>dpa' rab gnas bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs kun rab gnas pa'i/ /cho ga dri med byas pa las/ /bsod nams cung zad gang thob des/ /'gro ba'i nyes kun dag gyur cig /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
<p>138a.3</p>rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang / /lo tsA ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ kA ru No da ya nA ma b+hA ba rdza ba bid+hiH/ bod skad du/ thugs rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba bsgom pa dang bzlas pa'i
<p>138a.4</p>cho ga/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan bsgom dang bzlas pa'i lam ni rdo rje slob dpon dag gis rab mdzad pa'i/ bstan bcos shin tu zab dang bcas phyir thub pa'i gsung bzhin de nyid mi rtogs te/ /rang blo'i rnam par rol pas
<p>138a.5</p>mi gsal dpe dang theg pa gzhan rnams dang ni gcig byed pa/ /slob ma'i tshogs gnyis dag gis byin brlabs theg pa la ni chen por 'dzin mi byed/ /chos rnams yang dag ston cing cho ga ma lus 'chad pa 'gal med la/ /ser snas byang chub 'jig cing ma bshad yul ni ye shes
<p>138a.6</p>dag las nyams 'gyur phyir/ /snying rjes byams chos slob dpon ye shes rdo rje gzhan yang pad dkar zhes bya bas/ /byis pa legs rtogs tshig gis sku dang phyag rgya sngags rnams cho ga bzhin bshad bya/ /de la dang por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid
<p>138a.7</p>bsdus pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang chos kyi dkyil 'khor dang / las kyi dkyil 'khor rnams su dbang bskur ba thob pa/ /dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi gsang sngags gzung ba dang / rig pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / mnyan pa'i dbang
<p>138b</p>
<p>138b.1</p>bskur ba dang / rjes su gnang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang / slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba dang / lung bstan pa'i dbang bskur ba thob cing / bsgom pa dang zlos par 'dod pas/ dang po kho nar yid du 'ong ba'i gnas sgra'i tsher ma la sogs pa dang bral bar stan shin tu
<p>138b.2</p>'jam po la 'dug ste/ kha shar ram nub tu lta ba'am/ ji ltar dga' bar bltas te/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung dang / skyil mo krung phyed pa dang / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang / bkra shis kyi 'dug stangs dang / bzang po'i 'dug stangs kyis thal mo mnyam
<p>138b.3</p>par sbyar ba'i zla ba phyed pas kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i stan de gang yang rung bas 'bad pa med par lag pa gnyis rdo rje'i bcing ba byas la lus drang por bsrang ste/ mgrin pa bstod la sos so mnan pa spu rtse tsam gyis so'i thad kar lce rdo rje ltar mi g.yo bar bzhag
<p>138b.4</p>la/ nags kyi ri dwags bag phebs nas nyal ba ltar mig cung zad btsums te/ mig gnyis sna'i rtse mor gtad par bya'o/ /de nas rim pa 'dis gnas bsrung bar bya ste/ rang gi lus rang gi lha'i skur bsams la/ lag pa gnyis su yi ge hU~M gnyis las rdo rje gnyis
<p>138b.5</p>rnam par bsams te/ sor mo lnga'i tshigs rtse mo'i rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /de rnams kyi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnam par dgod par bya ste/ de la gung mo la ni yi ge oM/ mdzub mo la ni hU~M/ srin lag la trAM/ mthe'u
<p>138b.6</p>chung la hrIH/ mthe bo la ni yi ge a'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa la yang de bzhin du dgod do/ /de nas lag pa g.yas par gnas pa rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsam par byas la/ lag pa g.yon pa la gnas pa rnams kyang
<p>138b.7</p>rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i skur bsams nas/ phan tshun thabs dang shes rab dag dang bcas pa'i mngon par 'dod pas mngon du phyogs pa'i thal mo mnyam par byas la/ a n+yo n+ya a nu gtA sarba d+harmAHzhes brjod do/ /de nas sor mo de rnams
<p>139a</p>
<p>139a.1</p>shin tu yang bcer te/ lha mo rnams kyi thugs kar zhugs par gyur pa rnam par bsams la/ at+yan+ta a nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmAHzhes brjod do/ /de'i 'og tu rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par bskyed pa/ 
<p>139a.2</p>bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags par bsams la/ badzra ban+d+ha hUM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas snying gar badzra ban+d+ha traT ces lan gsum brjod la dgrol lo/ /de nas rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs zhugs par
<p>139a.3</p>gyur par bsams la/ badzra A be sha aH/ zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te srin lag dang mthe'u chung gi rtsa ba'i bar du mthe bo gnyis bcug la snying gar bskyed pa ni rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la phye ste kha
<p>139a.4</p>thur du bstan te sa la gzhag la/ oM badzri b+ha ba hU~M zhes kyang brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i yi ge hU~M gi tshogs me lce shin tu 'phro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis sa gzhi'i gtan pa la thug gi bar du ma lus pa'i sa la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab de dag dang / sems
<p>139a.5</p>can de rnams rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs can lta bur bsam par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha'i phyogs su yi ge hU~M rnam par 'phro ba dang bcas par bsams la de nyid yongs su gyur pa las/ lte ba yan chad rdo rje hU~M mdzad lta bu la/ de man chad rtse gcig pa lta bus
<p>139a.6</p>bgegs rnams kun du 'bigs par bsams la kun nas kyang 'jig pa'i dus kyi me 'bar ba lta bus khebs par gyur pa'i gnas kyi sa la zhugs par gyur par bsams nas/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nan ban+d+ha hU~M phaT ces kyang brjod la/ rdo rje 'bar ba rnams
<p>139a.7</p>kyis gdug pa rnams rab tu tshig par gyur cing 'byer bar gyur par bsam mo/ /de'i steng du yi ge oM las rab tu grags pa'i nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa khyab par byed pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po bsam par
<p>139b</p>
<p>139b.1</p>bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig blang bar bya ste/ rang gi lus yi ge maM dmar po tsam du bsams la/ de nyid 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug bar bsams te/ steng gi rtsibs gnyis
<p>139b.2</p>ni mgo bo/ /de'i ngos gnyis kyi rtsibs gnyis ni dpung pa/ yang ngos gnyis kyi rtsibs gnyis lte ba dang bcas pa ni snying ga dang rtsib logs gnyis so/ /yang ngos gnyis kyi rtsibs gnyis ni brla dang byin pa gnyis so/ /rtsibs lhag ma gnyis ni mtshan te rdo rje zhes bya ba
<p>139b.3</p>bskyed par bya'o/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'khor lo'i sku mdog dmar po thugs ka'i zla ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i 'khor lo'i nang du chud pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i snying po la sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du yi ge maM dmar po shin tu 'phro bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
<p>139b.4</p>kun du 'gengs shing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyi rgya mtsho rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor de rnams su zhugs par gyur cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang
<p>139b.5</p>bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur la/ bdag nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams nyid slar byon pas dbang bskur bar gyur nas rang gi lus la zhugs nas byin gyis brlabs par gyur bar bsams la/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar
<p>139b.6</p>bya zhing / sngags kyang brjod par bya ste/ oM badzra tsakra hU~M/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog bcing ba'i tshul du mdud nas de'i dbus su maM gyis mtshan pa'i 'khor lo bsams te/ snying ga'i tha dkar 'khor lo bzhin du
<p>139b.7</p>yongs su bskor nas kha'i steng du bzhag la/ sngar gyi sngags brjod par bya ste/ des ni dam tshig nyams pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig thob par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig chen po nyams pas ni stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /'bring la
<p>140a</p>
<p>140a.1</p>ni brgya rtsa brgyad do/ /phra mo la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas sbyor ba gnyis po 'dis sdig pa dral bar bya ste/ lte ba'i phyogs su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge hU~M 'od zer dang bcas pa bsam pa dang / snying gar yi ge ka kha
<p>140a.2</p>dog nag po sgrib pa gsum gyi bag chags kyi sa bon bsams nas/ yi ge hU~M gi sgra dang gyen du 'phro ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis 'byin par gyur pa dang / yi ge hU~M yang steng du song nas rang gi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis yi ge ka phyi rol du phyung la/ gang gi tshe 'di snying ga'i
<p>140a.3</p>phyogs su kun du gnas pa de'i tshe yi ge ka sna'i rtse mor byung ste/ mi dge ba ma lus pa'i gzugs sha za'i lus can gdong rnam par 'gyur ba sha med pa skra gyen du brdzes pa/ lag pa gnam du brkyang ba gcer bu ba mdog gnag pa 'jigs pas khyab cing rab tu 'dar ba'i
<p>140a.4</p>gzugs can brgyal bar gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /yi ge hUM yang rang gi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis rdo rjer gyur nas 'bar ba rnon po'i tshogs de nyid las rang gi gzugs su yongs su gyur te/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can zhal mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ 'bar ba'i tshogs
<p>140a.5</p>kyis rnam par dkrigs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su 'bar bar gyur ba'i 'bar ba'i me'i ngo bo nyid du yongs su bsam par bya'o/ /de'i nang na yod pa'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su rdo rje gnod sbyin dang 'dra ba
<p>140a.6</p>g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa dang / sna rtse'i gnas su gnas pa'i rdo rje phra mo 'bar bar gyur cing me 'bar ba'i nang du chud pa'i lcags kyi gong bu lta bu/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi chos kyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba/ zhal rnam par gdangs shing / sna
<p>140a.7</p>khung dang / mkhur tshos rnam par 'gyur ba/ g.yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sdigs mdzub byed cing / g.yas pa'i dpung pa bteg nas khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin pa/ khro gnyer bsnyer ba'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ badzra muH zhes bya
<p>140b</p>
<p>140b.1</p>bas phyung la/ khams gsum 'bar bar byas pas/ sdig pa'i lus skad cig gis 'jigs shing rab tu 'dar ba dang / byer bar gyur nas/ rgya mtsho chen por lhung bar gyur la kun du 'bar ba'i rdo rje des nges par bsregs nas rdo rje des slar blangs te/ 
<p>140b.2</p>rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje'i nang du chud par bsam mo/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ sngags brjod par bya ste/ de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin no/ /rdo rje bsdams pa de dam du bcings la/ /mthe'u chung gnyis rnam par phye ste/ so sor bzhag nas mdzub mo
<p>140b.3</p>gnyis kyang gdu bu lta bur byas te/ mthe bo gnyis bskum nas rang gi kha 'gram gyi gnas gnyis su ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag la/ kha dang / sna khung dang / mkhur ba dang / mig rnam par gdangs shing / phyag rgya 'di bcings la/ lan gsum nas bdun gyi
<p>140b.4</p>bar du sngags hU~M badzra yak+Sha khA da ya/ sarba pA baM ni me hU~M zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas yi ge hU~M bzhi rdo rje'i nang du chud par bsams la nam mkha'i khams ma lus par khyab pa'i dus mtha'i me mang po 'bar ba'i tshogs rnams las rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi gzugs su bdag
<p>140b.5</p>nyid bsams la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'am/ /rdo rje ti rIn+ti ri'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la/ sdig pa thams cad dgug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas ngan 'gro'i 'gro bar gtogs pa'i sems can snod dang bcas par bkug la
<p>140b.6</p>sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya sngags dang bcas pas sgrib pa thams cad dang bral bar bya ste/ oM sarba pA paM A kaR+Sha Na bi sho d+ha badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT ces bya ba ni sngags so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs te mnyam por byas nas 'og nas 'dren pa'i
<p>140b.7</p>tshul gyis steng du bteg la/ mdzub mo de gnyis mdud pa'i tshul du bcing bar bya ste/ phyag rgya 'di sngar bshad pa'i sngags dang bcas pa ni dgug pa'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la gung mo gnyis sbyar te/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis kyi thur du
<p>141a</p>
<p>141a.1</p>bltas par sbyar bar bya'o/ /'di yang snying gar bcings nas gung mo sbyar ba sngags kyi mthar dgrol bar bya ste/ de rnams kyis sgrib pa rnams zad par bsams la/ sems can de rnams kyang sgrib pa dang bral nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung du skyes par gyur
<p>141a.2</p>cing snod kyi 'jig rten de yang rgya mtshor lhung bar gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra pA N-i bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba pA pa bad+d+hA nA ni/ pra mo k+Sha ya/ sarbA pa ya ga te b+h+yaHsarba satwa na/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ya traT/ de nas phyag rgya 'di mgo bor bzhag la sngags brjod
<p>141a.3</p>par bya ste/ khyad par ni maM zhes bya ba'o/ /'dis ni rang gi las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang nges par bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /des na 'dod pa'i rgyal po snying gar bsams la/ 'dod chags dang bral bar gzhig par bya ste/ rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo dang mthe'u chung sbyar te/ kha
<p>141a.4</p>gyen du bltas par byas la/ lhag ma rnams rnam par phye ste/ 'khor lo lta bur bya ba ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa lta bu'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags kyi mthar snying gar dgrol bar bya'o/ /hUM Ta k+ki s+pho Ta ya ma hA bi rA ga badzra/ badzra d+ha ra sa t+ye nA tha/ de nas rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje bcings la/ 
<p>141a.5</p>sngags brjod par bya ste/ oM ma hA duHkha badzra satwa sA da ya/ sarba satwe b+h+yo ma h+yan tsa dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ rdo rje bsdams pa dam bcings te/ /g.yon pa'i mtheb mdzub mngal du ni/ /g.yas pa yi ni mthe bo'i mtshan/ /bcug la bskyed cing btsir bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi sbyor
<p>141a.6</p>ba dang / gnas pa nyid kyi mdzub mo'i tshigs dang po la/ oM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la/ de'i steng du hU~M las 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa khyab par byed pa 'od zer rnon po 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis kun nas dkrigs pa'i rdo rje chen po'i gzugs kun du bskor bas
<p>141a.7</p>ma rungs pa thams cad dang / bgegs thams cad der byer bar gyur te/ phyogs bcur song bar gyur par bsams la/ de nas rdo rje chen po de nyid shin tu 'bar bar gyur bar bsam zhing / de nyid kyi yan lag dang / nying lag rnams kyang shin tu rno zhing 'bar bar gyur ba rdo rje
<p>141b</p>
<p>141b.1</p>me lta bu phra ba'i tshad can gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur cing / rdo rje thams cad kyi nang na yod pa'i yi ge hU~M gi sgra las nye bar gyur pa'i ca co'i tshogs chen pos bar mtshams med pa'i rdo rje'i tshogs phan tshun 'dres par gyur pa dang / rdo rje 'bar
<p>141b.2</p>ba'i rlabs lta bus 'gro ba thams cad khyab par byed pa'i rdo rje chen po'i rgya mtsho bsam par bya'o/ /des kyang gdug pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du 'byer bar gyur cing sems can gzhan rnams yongs su sbyangs te/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyi lus thal bar byas nas de bzhin
<p>141b.3</p>gshegs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku thob par bsams la/ de nyid bsdus nas bsgrub pa las rang ji tsam 'dod pa'i mthar thug pa'i rdo rje chen po'i dra ba bsam par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu yang rang gi mdzub mo g.yon pa'i rtse mor a las zla ba'i
<p>141b.4</p>dkyil 'khor de'i steng du hU~M las zhi ba'i rdo rje dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rnam par bsams la snga ma bzhin du spros te/ rdo rje shin tu phra ba las bsgrub pa rdo rje dra ba'i nang dang 'dabs 'byor par zhi ba'i rdo rje'i dra ba bsam par bya'o/ /de nyid kyi steng du baM 'od zer dang
<p>141b.5</p>bcas pa'i gzugs can rnam par bsams la/ oM badzra muSh+Ti baM zhes brjod de rgya mtshor byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas badzra dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha zhes bya ba 'dis brtan par bya ste/ srung ba chen po 'di ni rtag tu byas na gal te sangs rgyas thams cad bdud nyid du mdzad
<p>141b.6</p>kyang gzhig par mi spyod na gdug pa gzhan rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad 'di ni nga la dad pas sems can thams cad kyi don du bsgom pa dang bzlas pa la rab tu 'jug pa yin no zhes shin tu dgyes par gyur nas rang la byin gyis
<p>141b.7</p>brlab pa'i phyir mdun du byon par bsams la/ rdo rje phra mor gyur te rang gi lus la zhugs nas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbang du byas shing zhugs par gyur pas sdig pa thams cad 'joms shing bdag nyid bsrung bar gyur par sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'dis
<p>142a</p>
<p>142a.1</p>bsam par bya ste/ rdo rje thal mo sbyar la/ rang gi yi ge ngo bo nyid rang gi sa bon lag pa gnyis kyi mthil du hU~M hoHhrIH zhes bya ba dmar po dang / rang gi sa bon dmar po nyid dang / rang gi lus dmar po'i se gol gtogs pa las byung ba'i tshogs
<p>142a.2</p>dmar po rnams kyis/ oM badzra d+hA tu dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ ba shaM ku ru ma me ya AHzhes brjod la/ rdo rje thal mo yang dal bus brdabs nas bsam mo/ /de nas rdo rje bsdams pa byas la/ de'i lag mthil gnyis su ho a ho zhes bya ba rnam par bkod de/ thal mo dal bus
<p>142a.3</p>brdabs la/ de'i 'od kyi tshogs kyis lus thams cad khyab par gyur cing brgyal zhing myos par gyur la/ lus thams cad kyi gshis kyi mtshan zhig nas rim gyis byung bar gyur cing ye shes phul du byung bas 'gro ba ma lus pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon sum du gyur nas
<p>142a.4</p>yongs su dag pa'i rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye shes babs par gyur par rim gyis bsams te/ oM badzra d+hA tu dzaHhU~M baM hoH a badzra A be sha aH/ zhes kyang brjod cing bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje bsdams pa nyid las mdzub mo gnyis
<p>142a.5</p>bsgrengs te/ lag mthil gnyis kyang brdab pa byas nas hU~M phaT ces bya ba rnam par bkod la sgrib pa lhag ma rnams zad par gyur par bsgom zhing / oM badzra d+hA tu dzaHhU~M baM hoHphaT badzra ha na hU~M phaT a zhes kyang brjod la bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje bsdams pa bkrol la/ rak+Sha
<p>142a.6</p>haM rak+Sha zhes bya ba rnam par bkod pas yongs su dag pa'i lus de nyid bsrungs par gyur par bsams la/ oM badzra d+hA tu dzaHhU~M baM hoHrak+Sha haM rak+Sha a zhes brjod do/ /de nas 'di ni bdag dang mnyam pa'o zhes de nyid du byin gyis brlab par mdzad par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas
<p>142a.7</p>byin gyis brlabs pa de'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag tu med pa'i dbang bskur bas bdag nyid dbang bskur bar shes nas sems can thams cad mgron du bos te sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon du phyogs par byed pas rdo rje'i dbang po'i gnas su
<p>142b</p>
<p>142b.1</p>'gro'o/ /de yang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po mthong nas sbyor ba 'dis phyag rnam pa bzhi bya ste/ rang gi snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lce dang spyi gtsug tu yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed de/ de rnams la yang rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang sna
<p>142b.2</p>tshogs rdo rje hUM trAM hr-IHa zhes bya ba las bskyed la/ shar phyogs su lus thams cad phab ste/ rdo rje thal mo sbyar na snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rjes phyag bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA dzo pas thA nA ya/ At+ma nAM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ de nas mi bskyod
<p>142b.3</p>pa la rjes su gnang ba thob nas rang gi rigs lus la bcug ste/ bdag nyid kyang mi bskyod pa'i sku la zhugs nas de yang blangs te rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje la zhugs shing yi ge hU~M de nyid la thim par gyur par bsam mo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' spros pas kyang byin gyis brlabs
<p>142b.4</p>pa'i 'bras bur gyur pas sems can thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i sku thob par bsams la/ bsdu ba dang / gnas pa dang / brtan par gyur cing sngar spros pas rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas lho phyogs su song nas rdo rje thal mo snying gar sbyar
<p>142b.5</p>la/ dpral bar gnas pa'i rin po ches phyag bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi She kA ya/ At+ma nAM ni R+YA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ de bzhin du gnang ba sngon du 'gro bas rin po che'i rigs thams cad dpral bar gnas pa'i rin po che la zhugs shing / yi
<p>142b.6</p>ge trAM spros pas kyang sngar rdo rje sems dpa'i sku bskyed pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbang bskur bas/ bsdu ba dang / gnas pa dang / brtan par gyur par bya'o/ /de nas nub phyogs su song ste/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bor sbyar la snying gar
<p>142b.7</p>gnas pa'i pad+mas chos kyi rigs la phyag bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra brta nA ya/ At+ma nAM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga tA badzra d+harma pra brta ya mAM/ de bzhin du gnang ba sngon du 'gro bas chos kyi rigs thams cad la zhugs shing spros pas sngar rdo rje sems dpa'i
<p>143a</p>
<p>143a.1</p>sku byung ba rnams la dbang bskur nas/ 'di spros pas kyang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ngo bo nyid du byas la rang gi kha la gnas pa'i yi ge hrIHla bsdu ba dang / gnas pa dang / brtan par gyur par bya'o/ /de nas
<p>143a.2</p>byang phyogs su song ste/ thal mo snying gar sbyar la spyi gtsug na gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rjes phyag bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma Ne At+ma nAM nir+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM/ de bzhin du rigs thams cad la zhugs pa dang / spros pas kyang rdo rje
<p>143a.3</p>sems dpa'i sku thob cing dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i rang bzhin can rnams la phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pa spro zhing spyi gtsug na gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje la bsdu ba dang gnas pa dang / brtan par gyur par bya'o/ /de ltar rigs bzhi'i
<p>143a.4</p>ngo bo nyid du gyur nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar dpal be'u lta bur zhugs te/ rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs kyis de nyid sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje dang dbyer med par gyur te/ seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du 'dug par bya'o/ /de nas yid du 'ong ba'i phan yon la sogs
<p>143a.5</p>pa'i sgo nas byams pa la sogs pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi mngon du bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ shan si tA sarba sid+d+ha ya/ saM pad d+yan ta ma/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha na ta/ zhes bya ba 'di ni bde ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid can byams pa bstan pa yin no/ /swa b+hA wa shud+d+haH
<p>143a.6</p>sarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM zhes bya ba 'dis kyang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la dmigs pa las byung ba'i mgu ba ste/ dga' ba ston pa yin no/ /ngo bo nyid dag par sems can rnams kyis mi shes pa la de ma shes pas mi 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal nges par zhugs par gyur pa de dang
<p>143a.7</p>bral bar 'dod pa ni snying rje ste/ 'di ni snying rje'i sems skye bar ston to/ /de nas de bsgral bar bya'o zhes pa 'dis kyang khyad par can gyi dus la sdod pas gnas shing nus pa thob cing bar du btang snyoms su byed pa ston to/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon sum du byed pas de bzhin
<p>143b</p>
<p>143b.1</p>gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan rnams mngon sum du byas te rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes mchog rim pa 'dis mngon sum du bya'o/ /de la dang po kho nar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rnams su rin
<p>143b.2</p>chen sems mas bskyed pa'i zad par sa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas sa'i rdul de nyid me'i phra rab kyis bshigs nas rdo rje sems mas rab tu bsgrubs pa'i zad par me bsgom par bya'o/ /me'i phra rab de nyid chu'i rdul phra rab kyis khyer nas chos kyi sems mas bsgrubs pa'i zad
<p>143b.3</p>par chu bsgom par bya'o/ /chu'i rdul phra rab de nyid kyang rlung gi rdul phra rab rnams kyis rab tu bskams te/ las kyi sems mas rab tu bsgrubs pa'i zad par rlung du bsgom par bya'o/ /rlung gi rdul phra rab de nyid nam mkha'i phra rab rnams kyi nang du thim nas 'gro ba thams cad
<p>143b.4</p>nam mkha' tsam du rnam par bsgoms la zad par nam mkha' la 'jug pa de nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i ngo bo'o/ /nam mkha' de nyid kyi phra rab rnam par shes pa'i phra rab tu mi snang bar byas shing mi bskyod par byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnam shes mtha'
<p>143b.5</p>yas skye mched bsgom par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis mi snang bar byas nas/ 'od dpag tu med pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan gyis byin gyis brlabs par rab tu bsgrubs pa'i ci yang med pa'i skye mched rnam par bsgom
<p>143b.6</p>par bya'o/ /thams cad khyab pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes de yang don yod par grub pa'i ngo bo nyid bskyed pa yin no/ /de nas bag chags la goms pa'i dbang gis 'du shes chung ngu thob cing slar yang de kho na nyid la bcug nas stong pa nyid chen po rnam par bsgom mo/ /de
<p>143b.7</p>rnam par bsgom pa la ni/ bsod nams kyi tshogs shin tu yang med pas nyan thos kyi yul la 'jug pa'am/ ci yang med par rtog pa'am/ mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas de yang 'khor ba'i bde ba'i cha tsam yang med par thal bar 'gyur ba ste/ gnyi ga yang mdzes
<p>144a</p>
<p>144a.1</p>pa ma yin par 'gro ba'i don du bdag nyid byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nye bar lhags nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan te/ se gol gtogs pas slong bar mdzad par bsams te/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar na
<p>144a.2</p>khyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs par shin tu dka' ba la spyod pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di gsungs par gyur par bsam mo/ /de nas
<p>144a.3</p>sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar bsams la/ de'i grangs dang mnyam pa'i lus spros la mchog tu gus pas rang nyid kyis phyag rgya bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i phyag byas te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta
<p>144a.4</p>kA ya wAka tsit+ta/ badzra ban+da nAM ka ro mi zhes brjod par bya'o/ de nas 'dug la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ma 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid de dka' stsal du gsol/ /gang gis rnam par
<p>144a.5</p>snang mdzad chen po'i ye shes kun du bsgrubs nas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bskyed par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung sngon du 'gro ba 'di nas bzung ste/ mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga rim pa
<p>144a.6</p>'dis yang dag par bskyed par bya'o/ /dang po kho nar rang gi lus dang / 'khor bar 'jug pa'i dngos po rnams yi ge shaM gis stong par byas la yang dag pa'i mtha'i ting nge 'dzin la dus cung zad cig 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas rang ye shes tsam la nyi ma'i dkyil
<p>144a.7</p>'khor rnam par dag pa lta bu'i thig le tsam dpag tu med pa'i snying rje'i snang ba'i rgyud yongs su 'gyur bzhin pa las yi ge a'i ngo bo nyid du bsams la sa bon gyi yi ge de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rang bzhin gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i
<p>144b</p>
<p>144b.1</p>mthus/ de nyid byang chub kyi sems rdo rje dang / lha'i sku dang rigs rnams dang / dkyil 'khor dang / 'gro ba dang / sems can dang / dus gsum dang / srid pa gsum dang mchog gsum dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog dang / khams gsum dang / 'khor ba
<p>144b.2</p>dang / mya ngan las 'das pa nyid dang / 'dod chags dang thar pa yang de nyid do/ /de nyid yongs su gyur pa las sems so sor rtog pa'i rnam par bsgom par bya ste/ nyi ma'i cha gyen khar gnas pa/ rno ba ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid/ rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin
<p>144b.3</p>thig le de'i gdan du gyur pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od kyis snang ba'i lus can te des gnyi ga yang pad+ma'i sdong bu'i snal ma bkas pa tsam gyi ri mo dkar pos gyen du phug pa'i gnas skabs ni skye ba med pa nyid du ston pa'i gnas skabs te mtha' med pa
<p>144b.4</p>nyid du blta'o/ /thabs dang shes rab de gnyis ni ma skyes pa nyid du ston cing gnas par bshad la/ ye shes kyi mtshan nyid can gyi dbus kyi phra ba'i sku ni ye shes tsam gyi ngo bo nyid de/ nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa la sogs pa
<p>144b.5</p>bag chags thams cad dang bral bas bde bar gnas pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchog gi bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o/ /thig le yang de nyid kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /ri mo de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i ri mo bzhin du sku'i dbus phug cing rdo rje'i
<p>144b.6</p>skyil mo krung gis bzhugs par mnyam par 'jog par bsgom par bya'o/ /'di ni sems so sor rtog pa sku gsum gyi ngo bo nyid dang / de kho na nyid gsang zhing sba ba'i rang bzhin te/ rang sems de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa la so sor rtog pa ni rab tu chud
<p>144b.7</p>cing 'jug pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi srid pa bar mar skye ba bzhin te/ don 'di nyid sngags kyis gsungs pa yin pas de nyid kyis 'dir byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ oM tsit+ta pra ti bya d+haM ka ro mi zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sngon du
<p>145a</p>
<p>145a.1</p>'gro bar byang chub kyi sems stong pa nyid bcu drug gi ngo bo nyid dang / des byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /de la man ngag ni 'di yin te/ a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ aM
<p>145a.2</p>aHzhes bya ba'i yi ge bcu drug po'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnams kyis sems so sor rtog pa yongs su bskor la shar la sogs pa phyogs brgyad kyi phyogs re re zhing yi ge gnyis gnyis kyi phreng ba kun nas zlum pa'i tshul gyis bzhag nas de nas de nyid yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i cha lta
<p>145a.3</p>bu snga ma bzhin du ye shes kyi thig le'i gzugs can shes rab dang / snying rje'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba la snga ma bzhin du de'i nang du chud pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs su byung bar gyur par bsams la/ sems so sor rtog pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi
<p>145a.4</p>thugs ka'i nang na yod pa'i ri mo'i rgyab kyi cha la rgyab dang nye bar yi ge a gnas par bsams la/ de nyid kyi thad kar nyi ma'i cha lta bur yongs su gyur par rnam par bsams te/ de'i 'od kyis reg pa nyid kyis bdag nyid kyi gzugs rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su
<p>145a.5</p>yongs su gyur par bsams te/ mdun na gnas pa'i nyi ma'i cha la gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' bkug nas rang gi lus la bcug ste/ gcig tu byas nas bcing ba dang dbang du byas te/ yid kyis dzaHhU~M baM hoHzhes bya bas gzhag par bya'o/ /mdun na gnas pa'i nyi ma'i
<p>145a.6</p>cha yang de'i rgyab nyid du 'ongs nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs gcig tu gyur par bsam mo/ /sems so sor rtog pa'i cha la yi ge a'i cha steng du bltas pas lhag par gyur pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i sku cung zad rgyas par
<p>145a.7</p>gyur par bsam mo/ /de nas yi ge a rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kar gnas pa nyi ma'i cha dang nye bar gnas pa nyid du bsams la yongs su gyur pa las thad ka'i cha gzhan snga ma dang lhan cig tha mi dad par gyur pas dus gcig tu rang gi gzugs rdo rje rgyal po'i gzugs
<p>145b</p>
<p>145b.1</p>su gyur par bsams la/ phyi rol na gnas pa'i nyi ma'i cha la bzhugs pa'i rdo rje rgyal po bkug la rang gi lus la bcug ste/ bcings nas dbang du byas pas lus cung zad kyis rgyas pas gyur par bsams la/ bdag nyid kyang A nyid kyi 'od kyis dkyil 'khor gyi
<p>145b.2</p>cha las cha gzhan bsams nas rgyas par gyur par bsam mo/ /de ltar rim gyis cha brgyad po thugs ka'i ri mo'i rgyab kyi cha dang / mdun gyi cha la cha brgyad po nyid bsams la/ cha gsum pa nas brtsams te/ i la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams rim gyis rdo rje chags pa la
<p>145b.3</p>sogs pa'i gzugs su gyur pa la mdun na gnas pa'i rdo rje chags pa la sogs pa dgug pa la sogs pa bya zhing rjes su 'gro ba'i nyi ma'i cha rnams kyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi yan lag rdzogs par bskyed la i la sogs pa nyid kyi 'od kyis dkyil 'khor la
<p>145b.4</p>sogs pa'i cha rgyas par byas te/ i la sogs pa nyid kyis rang gi snying ga'i cha rdzogs par bskyed de/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyis rang gi lus rgyas par bya'o/ /des kyang gdan dang / thugs ka dang / rgyab tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gang
<p>145b.5</p>bar bsam par bya'o/ /yang snying gar yi ge a la sngar bshad pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnyis pa bskyed la de gnyis yang gcig tu bya'o/ /gdan dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yang de nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa byas la/ rang gi lus de bzhin
<p>145b.6</p>gshegs pa'i yon tan gyis yongs su gang zhing / sngon ma byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid 'gro ba ma lus pa'i mi shes pa 'jig cing / dga' bar byed pa ri mos phug pa'i skyes bu chen po'i skur byang chub kyi sems bsgoms la/ 'di skad du bo d+hi tsit+taM
<p>145b.7</p>ut+pA da yA mi/ zhes lan gsum brjod la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /snying ga'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge a chos kyi ri mos phug pa ye shes kyi 'od zer rnon po'i tshogs 'phro ba sngon du 'gro ba'i snang ba'i tshogs kyi rdul phra rab kyi ngo bo mi g.yo ba'i ting
<p>146a</p>
<p>146a.1</p>nge 'dzin gyi mthus brtan par gyur pa nam mkha'i khams ma lus par kun du khyab pa'i tshad dang ldan pa'i rdo rje chen po'i gzugs sa bon gyi yi ges mtshan pa 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
<p>146a.2</p>bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i sngar byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ngo bo nyid bsams la/ oM tiSh+Tha badzra zhes lan gsum brjod la byin gyis brlab par bya zhing / de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
<p>146a.3</p>sngon du 'gro bar bya ste 'og ma rnams la yang de bzhin no/ /de nas de nyid kyi gzugs brnyan du gyur pa'i phyir chos kyi ri mos phug pa nyid kun du bzang po'i dpral ba'i phyogs su yi ge a nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang ldan pas nam mkha'i phyogs thams cad kun du gang
<p>146a.4</p>bar gyur par kun du bsams la/ de'i 'od kyis reg ma thag tu nam mkha' ma lus pa'i khongs su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje'i dbyings phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon
<p>146a.5</p>gyi yi ges byin gyis brlabs pa'i mthu las rdo rje chen po de'i lte ba'i dbus su zhugs par gyur par bsams la/ 'od kyi tshogs de rnams las kyang phyi rol tu rtse lnga pa'i rdo rje chen po rnam par bsam mo/ /des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i phyag rgya'i
<p>146a.6</p>gzugs kyis dpag tu med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bcom ldan 'das dam tshig sems dpa'i mchog rdo rje sems dpa' zhi ba rgyan med pa/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/ ye shes rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid la sna rtser rdo rje phra mo yod
<p>146a.7</p>pa/ ral pa dang thor tshugs dkar po 'chang ba/ bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin du yang dag par byung bar bsam mo/ /'di'i thugs kar yang yi ge a dpral ba dang / lkog mar yang yi ge AHdang po ri
<p>146b</p>
<p>146b.1</p>mos phug pa bsams la/ oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes len gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas de nyid kyi spyi gtsug tu yi ge a chos kyi ri mo de nyid kyis phug par bsams la/ rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag rnams las 'od zer rnam par 'phro bar
<p>146b.2</p>bsam mo/ /de nas spyi gtsug nas 'od zer dkar po/ snying ga'i phyogs nas nag po/ kha nas dmar po/ dpral ba nas ser po/ lus kyi 'og dang / lus kyi phan tshun gyi ba spu'i bu ga la sogs pa las ljang gu byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu
<p>146b.3</p>med pa rnams su kha dog dang spyod lam sna tshogs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / mtshon cha mchog dang / dpal mchog dang po dang / bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i sku dpag tu med pa byung
<p>146b.4</p>nas zhi ba dang drag po la sogs pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs pas phye ba rnams kyi don mdzad nas slar yang gcig tu gyur te/ 'dus nas rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i phyag rgya chen po'i skur gyur nas 'od zer gyi rang bzhin gyi tshogs kyi phyi rol du gnas te/ nyi ma'i dkyil
<p>146b.5</p>'khor gyi dbus dang / zhi ba'i sems dpa'i thugs ka dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang / de ltar phyag rgya bzhi phyag rgya'i gzugs kyis sam/ rang gi gzugs kyis skul byed ma'i gzungs zlos pa bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi lha'i sku thugs kar zla ba las
