<p>163a.4</p>rjes kyis dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo la sogs pa'i rtug pa dang / skra brdungs pa dang / khyim bya'i sgo nga dang / bya rog la sogs pa'i gshog pa dang / bshang gci dang / tsher ma dang / rus phye dang / glang po che'i sha la sogs pa'i ji snyed pa dang / rdzas re re la
<p>163a.5</p>khrag dang dug las btags shing sbags pa'i rdzas sam thal ba dang / sol ba dang / phub ma la sogs pa las dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas la/ dug la sogs pa bskus te bcad cing sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dbang du bya ba la ni tsam pa ka dang / a shwa ka dang / bku
<p>163a.6</p>la dang / pri yang ku dang / la ku tsa la sogs pa nags kyi lcug ma'i yam shing sor lnga pa 'dab ma dang bcas pa'am/ skyur zhing dmar ba dang / me tog dang 'bras bu gzhan dang / gzhan dag gam/ rang gi rtog pa las bshad pa'i rdzas rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /
<p>163a.7</p>dgug pa dang yang de dag nyid dam/ tsher ma lcags kyu lta bu yod pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /pa lA sha dang / p+lak+Sha dang / u dum bA ra dang / seng ldeng dang / arka dang / me da dang / be tang ka ta dang / a mra dang / sha mi dang / kas marga dang / a pa marga
<p>163b</p>
<p>163b.1</p>dang / a shwat+tha las byung ba gsar zhing rtse mo ma gas pa/ drang po mtho gang tsam la spos chus bran pa/ sen mo gnyis btags pa'i yam shing las thams cad pa la dbul bar bya'o/ /gang yang zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i sreg rdzas rnams dang / gang yang bdag nyid kyi kha
<p>163b.2</p>zas de dag thams cad nyin re zhing swA hA dang bcas par rang gi lha la rtag tu dbul ba dang / mar gyis spags pa'i gu gul lam/ sA la'i thang chus yang rang gi gsang sngags kyi dbye bas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dri dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas rnams kyang
<p>163b.3</p>las dang rjes su mthun par rang gis gsang sngags ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /sreg rdzas kyi dbang du byas pa'o/ /zhi ba la ni mchod sbyin gyi shing rnams kyi bud shing srog chags med pa/ thab khung las cung zad kyis dma' ba'am/ dgon pa'i ba lang
<p>163b.4</p>gi lci bas bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci ba ma gtogs pa ji skad du bshad pa'i bud shing 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o/ /mngon spyod la ni tsha ba dang / tsher ma can dang / dri ngan pa'i shing rnams sam/ dur khrod pa'am/ bong bu'am rnga mo'i rtug pa la
<p>163b.5</p>sogs pa'am/ shing shin tu skam pas bya'o/ /dbang du bya ba ni ni ma pa dang shing skyur po dang / gzhan yang me tog dang bcas par bya'o/ /dgug pa la tsher ma dang bcas pas so/ /las thams cad pa'i bud shing ni las dang rjes su mthun pas bya'o/ /bud
<p>163b.6</p>shing gi dbang du byas pa'o/ /de nas sgrub pa po khrus byas shing lus dri zhim pos bsgos pa/ byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa gos dkar po gyon te las dang rjes su mthun par 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor nas bsrung ba'i cho ga byas shing bzlas pa dang / mi smra bas
<p>163b.7</p>'jam zhing shin tu bde ba'i stan la pad+ma'i 'dug stangs kyis 'dug pa/ nang par kha shar du bltas te blos bsgrub par bya ba la dmigs nas yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te zhi ba'i yid kyis zhi bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du rgyas pa la rgyan dang phreng ba ser po dang / 
<p>164a</p>
<p>164a.1</p>gos sna tshogs dang bzang po'i 'dug stangs kyis 'dug ste/ dga' ba'i yid kyis byang du bltas nas/ snga dro zla ba nya nas brtsams te rgyas pa bya'o/ /khros shing gos sngon po'am khrag gam chus gsher ba'i gos bgos te/ stan sra ba la lho
<p>164a.2</p>phyogs su kha bltas te/ 'dug pa'am/ bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi brang la mnan cing / stan med par rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te/ sos so bca' zhing mig mi g.yo ba dang / gnyer ma bsdus pas zla ba mar gyi ngo'i mi zad pa'i nyin zhag gang
<p>164a.3</p>yang rung ba la/ khro ba nyid tshad mar bya ste/ nyi ma phyed dam/ nam phyed na mngon spyod bya'o/ /dmar zhing rgyan dmar po la sogs pa dang / nub phyogs su kha bltas shing stan mthon po la rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ dbang gi las bya'o/ /dgug pa la
<p>164a.4</p>yang de dang 'dra ste/ 'on kyang kha steng du lta ba'i lha'i sbyor ba'am/ nub tu bya'o/ /sgrub pa po'i dbang du byas pa'o/ /zhi ba la ni gser ram dngul lam rdo'am/ zangs sam shing ngam sa las byas pa'am/ dung phor dang nya phyis sam lo ma las byas pa'i mchod yon gyi snod
<p>164a.5</p>la nas dang bcas pa'i 'o ma dri dkar po la sogs pa dang / chu bcug pa spos kyis bdugs te/ rang gi lha'i sngags kyi mthar swA hA dang bcas pa dang bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de bzhin du rgyas pa la ni dri la sogs pa ser po dang chu dang til dang bcas pa'i zho la mthar oM
<p>164a.6</p>dang bcas pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni gnag cing dri mi zhim pa'i dri la sogs pa dang / chu dang khrag dang bcas pa dang / ko tra pa dang ba'i gcin las mthar phaT dang bcas pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /dbang la ni dri dmar po la sogs pa dang chu bcug
<p>164a.7</p>pa la mtha' mar ho dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du dgug pa la ni mtha' mar yi ge dzaHdang bcas pa'i rang gi sngags kyi mtha' mar swA hA dang bcas pa dang / de nyid kyis sngags kyi bzlas brjod lan bdun du bya'o/ /thams cad du yang dri dang me tog dang / til dang
<p>164b</p>
<p>164b.1</p>ku sha dang / 'bras yos dang / chu rnams las ji snyed pa las kyi rjes su mthun par gzhug par bya'o/ /mchod yon gyi dbang du byas pa'o/ /de nas zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang du byas pa'i las rnams la/ rdo rje rtse mo dang rdo rje gnod sbyin dag yongs su bzlas
<p>164b.2</p>la/ las thams cad pa'i chu'i snod dang / mchod yon gyi snod rang gi g.yon phyogs su bzhag la/ de dag nyid legs par bzlas pa'i chu lag pa g.yas pas blangs pas bsangs la/ yam shing dang bud shing la sogs pa sreg rdzas rnams ni rang gi g.yas su
<p>164b.3</p>gzhag par bya'o/ /bsad pa dang bskrad pa dang dgug pa la sogs pa'i las rnams la ni bsang gtor dang gzhag pa'i go bzlog ste bya'o/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hU~M/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags te/ 'di'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ mthe'u chung gnyis
<p>164b.4</p>che bar bya ste/ kha'i thad dkar gzhag pa'o/ /oM badzra shi kha re ru Ta ma Ta/ rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags te/ 'di'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul du bya'o/ /rdzas bzhag pa'i tshul du byas pa'o/ /zhi ba la ni shing 'o ma can dang / dgon pa las byung
<p>164b.5</p>ba'i me'am/ rgyun bzhag pa'i mes bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni rgyal po'am rgyal rigs kyi khyim nas byung ba'am/ gtsub shing gi me'am/ nags tshig pa'i mes bya'o/ /drag po la ni dur khrod pa'am/ rdo las byung ba'am gdol ba'i khyim las byung bas bya'o/ /dbang la rje'u
<p>164b.6</p>rigs sam smad 'tshong gi khyim nas byung bas bya'o/ /dgug pa la ni gar mkhan nam rol mo mkhan nam lam ka'i mes bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas me rnam par sbyangs te/ de bzlas pa'i chu dang ku sha blangs nas/ bskor zhing lan gsum bsang gtong
<p>164b.7</p>byas pa'i thab du gtsang zhing shin tu skam pa'i rtsa ba dang bcas pa'i shing bcug la/ rlung yab kyi rlung gis sbar bar bya'o/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la hU~M/ me sbar ba'i sngags so/ de nas rigs kyi snying po len bdun bzlas pa'i mar gyis sbar bar bya'o/ /oM badzra satwa
<p>165a</p>
<p>165a.1</p>AHzhes bya ba 'di bzlas pa'i ku sha gsar pa sngo ljang ma gas shing 'dab ma ma grugs pa/ ha cang mi ring ba kha khyer la kha shar du bltas pa dang / kha lhor bltas pa dang / nub tu bltas pa dang / kha byang du bltas pas gzhag go/ /de nas thab khung
<p>165a.2</p>ku sha'i rtse mo shar du bltas pas g.yog go/ /de nas rang gi lha'i chos kyi yi ge las thab khung bskyed la/ de'i dbus su yi ge raM gru gsum dang bcas pa'i steng du oM las byung ba'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i yi ge raM las byung ba'i me lha las kyi rjes su mthun pa'i gos
<p>165a.3</p>dang rgyan dang gdan dang ldan zhing 'bar ba'i phreng ba can gsus khyim che ba rdo rje rtse gsum dang phreng ba dang dbyug pa dang / gun+d+he 'dzin pa'i rdo rje bsams la/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas mdzub mo dang / mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcings
<p>165a.4</p>te/ rdo rje khu tshur bla 'og tu byas pa'i 'dod pa'i rgyal bo'i phyag rgya 'di dang / hU~M Tak+ki dzaHzhes bya ba'i sngags dang bcas pa dang / phyi rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas thab na gnas pa'i rang gi gzugs la dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang bcing
<p>165a.5</p>ba dang dbang du byas la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba dang / bsrung ba byas te/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis nges par btsir ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya dang / oM badzra san+d+hi baM zhes bya ba'i sngags dang bcas pa dang / phyogs dang dkyil 'khor bcings pa la sogs
<p>165a.6</p>pa byas te/ rdo rje thal mo kha phye ba dang / me rang gi sngags kyis gdan bstabs la/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi sor mo thams cad bkug la/ mthe bong dang mdzub mo rtse sbyar bas me tog blangs te/ zhabs bsil dbul zhing sor mo rnams brkyang ba ni zhabs bsil
<p>165a.7</p>ba'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni oM pra ba ra sat+kA ra pra tIts+tsha swA hA zhes bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ g.yas pa 'bar ba ltar bstan pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ oM badzra a na la mahA b+hU ta dz+wa la ya sarba b+ha smi ku ru
<p>165b</p>
<p>165b.1</p>sarba duSh+DAM hU~M phaT dr-i sh+ya dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM a haM zhes brjod la/ mthar yang me'i drung du sngags 'di lan gsum du brjod do/ /yang lce la rdo rje dkar po rnam par bsams la/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la hU~M phaT/ ces bya ba'i me'i chos kyi phyag rgya dgod do/ /de nas snying gar yi ge a
<p>165b.2</p>las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la/ gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po nyid me'i las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya chen po yi ge hU~M las snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rnam par bsams te/ sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi phyag rgya chen po'o/ /
<p>165b.3</p>oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dbang bskur ro/ /'di'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje bsdams pa nyid las mthe bo mnyam ste bsgrengs la/ mdzub mo dang rtse sbyar nas rdo rje rin po che ltar byas pa'o/ /rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa/ /
<p>165b.4</p>dam tshig 'das na myur du ni/ /rigs kyang thal bar byed par 'gyur/ /oM ha na sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ ces brjod pas dam tshig la gzhag par bya'o/ /'di'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje sems ma bstan par byas la/ mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste gung mo dang sbyar/ mthe bong
<p>165b.5</p>gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis gshibs te/ rdo rje'i rtse mo rnon po ltar bya ba ni dam tshig 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rdo rje bsrung ba bstan par byas la/ rdo rje bcing ba yang bsdam par bya'o zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang / oM badzra ban+d+ha ha~M zhes bya ba'i sngags dang bcas
<p>165b.6</p>pas bdag gis mngon par 'dod pa'i bya ba 'di mdzod cig ces rang gi bsgo ba nges par sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod yon phul la/ las dang rjes su mthun pa'i dri la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag
<p>165b.7</p>par mchod la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis lan gsum bsangs te/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mthe bos rang gi mdzub mo'i rtse mo mnan la brkyang ba dbye ste/ phyag rgya 'di dang me lha'i sngags kyis las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i chu dang lag par 'thor 'thung lan
<p>166a</p>
<p>166a.1</p>gsum byin te/ de'i lce dang dgang gzar dang / blugs gzar gyi kha la rang gi yi dam gyi lha'i sa bon rnam par bkod de/ pus mo gnyis kyi bar du lag pa bzhag nas dang por blugs gzar gyis mar gyi dgang blugs gsum/ zhi ba dang dbang
<p>166a.2</p>dang rgyas pa dang dgug pa'i las rnams la ni zhal cung zad gdangs par dbul bar bya'o/ /drag po la ni shin tu zhal gdangs par dug dang bcas pa'i yungs mar dang / oM badzra a na la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wa la ya/ sarbaM b+ha smi ku ru sarbaM duSh+TAM hU~M phaT/ ces bya ba'i me'i sngags
<p>166a.3</p>kyis sam/ oM ag+na ye ha bya ka bya ba h+nA ye/ di bya di bya ti pa me swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas bgegs med pa dang / bgegs dang bcas pa'i me 'bar ba'i mtshan ma la brtag par bya ste/ 'ja' dang 'dra zhing mdog sdug dang / /byi ru bcag
<p>166a.4</p>pa lta bu dang / /g.yas su 'khyil zhing shin tu snum/ /in+d+ra go ba'i mdog 'dra dang / /le brgan rtsi dang bai DUr+ya'i/ /mdog 'dra'i dbyibs ni blugs gzar dang / /rtse gsum rdo rje pad+ma dung / /nya dang dpal be'u rnga yab dang / /rgyal mtshan gdugs sogs bum pa dang / /g.yung drung lta
<p>166a.5</p>bur 'byung ba dang / /gling bu rdza rnga ltar zab dang / /dri zhim yid du 'ong ba dang / /gser dang dngul 'dra dri ma med/ /nyi ma 'bar 'dra dri med pa'o/ /zhi la kha dog dkar por snang / /rgyas pa la ni gser 'dra zhing / /rjes su chags la dmar por snang / /mngon spyod la ni sngo
<p>166a.6</p>dang gnag /sgrub pa pos ni mdor bsdus na/ /gzhan yang rtse gcig mchog yin te/ /rtse gnyis pa ni 'bring du bshad/ /rtse gsum tha mar shes par bya'o/ /du ba mang zhing rnam par 'phro dang bcas/ /'bar bar dka' zhing cung zad ldang ba dang / /me lce rnam par chad
<p>166a.7</p>cing gzi brjid med/ /rtsub cing gnag pa ba lang sha yi mdog /mdung dang zhib ma lta bu nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin ba lang mgo bo lta bu dang / /mi re'i dri dang dri mi zhim pa dang / /bung bu'i dri dang de bzhin dri ngan dang / /sbyin sreg byed pas 'bar bas gdungs pa dang / 
<p>166b</p>
<p>166b.1</p>me lce rnam par dgod cing g.yo ba rnams/ /de ltar bgegs dang bcas par shes nas ni/ /snga ma bzhin du bsang gtor byas pas zhi/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam par sbyangs la bsrung bar bya/ /de nyid kyi mtha' mar gyi sreg blugs bdun dbul bar
<p>166b.2</p>bya'o/ /yang rang gi gsang sngags kyis bsangs la/ dgang gzar dang / dgang blugs gsum mam bdun nam gcig me lha'i rang gi sngags kyis phul la blugs gzar la sogs pas mar gyi sreg blugs gsum mam bdun dbul bar bya'o/ /'dir rim pa ni/ 
<p>166b.3</p>'bar ba'i me la yam shing ste/ /de nas mar dang de 'og til/ /de nas 'bras chan la sogs pa/ /cho ga 'di ni mdor bsdus pa'o/ /de la zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad ni zhal du'o/ /yam shing dang ni mi rus kyi phye ma la sogs pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du'o/ /zho dang
<p>166b.4</p>'bras chan dang bza' ba dang / til la sogs pa ni phyag tu'o/ /dri ni thugs kar ro/ /me tog ni dbu la'o/ /bdug spos ni 'od 'phro ba la'o/ /zhabs bsil ni zhabs la'o/ /mar me dang mchod yon ni mdun du dbul bar bya ste/ mchod yon gyi chu ni snod du
<p>166b.5</p>blugs par bya'o/ /de nas 'thor 'thung dang / bsang gtor byas la me'i thab khung du 'bar ba'i rnam par bsam/ rang gi gzugs su me'i phyogs su gzhag par bya'o/ /me'i dbang du byas pa'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg gi yo byad rnams/ rdo rje'i rtse mos snga ma
<p>166b.6</p>bzhin du bsangs la/ zhi ba la ni me'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings pa/ zhi zhing na bza' dkar po bsnams shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /pad+ma dkar po la bzhugs pa'o/ /badzra d+hA tu swA hA/ zhes bya ba 'dis
<p>166b.7</p>bsam par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rgyas pa la ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser po/ na bza' dang rgyan ser po mnga' ba dang pad+ma ser po'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ dgyes shing thugs rangs pas mchog stsol ba/ badzra rat+na d+hA tu oM zhes bsam par bya'o/ /
<p>167a</p>
<p>167a.1</p>de bzhin du mngon spyod la ni rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog gnag cing rgyan dang na bza' nag po mnga' ba/ khros pas pad+ma sngon po la bzhugs pa/ yi ge hU~M las bsam par bya'o/ /dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje chags pa thams cad dmar po yi ge ho las bsam
<p>167a.2</p>par bya'o/ /de bzhin du dgug pa la ni rdo rje rgyal po'i yi ge dzaHlas bsam par bya'o/ /yang na thams cad du rang gi lhag pa'i lha nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bsam par bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi bsdu ba dang / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis yang dag par bstod la/ thab la
<p>167a.3</p>gnas pa'i gzugs la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa dang / bgegs bsal zhing bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa byas la/ mchod yon dang zhabs bsil phul te phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa dang / dbang bskur bdag ji lta ba bzhin
<p>167a.4</p>du rang gi rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho gas bya'o/ /de nas zhi ba la ni badzra gan+d+he zhes bya ba dang / dri zhim po dkar po dang / badzra puSh+pe zhes bya ba dang / dkar zhing dri zhim pa'i me tog dang / badzra d+hU pe zhes bya ba dang / snying po dkar po'i bdug spos dang / badzra dI pe zhes bya ba dang / 
<p>167a.5</p>ba'i mar gyi mar me dang / a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ A d+ya nut+pan+na twA ta ces bya ba dang / kha zas dkar gsum mngon par bsngags pa dang / mthar rang gi sngags kyis kyang mchod par bya'o/ /rgyas pa la sogs pa yang de dag nyid las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun pa'i
<p>167a.6</p>kha dog dang ldan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod par bya'o/ /drag po la gnag cing dri mi zhim pa'i dri dang / bil ba dang arka dang / rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i me tog dang / sardza ra sa la sogs pa'i spos dang / mi dang nyal sogs pa'i zhag gi mar me dang / kha ba dang
<p>167a.7</p>tsha ba la sogs pa'i yid du mi 'ong ba'i bye brag can rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod la/ mchod yon dang 'thor 'thung dang bsang gtor dag byas la/ lce la yi ge hU~M rnam par bkod de/ rang gi
<p>167b</p>
<p>167b.1</p>sngags kyis dgang blugs snga ma bzhin du phul te/ rdzas thams cad las re re zhing sbyin sreg lan gsum dbul bar bya'o/ /zhi ba la ni dgang gzar dang blugs gzar byang chub mchog gis gzung ngo / /rgyas pa la ni rin po che'i khu tshur gyis so/ /mngon spyod la ni g.yon
<p>167b.2</p>pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis so/ /dbang du bya ba dang dgug pa la ni pad+ma'i khu tshur gyis so/ /gzhan dag la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so/ /zhi ba la ni rang gi sngags kyi mthar che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas so/ /de bzhin du rgyas pa la mtha' mar oM dang
<p>167b.3</p>sbyar ro/ /mngon spyod la ni mtha' mar phaT do/ /dbang du bya ba'i mtha' mar yi ge hoH'o/ /dgug pa la ni mtha' mar yi ge dzaHste/ bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan par brjod la/ sbyin sreg brgya'am stong ngam dpag tu med pa bya'o/ /thams cad du'am/ de bzhin du
<p>167b.4</p>zhi ba'i thab la ni til gyis sbyin sreg dang zhi ba'i sngags oM sarba pA paM da ha na swA hA/ zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du rgyas pa'i cho ga la ni 'bras kyi sbyin sreg dang / rgyas pa'i sngags oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du las thams cad pa'i thab khung du bcom ldan 'das
<p>167b.5</p>'od dpag tu med pa bsams la/ tshe 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ dUr ba'i myu gu mar la sbags pa'i sbyin sreg sngags 'dis bya ste/ oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ de nyid du bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa de bzhin du bsams la/ bsrung ba bya ba'i phyir til mar las btags pa
<p>167b.6</p>ku sha'i myu gu'i sbyin sreg sngags 'dis bya ste/ oM a pra ti ha ta badzrA ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba brjod la sbyin sreg brgya 'am stong ngam dpag tu med pa bya ste/ 'di ltar thams cad du yang rang gi bskul ba'i tshig ji lta ba dang / rang dang gzhan gyi rtog pa'i cho ga ji lta bas sbyin sreg byas la/ 
<p>167b.7</p>mthar oM sarba ta thA ga ta muSh+Ti baM/ zhes bya ba dang / rigs kyi snying po lan gsum mam/ bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du mar gyi sbyin sreg gis gzi byin bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas tha mar rigs kyi bdag po bzlas pa'i dgang blugs dang mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/ /de
<p>168a</p>
<p>168a.1</p>la oM zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi snying po'o/ /yang hU~M hrIHtrAM a zhes bya ba ni lhag ma rnams kyi'o/ /de nas bsang gtor dang 'thor 'thung lan gsum phul la/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis yang dag par bstod de/ mchod pa thams cad kyis
<p>168a.2</p>snga ma bzhin du yang dag par legs par mchod nas mchod yon phul te/ yang dag par bzlas la yi ge brgya pa brjod nas/ oM khyed kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad/ /ces bya ba la sogs pas bskul la/ rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ gyen du bkrol te rang gi
<p>168a.3</p>sngags tha ma yi ge muHdang bcas par brjod par bya'o/ /lha'i dbang du byas pa'o/ /de nas me lha thab tu bsams la yang legs par mchod cing bsang gtor dang 'thor 'thung bya ste/ sbyin sreg gi yo byad lhag ma rnams phul la tha mar dgang blugs dang 'thor 'thung ji
<p>168a.4</p>lta ba bzhin du phul te/ bsangs la mchod cing mchod yon phul nas mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba btab la/ badzra satwa zhes snga ma bzhin du zlos shing phyag rgya dgrol ba la sogs pa byas nas/ snga ma bzhin du gshegs su gsol te/ oM hUM muHzhes brjod la/ 
<p>168a.5</p>khro bo ti rIn+ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te/ gyen du bkrol la gshegs su gsol lo/ /de ltar nyin re zhing rtag tu thun gsum mam/ thun bzhir bya ba'am/ ji srid rang dang gzhan zhi ba la sogs par gyur gyi bar du bya'o/ /'dir gsungs pa/ na ba'i don du zhi ba bya/ /'byor ba'i
<p>168a.6</p>don du rgyas pa bya/ /gdug pa kun la gsod pa ste/ /dbang la sogs pa phan phyir ro/ /thab dang dgang gzar blugs gzar rdzas/ /shing dang bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams dang / /rdzas bsang dgod dang me sbyangs dang / /bsang gtor dang ni spar ba dang / /ku sha dgram dang
<p>168a.7</p>gnas pad+ma/ /me bskyed spyan drangs la sogs dang / /bsrung bskrad bcings dang mchod yon dang / /zhabs bsil bsgrub pa dbang bskur dang / /dam tshig bsgo dang mchod yon mchod/ /bsang gtor 'thor 'thung sreg blugs dang / /me brtags bsang dang dgang
<p>168b</p>
<p>168b.1</p>blugs dang / /kun bsregs bsang dang bzod gsol dang / /thab dang me lha dgod pa dang / /bsdu dang bstod dang dgug pa dang / /bgegs bsal bsrung dang phyogs bcings dang / /sngon bzhin phyag rgyas dbang bskur la/ /mchod dang mchod yon 'thor 'thung bsang / /
<p>168b.2</p>dgang blugs cig shos las bsgrub dang / /lha rnams gzi byin bskyed pa dang / /me lha dgang blugs mchod yon bcas/ /bsang gtor 'thor 'thung mchod pa dang / /gshegs su gsol bar bya ba'o/ /bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /sbyin sreg cho ga rdzogs
<p>168b.3</p>pa dang / /mdor bsdus pa yi rim ldan pa/ /rab 'byor bskyangs kyis 'di nyid ni/ /rnal 'byor rgyud la dris pa yin/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon rab 'byor bskyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang / zhu chen gyi
<p>168b.4</p>lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI mA nu dar nA ma maN+Dal no pi ka /bod skad du/ dpal ldan rgya che ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /dpal rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gru
<p>168b.5</p>bzhi rdo rje 'chang chen sa/ /gsang sngags lnga yis bsdus pa yis/ /rdo rje theg pa thob byed pas/ /theg pa de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /brgya rtsa bcu yi rnam pa yis/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs bskor zhing / /de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje che/ /rin chen pad+ma sogs
<p>168b.6</p>kyis brgyan/ /sa mchog bcu gsum pa nyid du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan pa/ /gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /de la bdag ni spyi bos 'dud/ /bde gshegs kun la phyag 'tshal te/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma yi/ /dngos grub kun byed rab
<p>168b.7</p>bsngags pa/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya/ /de la dang po rdo rje 'chang chen po slob dpon sangs rgyas kyi cha lugs 'dzin par gyur pas bsam gtan dang rjes su mthun par ri phug gam chu bo'am rdzing bu la sogs pa'i gnas su gnas nas/ grogs bzang pa
<p>169a</p>
<p>169a.1</p>dang ldan pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas te/ kun du bzang po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i tshul gyis bgegs thams cad gzhom par bya ba dang / phyogs thams cad bcings nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i nam mkha' bcing bar byas la/ phyogs bcu na
<p>169a.2</p>mthar thug pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dmigs la mchod pa nyi shu bya zhing sdom pa gzung ba byas la/ rdo rje lta bu'i sgrub thabs kyi chogs bdag nyid bsgrub par byas la/ rang gi snying gar rdo rje pad+ma bsams la/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po
<p>169a.3</p>nam mkha' dang mnyam par sbyor bas rdo rje la bzhugs te gcig tu gyur pa rang rgyal bskyed par bya'o/ /badzra d+hA tu ra haM sa haM zhes brjod pa ji srid mngon du mthong bar gyur pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po grub par gyur pa'i
<p>169a.4</p>phyag rgya ni 'di rnams kyis bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta muSh+Ti haM/ oM badzra satwa muSh+Ti a/ oM badzra rat+na muSh+Ti trAM/ oM badzra d+harma muSh+Ti khaM/ oM badzra karma muSh+Ti haM/ bsgom par mi nus pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa tshig tsam gyis dmigs pa la lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi snying
<p>169a.5</p>po re re zhing 'bum bzlas te/ de lta bus kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub pas ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ snying po dang sngags
<p>169a.6</p>dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rig par bshad pa dkyil 'khor dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya de'i nang na chud par bsams la/ so so'i rig sngags 'bum mam khri bzla ba'am/ ji srid gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor grub pa de srid du bsgom par
<p>169a.7</p>bya'o/ /de la de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te/ /gung mo myu gu bzhin du gshib/ /mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo bsgrengs/ /dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig go/ /de ltar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub
<p>169b</p>
<p>169b.1</p>par bya ste/ rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje phra mo dang / /ting nge 'dzin ni dbang bsgyur ba'o/ /de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /de yis rdo rje brtan par bzung / /
<p>169b.2</p>mthe bong mthe'u chung bcings pa ni/ /rdo rje las mchog dkyil 'khor ro/ /de ltar byas nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ de la rgyal pos ni khru brgya'am khru lnga bcu pa bya'o/ /blon po'am blon po chen pos ni khru lnga bcu pa'am nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o/ /tshong dpon nam ded dpon gyis ni khru nyi shu rtsa lnga
<p>169b.3</p>pa'am de'i phyed do/ /sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis pa'am khru drug pa'o/ /de las chung bar ni mi bya'o/ /de nas sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar bya ste/ gtsug lag khang dang grong rdal dang / /kun dga' grong ngam grong khyer ni/ /gang zhig shar dang byang du lta/ /lho dang nub tu ma
<p>169b.4</p>yin no/ /shis shing sngon ni yongs brten pa'i/ /sa ni mkhas pas bgrod par bya/ /yang na yid ni dga' gyur pa/ /gang yin der ni brtsam par bya/ /der sa gzhi'i dbus su yi ge haM gis zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar bya ste/ rdo dang bong ba shing
<p>169b.5</p>rul pa la sogs pa bsal bar byas nas/ chu'i dri zhim pos yongs su dgang ngo / /de nas legs par bcags te shar dang byang du gzhol ba/ khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du chud pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rta babs kyi phyi rol du shing gi dral sgos bskor cing shing dral sgo bzhis nye bar
<p>169b.6</p>mdzes par byas pas dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi lhag par mdzes par byas par gyur te/ sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o/ /der sa'i dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi gnas pas 'dug la/ bsam gtan bzhi'i rim bzhin dmigs nas 'og min gyi gnas su 'dug ste/ 
<p>169b.7</p>mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs te/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ sems so sor rtog pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis rnam par sangs rgyas nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng du rdo rje rtse mo khang pa brtsegs pa nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
<p>170a</p>
<p>170a.1</p>rnams bsgom par bya ste/ 'di ni dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgoms la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bskyed de rdo rje bsdu ba byas nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la mtshan brgya
<p>170a.2</p>rtsa brgyad kyis bstod par bsgom pa ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng nas babs te dkyil 'khor sa gzhi'i dbus su las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya ste/ bskyed pa'i rim pas 'dug nas rnam

<p>170a.5</p>'khor gyi ni thig gdab bo/ /de nas thig gi phyag rgya dang sngags ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje phyag rgyas thig bzung nas/ /dang por dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo/ /phyi nas thig bzung bya ba ni/ /ji lta bas ni thig gdab bo/ /sngags ni/ oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra ma ti kra ma hU~M/ 
<p>170a.6</p>de nas shar du mngon par phyogs la thig brkyang la slob ma nub tu lta bas thig bri ba dang / slob dpon lho phyogs su mngon par phyogs nas brkyang la/ slob ma byang phyogs su mngon par phyogs la bre bar bya'o/ /de yang / phyogs kun mnyam par byas nas ni/ /mkhas
<p>170a.7</p>pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab ste/ /shar dang nub dang byang dang lho/ /phyogs bzhi'i thig gi dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /ces lung las gsungs pa'o/ /de bzhin du nang gi dkyil 'khor la ni cha brgyad du brtag go/ /de nas cho ga 'di yis ni/ /kun nas zur bzhi legs

<p>170b.1</p>par byas/ /phyogs bzhir yongs su bskor nas ni/ /sngags shes pas ni gnas bya ba/ /dbus kyi gnas ni spangs nas su/ /me yi phyogs su gnas nas ni/ /sngags pas sngags phyogs shes pa yis/ /snga ma bzhin du srad bu bre/ /de nas cho ga shes pa yis/ /

<p>170b.4</p>ldan gyur pa/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /gru bzhi phyogs ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim gyi nang du/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 
<p>170b.5</p>ldan par 'khor lo bre bar bya'o/ /'khor lo de'i nang du rdo rje'i thig gis yongs su bskor bar bya'o/ /sgo ni/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ste/ /sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /rten cing 'brel pa bsngags pa yin/ /nor bu chen po'i
<p>170b.6</p>rin po ches so sor spras pa'i dril bu kha dog sna tshogs pas btags pa'i rlung gis bskyod pa dar dang / /'phan dang / me tog dang phreng ba dang dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / zla bas nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i khyams kyis bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor kun du bres
<p>170b.7</p>pa la/ de'i rim pa'i nang du zhugs la 'khor lo 'dra ba'i thig gis yongs su bskor bar bya'o/ /ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes byas pa/ /rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni
<p>171a</p>
<p>171a.1</p>gzugs bzhag cing / /sangs rgyas kun gyi phyogs kun gyi/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus rnams su/ /rim bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog /bzhi po legs par gzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag tu/ /rdo rje gom pas song nas su/ /mi
<p>171a.2</p>g.yo ba yi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje 'dzin sogs bcas par gzhag /rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par gzhag /tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje spyan sogs rdzogs par gzhag /gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje
<p>171a.3</p>rgya gram la sogs gzhag /'khor lo yi ni nang logs su/ /rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang gzhag /dkyil 'khor phyi yi grwa rnams su/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang gzhag /sgo rnams kun gyi nang du ni/ /sgo srung bzhi yang gzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim
<p>171a.4</p>phyogs su ni/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag /'jug gam phyi rol 'byung ba na/ /ri mo'am rdo rje srad bu dag /yid kyis brdeg pa byas na ni/ /de ni dam tshig nyams mi 'gyur/ /oM badzra be gA kra ma hU~M/ de la rgyal po'i ni rin po che lnga'i phye mas dkyil 'khor bri'o/ /
<p>171a.5</p>blon po chen po dang mdun blon gyis ni rin po che'i phye ma dang bsres pa'am/ 'bras sA lu'i phye mas so/ /ded dpon la sogs pa ni 'bras btags pa'i phye mas so/ /sgrub pa pos ni 'bras kyi phye ma nyid bsngags pa yin no/ /gur gum la sogs pa'i phye ma dri zhim po'i khu bas
<p>171a.6</p>sam tshon lngas btso'o/ /de nas dang por ni sngon po dgye'o/ /de nas ni gser dang pad+ma rA ga dang ma rgad dang mu tig dgye ste/ de yang / sngon po thog mar gtang bar bya/ /de nas ser po gtang bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu dmar po ste/ /de yi 'og tu ljang gu gtang / /kun gyi nang rol
<p>171a.7</p>dkar po ste/ /tshon gyi cho ga de ltar bshad/ /yang na/ yung ba dang rgya skyegs dang / rams mchog ste/ tshon ni bzhi pos btso bar bya/ /lnga la dkar po'i rang bzhin ste/ mnyam pas kun du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la tshon bzlas pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje
<p>171b</p>
<p>171b.1</p>khu tshur gnyis las ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni legs sbyar ba/ /byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni/ /'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hU~M/ tshon la yang sems dpa' chen po bcu drug gzhag par bya'o/ /kun du bzang po'i sbyin sreg gi skabs su 'jug
<p>171b.2</p>pa'i cho ga dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya nas brtsams te/ sems dpa'i rdo rje lcags kyu'i nang du bshad pas 'dir ma smras so/ /de yi sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams/ /dkyil 'khor rnams su
<p>171b.3</p>'dus par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing / /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yi/ /cung zad rab tu brjod par bgyi/ /de nas 'dus pa dgyes pa nas/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams brtan par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab 'grub pa/ /
<p>171b.4</p>grub pa nyid du nye bar gnas/ /de nas phyag rgya dang sngags 'dis sgo dbye bar bya ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las ni/ /mdzub gnyis dam sbyar gan rkyal gzhag /shin tu khros pas rnam dbye ba/ /sgo dbye ba yi mchog yin no/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /mnyam bzhag dbus
<p>171b.5</p>su gnas gyur pa/ /yid kyis dbye bar bya ba nyid/ /rdo rje'i sgo ni bzhi pa'o/ /de la sgo dbye ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra ud+g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya bra be sha ya hU~M/ de nas sgo rnams thams cad du/ /lcags kyu la sogs pa bgyis nas/ /las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis/ /
<p>171b.6</p>dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi/ /rdo rje lta bur bsgrub pa'i cho gas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa/ phyag rgya chen po legs par bsgrubs nas las kyi phyag rgya gzhag par bya ste/ dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgyas dang / /sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pa de ltar
<p>171b.7</p>sems dpa' chen po sgrub pa dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ zhes brjod cing / de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ /sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu pa/ /spyan drangs nas ni rab tu gzhug /bcings nas de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas mchod pa bya ste/ gal te rgyal po nor che ba yin na
<p>172a</p>
<p>172a.1</p>des rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las byung ba'i bum pa brgya'am/ nyi shu'am rtsa lnga'am/ bcu drug gam/ brgyad dam/ lnga'am/ tha na rin po che las byas pa'i bum pa gcig byas la/ lhag ma dag ni zangs dang sa dag las bya'o/ /blon po la sogs pa
<p>172a.2</p>rnams kyis ni longs spyod dang rjes su 'tsham par bya'o/ /de la bum pa'i mtshan nyid ni mchu 'phyang ba mgrin pa ring ba lto ba che ba mgrin pa ras kyis dkris pa kha 'bras bus bkang ba/ rin po che dang sman dang / 'bru dang / spos chus yongs su gang ba byas nas gsang sngags
<p>172a.3</p>kyi bsnyen pa bya'o/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM badzrod ka hU~M/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa'i me tog gi yal gas bzlas brjod stong byas la/ bdag po'i gnas su gzhag go/ /bum pa gzhan rnams ni bzlas brjod brgya byas la/ 
<p>172a.4</p>sgo dang mtshams la sogs pa brgyad du gzhag par bya'o/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag ni 'bum tsam bya ste/ stong las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /spos la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa rnams la ni sngar rang gis mngon par gdab par bya'o/ /mar me'i sdong bu dang spos khang dang / 
<p>172a.5</p>mal stan la sogs pa ni 'bum las lhag par 'bul te/ stong las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /blon po la sogs pas ni 'byor pa dang rjes su mthun par 'bul bar bya'o/ /rta dang glang po dang ba lang gi tshogs shin tu brtags pa rnams kyang 'bul bar bya'o/ /rta babs dril bu
<p>172a.6</p>la sogs pa dang ldan pa ji snyed pa las kyang bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams/ /gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la/ /sems can don kun 'grub pa'i phyir/ /thams cad mdzod ces gsol ba gdab/ /gsol ba btab nas phyi rol tu/ /rdo rje rtse mo'i
<p>172a.7</p>rgyud kyi sngags kyis phyi rol tu gtor ma byin la/ nye reg byas la nang du zhugs te cho ga lhag pa dang ma tshang ba rnams nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas/ phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan dang slob ma dang lhan cig tu dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o/ /phyag rgya ni
<p>172b</p>
<p>172b.1</p>'di yin te/ gang gi tshe rdo rje sems dpa' ston pa na/ slob mas kyang rdo rje khu tshur nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /gal te rgyal po ston pa na/ rdo rje gnod sbyin nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /gang gis rdo rje chags pa ston pa na rdo rje bsrung ba nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin
<p>172b.2</p>ston pa na rdo rje las nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /phyag rgya rang gi gnas su bkrol la thal mo mnyam pas mnyes par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe rdo rje smra ba ston pa na rdo rje rin chen nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe rdo rje 'khor lo ston pa na rdo rje gzi brjid nye bar bstan par
<p>172b.3</p>bya'o/ /gang gi tshe rdo rje rnon po ston pa na rdo rje rgyal mtshan nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe rdo rje chos ston pa na rdo rje bzhad pa nye bar bstan par bya ste/ phyag rgya bkrol zhing rang bzhin gyi gnas su thal mo nges par bcings te/ de ltar byas pas ni dkyil 'khor du rdo rje
<p>172b.4</p>'dzin pa la sogs pa byin gyis rlob par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyi las yin no/ /dkyil 'khor gyi las ni zla ba nya nas brtsams nas phyi ma'i zla ba nya'i bar ram/ tshes gcig nas brtsams nas zla ba nya'i bar ram bcu
<p>172b.5</p>gnyis nas brtsams nas nya'i bar ram phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ni nyin mtshan gcig gis bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yongs su bzung nas lhag par gnas par bya ste gzhug par bya'o/ /phyag na rdo rjes byin brlabs shing / /de bzhin dad pas
<p>172b.6</p>bsgrub pa dang / /byang chub sems dang 'gro don gyis/ /byang chub sems dpar 'gyur bas na/ /dag pa'i chos kyi rjes 'jug pa/ /theg pa che la lhag mos pas/ /thams cad du ni kun 'grub 'gyur/ /zhes bya bas rdo rje slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan pas slob ma yongs su
<p>172b.7</p>gzung zhing snod du rung bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis rigs kyi bu smros shig ces brjod par bya'o/ /slob mas kyang / byang chub sems ni bla med pas/ /rdo rje slob dpon bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /
<p>173a</p>
<p>173a.1</p>dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /sangs rgyas kun ni brtul zhugs che/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /dkon mchog gsum yang bdag la stsol/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang / /slob dpon dag kyang bdag
<p>173a.2</p>'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi/ /slob dpon du yang bdag 'gyur gyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /sdom pa dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa yang / /sdom pa bdag la stsal du gsol/ /de bzhin las kyi rigs chen la/ /sems
<p>173a.3</p>can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /mgon pos bdag la sdom pa stsol/ /zhes brjod par bya ste/ de ltar yongs su bzung nas lhag par gnas par bya ste/ snying ga dang spyi bor de bzhin du bsams la/ khu tshur g.yas pas rdo rje bzung nas snying gar bzhag na lhag par gnas
<p>173a.4</p>bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sdom pa sbyin par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /
<p>173a.5</p>byang chub tu ni nges byas pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pas/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /de bzhin
<p>173a.6</p>brtan par gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spong ngo / /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar
<p>173a.7</p>bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba
<p>173b</p>
<p>173b.1</p>theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog dag pa la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par
<p>173b.2</p>bgyi/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma bsgal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba ni bdag gis dgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /de ltar sdom pa 'dzin
<p>173b.3</p>nus pa de la ni dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la gal te bgegs byung bar gyur na/ de'i tshe rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags 'bum bzlas pa'i phur bus bgegs thams cad la gdab par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su phur bus gdab bo/ /
<p>173b.4</p>phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyab tu lcags ri'i thig gdab/ de'i rgyab tu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyab kyi phyi rol tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa'i bgegs rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug la bcings te phur bus gdab/ shar lho'i mtshams su ni me'i bgegs
<p>173b.5</p>so/ /lhor ni yi dwags kyi bgegs so/ /lho nub tu ni srin po la sogs pa'i bgegs so/ /nub tu ni klu la sogs pa'i bgegs so/ /nub byang tu ni rlung gi bgegs so/ /byang du ni gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i bgegs so/ /byang shar du ni 'byung po'i bgegs so/ /
<p>173b.6</p>gsang sngags 'di phur bus gdab bo/ /oM badzra kI li sarba bi g+h+nAM ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje spyan dang rdo rje me ltar rab tu phur bus bsrung bar bya'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis steng du nam mkha' bcing ngo / /rdo rje 'jigs byed rdo rje spyan dang rdo rje bsdams pa'i steng du rdo rje dra ba byas
<p>173b.7</p>te/ de yang / sems can 'tshe bar byed pa dang / /sdig pa med kyis khyed ma 'jigs/ /rig sngags las byung dge ba sbyin/ /bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung / /zhes gsungs pas so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba thams cad rdzogs pa nas lha rnams ji lta
<p>174a</p>
<p>174a.1</p>ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol/ phur bu bton nas 'o mas bkrus te/ sems can thams cad la dmigs nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /shar phyogs kyi sgor kha khyer gyi phyi rol rdo rje lta bu'i kha khyer la byang du mngon par bltas nas/ til
<p>174a.2</p>bsregs nas sdig pa bsreg par bya'o/ /de bzhin du lho sgor rin po che 'dra ba'i kha khyer la shar du mngon par bltas nas rgyas par 'dod pas 'bras kyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de bzhin du nub sgor zla ba kham pa lta bu'i kha khyer la byang du mngon par bltas nas tshe
<p>174a.3</p>'phel bar 'dod pas dUr ba'i myu gu mar la spags pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi sgor go cha 'dra ba'i kha khyer la lho phyogs su mngon par bltas nas bsrung ba'i phyir/ ku sha'i myu gu til mar gyis byugs pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yang na
<p>174a.4</p>de bzhin du shar sgor kha khyer kun nas zlum po'i rnam pa la til la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /thab khung gi phyi rol du shar nas byang du blta ba dang / byang nas shar du blta ba dang / lho nas shar du blta ba dang / nub nas lhor blta ba dang / ku sha bkram la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /
<p>174a.5</p>de yang dkyil 'khor de dag de nyid ni/ /su zhig gis ni brtag par nus/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor brtag pa grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /slob dpon gyis rab tu bcug nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob
<p>174a.6</p>dpon gyi las rnams bslab par bya ste/ de nyid ni rdo rje slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i gnas gsang ba ste/ gsang ba ni 'di nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /de nas rdo rje slob ma'i tshogs rab tu bcug la/ rdo rje'i chu la 'bum bzlas pas
<p>174a.7</p>dbang bskur la/ rdo rje slob dpon nyid thob par 'gyur te/ 'di yang rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/ /oM badzrod ka hU~M 'dis dbang bskur na dkyil 'khor thams cad bri zhing bdag nyid dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/ /de bzhin
<p>174b</p>
<p>174b.1</p>gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i slob dpon gzhan ni/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug cing dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje slob dpon gyi las dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par ni de nyid las 'byung bas
<p>174b.2</p>'dir ma smras so/ /de lta mod kyi khyad par cung zad cig bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma las yon blang bar bya ste/ slob mas kyang gus pas mchod yon sngon du 'gro bas yon dbul bar bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lhag par mos pas yon gyi mchog
<p>174b.3</p>rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /gang la yongs su btang dga' gang / /de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /de la gal te mchog 'dod la/ /de yang ngan pa'i yon 'bul na/ /kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pas na/ /de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de
<p>174b.4</p>bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du lhag par mos pas ni/ bu mo shin tu brgyan pa'am/ de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag /phul nas rin gyis slu ba ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon/ /phyag na rdo rje'i ni rin chen rgyan thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa phul nas slar rin
<p>174b.5</p>gyis slu bar bya'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gis ni shin tu dkar ba'i ras zung ngam mu tig gi phreng ba bzang po'o/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i rta dang glang po dkar po'am shing rta nor bu rin po che la sogs pas brgyan pa'o/ /rdo rje sna tshogs kyi ni yon thams cad blangs la
<p>174b.6</p>cho ga 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de la rgyal po ni rin po che las byas pa'i dbu rgyan no/ /lhag ma rnams ni lugs ma'am bcos ma byas pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i rin po che dang / dar dpyangs dang dbang bskur ba'i dbu rgyan no/ /
<p>174b.7</p>phyag na rdo rje'i ni rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i nor bu'i dbu rgyan no/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i nor bu'i dbu rgyan no/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i ni rdo rje rin chen gyi myu gu dang ldan pa'i dbu rgyan no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje rin po
<p>175a</p>
<p>175a.1</p>ches khams gsum gyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i nor bu'i dbu rgyan te/ dbu rgyan gyi gsang sngags sngar bzlas brjod 'bum byas la dbang bskur ba'i dus su dbu rgyan rang gi gsang sngags kyis lan brgya bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas dar dpyangs mgo la
<p>175a.2</p>bcings nas rang gi rdo rje lag par bzhag la/ ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /de nas khyod don 'byung ba'i dngos grub kyi ye shes dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do/ /de nas de gang mngon par
<p>175a.3</p>'dod pa de la sbyin par bya'o/ /yang na phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par 'dod na de la rdo rje lta bu'i thabs kyi sgrub pa'i tshul gyis rang la sgrub pa'i thabs nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi gnas su phyag rgya bkrol la dbang bskur ba dang cho ga bcings pa dang / mnyes par
<p>175a.4</p>bya ba la sogs pa byas nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la gyen du bkrol la/ sems can log par lta ba dang / sdig pa'i las byed pa dang / brtson 'grus chung ba dang / sbyor ba med pa dang / ri mo mi shes pa de dag gi phyir kun du bzang po'i sbyin sreg gi cho
<p>175a.5</p>ga'i tshul gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor khru bcu pa'i phyed kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o/ /yo byad thams cad dang mi ldan pa rnams dang / dam tshig 'dod pa rnams la ni phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du khams gsum
<p>175a.6</p>rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga'i rjes su 'brangs pa dang / rang gi rtog pa'i cho gas bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bsdus pa las/ /bsod nams bdag gis bsags pa de/ /des ni sems
<p>175a.7</p>can ma lus pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog 'grub shog /dpal ldan rgya che ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sa man+ta b+ha dra nA ma ho ma lo bi ka /bod skad du/ kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i sbyin
<p>175b</p>
<p>175b.1</p>sreg gi cho ga/ /bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems brtan las byung ba/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag 'tshal te/ /dngos grub thams cad kun bsdus pa/ /sbyin sreg de nyid bdag gis bshad/ /de nyid rigs pas sbyin sreg la/ /
<p>175b.2</p>dgos pa dang po kun byas te/ /grogs bzang bya ba nges pa dang / /phyi nas sbyin sreg rab tu bya/ /gtsug lag khang dang grong rdal dang / /kun dga' grong ngam grong khyer ni/ /shar dang byang du blta ba ste/ /lho dang nub tu ma yin no/ /shis shing sngon ni ston pa yi/ /
<p>175b.3</p>sa ni mkhas pas bgrod par bya/ /yang na yid ni dga' 'gyur ba/ /gang yin der ni brtsam par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs nas su/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bya ste/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas la/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang
<p>175b.4</p>dag ldan/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen sbras par ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo/ /de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la/ /sbyin sreg thab ni bri bar bya/ /kun nas zur
<p>175b.5</p>ni bzhi pa la/ /khru gnyis par ni yongs su bsgrags/ /zabs su khru gang tsam la ni/ /kha khyer bzhi ni bskor ba'o/ /dbus su gtsug tor dgod bya zhing / /de yi shar du lhung bzed do/ /lho phyogs na ni rin chen te/ /nub kyi phyogs su pad+ma bri/ /byang du rdo rje hU~M mdzad ni/ /
<p>175b.6</p>gdug pa thams cad zlog pa'o/ /mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad du/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa bstan pa dgod/ /de ltar thab khung nges byas nas/ /kha khyer la ni 'jug par bya/ /dang po la ni sems dpa' che/ /bcu drug nyid du bsgrags pa yin/ /de yi rgyar ni sor brgyad la/ /
<p>175b.7</p>dpangs su sor ni bzhi pa'o/ /kha khyer gnyis par gyur pa dag /de yang rgyar ni sor brgyad de/ /dpangs su sor ni brgyad par bshad/ /de dgongs bdag gis bshad par bya/ /shar phyogs nas brtsams rim bzhin du/ /pad+ma nags kyi mjug ma dang / /bgrang phreng ril
<p>176a</p>
<p>176a.1</p>ba spyi blugs dang / /a dze na yi phyag rgya ni/ /tri shU la dang zla ba phyed/ /ral pa mig dang rgyal mtshan che/ /mdzes shing bde ba'i phyag rgya che/ /lho yi phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /dung dang 'khor lo be con dang / /ral gri dang ni de bzhin phub/ /phag dang
<p>176a.2</p>seng ge gshibs pa ni/ /nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /mdung dang dril bu ba dan dang / /rma bya de bzhin ra skyes dang / /khyim bya lang tshos myos pa ni/ /byang gi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /kha khyer gsum par gyur ba dag /de yang rgyar ni sor brgyad pa/ /dpangs su sor ni bcu drug
<p>176a.3</p>pa/ /sgo glegs dang ni gtan par bcas/ /de yi phyogs bzhir rta babs dang / /bcas pa'i sgo rnams bya ba dang / /dra ba dra phyed me long bcas/ /ba dan la sogs rnams kyis bskor/ /kha khyer bzhi par bshad pa ni/ /khor yug lta bur yang dag gnas/ /rgya ru
<p>176a.4</p>sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /dpangs su sor ni drug pa'o/ /de yang rdo rje phreng bas brgyan/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'od 'khrugs pa/ /'di ni bsrung ba'i mchog yin zhes/ /rdo rje can gyis sngon gsungs so/ /sdig kun 'phrog cing bsod nams dang / /dag byed dngos grub
<p>176a.5</p>thams cad ster/ /bkra shis pa nyid yin bshad pa/ /'di ni thab khung yin par bsgrags/ /gang yang brgya rtsa bcu pa yis/ /thab khung bzang po bshad pa rnams/ /spyi yi thab khung gang yin pa/ /bye brag can bzhin gnas pa yin/ /thab khung gi mtshan nyid do/ /dgang
<p>176a.6</p>gzar dang blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid ni 'di yin te/ dgang gzar gyi yu ba ni rgyal po'i lag pa'i tshad kyis sor bcu drug kun nas sor bzhi pa/ dgang gzar gyi zabs su sor gnyis pa/ steng du sor bzhi pa/ dbus su rdo rje rtse lngas mtshan pa/ /yu ba'i 'og tu rdo rje dang rin
<p>176a.7</p>po ches mtshan pa ni dgang gzar gyi mtshan nyid do/ /blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid ni khru gang tsam la steng du pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba sor gnyis pa la/ dbus rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa ni blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid do/ /khrus dang nye reg la 'bad nas/ rtag tu sbyin sreg khang par
<p>176b</p>
<p>176b.1</p>'jug /de nas bgegs rnams nyer zhi'i phyir/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rjes dran bya/ /de la khro bo'i rgyal po ni 'di yin te/ khro bo ti rIn+tI ri'i phyag rgya bcings la/ hU~M badzra a na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hU~M phaT/ khro bo ti rI n+ti ri'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje bcing
<p>176b.2</p>ba nang du bcings la/ mthe bong gnyis po mnyam pas/ sor mo'i rtse mo thams cad btsir bar bya ste/ 'dis ni bdud la sogs pa bgegs thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro/ /de nas go cha 'dis phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ rdo rje gtsug tor dang / rdo rje zhags
<p>176b.3</p>pas shar phyogs bcing ngo / /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /mthe'u chung gcig la gcig sbrel te/ mdzub mo gnyis rtse sbyar nas rtse mo bzlog ste/ spyi gtsug tu gzhag pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya ste/ sngags la oM hU~M ban+d+ha hU~M/ zhes kyang smros/ rdo rje gtsug
<p>176b.4</p>tor nyid zlum por byas pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya ste sngags la hrIHbadzra pA sha hU~M/ de nas rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bya/ mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang pa 'di ni
<p>176b.5</p>rdo rje ba dan gyi phyag rgya ste sngags la oM badzra pa tang+ki pa tang+ki ni ra Ta/ de nas rdo rje nag pos byang dang 'og dang steng dang mtshams rnams bcings te/ rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba bcings la mthe bo brkyang ste/ mdzub mo gnyis mche ba 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje nag po'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags
<p>176b.6</p>la hrIHbadzra kA li ru Ta ma Ta/ de nas rdo rje rtse mos lho phyogs bcings te/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /rtse mo ltar steng du gzhag pa ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la oM badzra shi Sha re ru Ta ma Ta/ de nas rdo rje spyan gyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar
<p>176b.7</p>bas bgegs bcing bar bya ste/ rdo rje bsdams pa byas la/ mthe bo gnyis brkyang ste mnyam por gzhag pa ni/ rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya ste/ /sngags la oM badzra nai tri ban+d+ha sar+b+ba big+h+dAM rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis brkyang pa ni rdo rje ti rIn+ti ri'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis
<p>177a</p>
<p>177a.1</p>spyi bo nas brtsams te bdag nyid dbang bskur ba byas la dar dpyangs pa'i tshul du bkrol nas mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /rdo rje khu tshur g.yon pa snying gar gzhag /rdo rje khu tshur g.yas pa bsor ba'i
<p>177a.2</p>tshul du gzhag pa ni rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i phyag rgya ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar bas bdud la sogs pa'i bgegs thams cad bsregs pa dang 'tshed pa dang thal bar byed pa la sogs pa la khyab par byas te/ sngags la oM badzra dz+wA la a na lArka hU~M/ 
<p>177a.3</p>rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bcings la/ g.yas nas bskor bas phyogs bcing shing / dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas nas rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi steng du rdo rje rab byas na dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sa gzhi bcings bar bya ste/ rdo rje bsdams pa kha thur du bstan
<p>177a.4</p>te sa la bzhag nas sa'i gzhi rnams rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur te/ rang bzhin ngan pa rnams kyis 'jug par dka' bar 'gyur ro/ /sngags ni oM badzra dr-i D+ho me b+hA ba ra kaSha sar+b+baM swA hA/ zhes pa 'dis sa bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas nam mkha'
<p>177a.5</p>bcing bar bya ste/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje nag mo'i phyag rgya nyid do/ /sngags ni oM badzra yak+Sha hU~M/ de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi mig gi phyag rgyas steng bcing bar bya ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mgal me bskor ba'i tshul du bskor te mgo bo'i
<p>177a.6</p>steng du mdzub mo lcags kyu 'dra bar gzhag pa ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni oM hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje bsdams pas rdo rje'i dra ba bya ste/ rdo rje bsdams pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni oM badzra ban+d+ha/ de nas dogs
<p>177a.7</p>pa med par gyur par byas nas mchod pa bya ste/ rdo rje thal mo brkyang nas lus thams cad kyis phyag bya'o/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pas+tha nA ya/ At+ma nAM nir+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ de nas de bzhin du gnas la rdo rje thal mo snying gar gzhag
<p>177b</p>
<p>177b.1</p>ste dpral bas phyag bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi She kA ya At+ma nAM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ de nas rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag la khas phyag bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra brtan ya At+ma nAM ni R+Ya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+har+m+ma pra brta
<p>177b.2</p>ya mAM/ de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste/ snying gar bzhag nas mgos phyag bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza kar+m+ma Ni At+ma nAM nir+yA ta yA mi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra kar+m+ma ku ru mAM/ des ni mchod pa bye ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa bcings
<p>177b.3</p>la/ pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te/ spyi bo sa la gtugs pa ni phyag bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta pA da ban+d+ha naM ka ro mi zhes bya'o/ /bdug spos kyi phyag rgya bcings la/ lha'i bdug pa'i mchod pa rnams dran bzhin du sngags 'di brjod do/ /
<p>177b.4</p>oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la/ thang las skyes pa dang chu las skyes pa'i me tog gi sprin rnams spros te/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta puSh+pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas mar me'i phyag rgya bcings la/ nyi
<p>177b.5</p>ma'i snang ba dbul bar bya ste/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ byug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ lha la sogs pa'i spos kyi sprin rnams dbul bar bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas rin po che'i bye
<p>177b.6</p>brag la sogs pa rnams dbul te/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta po d+h+yaM ga rat+nA laM kA ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas rtsed mo'i bde ba thams cad dbul te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta hA s+ya lA s+ya kr-i Da ra ti sau khya a nut+ta ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas gos kyi mchod
<p>177b.7</p>pa rnams dbul te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+h+yA laM ka ra bas+t+ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings te/ sems can thams cad kyi tshangs pa chen po'i gnas bzhi thob par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsa tur ma hA
<p>178a</p>
<p>178a.1</p>brah+ma bi ha ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas rdo rje bsnyems pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi sems la gnas par gyur cig ces brjod nas de dbul te/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bo d+hi tsit+ta pU dza mi g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa
<p>178a.2</p>ma ye hU~M/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzrod b+ha bA dA na pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje sgeg mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /sems can
<p>178a.3</p>thams cad tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bo d+ha d+ya har shI la pA ra mi tA pU dza ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /sems can
<p>178a.4</p>thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul te/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta d+har+m+ma a ba bo d+hi k+Shan ti pA ra mi tA pU dza mi g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje glu mkhan ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /sems can thams cad
<p>178a.5</p>'khor ba yangs su spong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta san sA rA pA ri t+yaM ka bIr+ya pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje gar mkhan
<p>178a.6</p>ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /sems can thams cad bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan zhing sems zhi bar gyur cig ces brjod la/ bdag gis bsam gtan sangs rgyas thams cad la dbul te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sau khya bi hA ra d+ya na pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ bsam
<p>178a.7</p>gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje me tog ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'i phyir de dran par bya ste/ 
<p>178b</p>
<p>178b.1</p>oM sarba ta thA ga ta kle shats+tshe da sa man+ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje bdug pa ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /bdag nyid 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi tshad dang mnyam par bsams la btud par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga
<p>178b.2</p>ta kA ya ni r+ya ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i lce bsams la bstod pas mchod pa bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAka pra brtan pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ bsod nams de rnams bsdus la sems
<p>178b.3</p>can thams cad la nye bar bsngo bar bya ste/ oM sar+b+ba tha thA ga ta tsit+ta ni r+yA ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ mchod pa nyi shu rdzogs so/ /de ltar mchod pa byas nas dam tshig dang sdom pa blang bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag
<p>178b.4</p>la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges byas pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bar
<p>178b.5</p>bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /de bzhin brtan par gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon
<p>178b.6</p>mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spong ngo / /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam
<p>178b.7</p>tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dam pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog
<p>179a</p>
<p>179a.1</p>chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan pa ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas ni/ /sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa
<p>179a.2</p>ma lus gzung / /ma brgal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das gzhag bgyi/ /sdom pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya
<p>179a.3</p>ni/ /cho ga bzhin bcings zhugs nas kyang / /s+pho Ta'i phyag rgyas dbab par bgyi/ /de la dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyi/ /gung mo btang bar gyur pa yi/ /mthe bo mthe'u chung so sor bsgreng / /sems dpa'i rdo rje rdo rje bsgreng / /shar
<p>179a.4</p>phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje zhags pas bskul bar bya ste/ badzra bA sha hU~M/ nub phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog rjes su dran par bya ste/ badzra s+pho Ta baM/ byang
<p>179a.5</p>phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje dril bu brjod par bya ste/ badzra A be sha aH/ rdo rje 'bebs pa rjes su dran pas bskor ba lan gsum bya'o/ /oM badzra be gA ku ma hU~M/ rdo rje sems ma'i snying po ni/ sa ma ya s+t+waM oM sa ma ya hU~M/ snying po 'dis sbyin sreg gi khang par rtag tu 'jug par bya'o/ /
<p>179a.6</p>oM sa ma ya pra be sha ya mi hU~M/ oM pad+ma s+pho Ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa ba a/ gsang sngags 'di dang / rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcing ba sbyar ba byas la ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ /a zhes bya ba lan brgya bzlas na bab par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa yang ci 'dod
<p>179a.7</p>par bzlas par bya'o/ /gsol ba btab la/ phyag rgya de snying gar bcings nas/ snying po 'dis dgrol bar bya'o/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ shA shwa to me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ hr-i da ya me a d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ 
<p>179b</p>
<p>179b.1</p>sarba kar+m+ma su tsa me tsi t+taM shre yaHku ru hU~M ha ha ha ha hoH/ da nas phreng ba de thab khung du snying po 'dis dor bar bya'o/ /oM pra tI ts+tsha badzra hoHde nas phreng ba de rang gi mgo la snying po 'dis bcing bar bya'o/ /pra tI gr-ih+Na swA mi maM satwa ma hA ba la/ de nas snying po 'dis rang gi gdong g.yogs dgrol
<p>179b.2</p>bar bya'o/ /oM badzra satwa swa yaM te d+h+ya/ tsak+Shu ud+d+ha Ta na ta d+ha ba ra/ ud+g+ha Ta ya te sar+b+ba k+Sho badzra tsak+Shur a nut+ta ra ma he badzra pA sh+ya de nas rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i spos chu dang / snying po 'dis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ de nas rdo rje dbyings
<p>179b.3</p>kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de la de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol nas ni/ /mdzub mo rtse mo bkug nas ni/ /gung mo mnyam pa'i tshigs su sbyar/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang
<p>179b.4</p>mor bshad/ /de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya/ /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya/ /pad+mo srin lag mthe'u chung gung / lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang / /de la de rnams kyi rig pa ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra d+hA ti shwa ri hU~M/ oM badzra badzri ni hU~M/ oM rat+na badzra ni hU~M/ oM d+har+m+ma badzri ni
<p>179b.5</p>hU~M/ oM karma badzra ni hU~M/ de nas rang gi rdo rje lag tu bzhag nas/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang / /de ring khyod ni bskur bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long / /oM badzra a d+hi pa ti twaM/ a b+hi
<p>179b.6</p>Shiny+tsA mi tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas snying po 'dis rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra satwa twaM ma hA a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM badzra na ma a b+hi She ka ta he badzra nA ma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o/ /'di ni
<p>179b.7</p>sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM d+ha ra yA mi/ badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hU~M/ bdag la byin gyis brlab la sogs/ /ji
<p>180a</p>
<p>180a.1</p>lta bar ni bka' nod do/ /de ltar bgyis nas bdag ming brjod/ /de nas rdo rje bsgrub par bgyi/ /zhes gang gsungs pa de slar yang bshad pa de dag yin no/ /rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni/ /se gol mang po brdab
<p>180a.2</p>bgyis la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi/ /dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ snying po 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na/ des sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs par 'gyur na/ gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 
<p>180a.3</p>de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing / /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi/ /de nas sgo rnams thams cad du/ /lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas/ /las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yin/ /dam tshig rnams ni
<p>180a.4</p>gzhug par bgyi/ /dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang / /sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pas/ /de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes brjod cing / de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ /sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu bar/ /spyan drangs nas ni rab tu
<p>180a.5</p>bcug /bcings nas de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams/ /gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la/ /thams cad don kun 'grub pa'i phyir/ /thams cad mdzod ces gsol ba bgyi/ /de nas sbyin sreg gi yo byad thams cad rdo rje'i rtse mo'i
<p>180a.6</p>sngags kyis bsangs la g.yas phyogs su gzhag go/ /mchod yon gyi snod ni g.yon du bzhag nas/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gsang sngags ni 'dis dgang blugs gsum dbul lo/ /oM badzra
<p>180a.7</p>dz+wa la ag+ne/ pra dIp+ta A kaR+Sha ya sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ya badzra hU~M dzaHde nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad thab kyi dbus su ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms la/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings nas/ til gyi sreg blugs
<p>180b</p>
<p>180b.1</p>dbul lo/ /yam shing dmar po rnams kyi me/ /rab sbar rdo rje khro bo yi/ /mnyam par gzhag par snyoms zhugs par/ /til bsregs pas ni sdig bsregs shing / /gsang sngags ni 'dis bya ste/ oM sar+b+ba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ khyim rgyas par 'dod pas
<p>180b.2</p>bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan thab kyi dbus su bsgoms la/ mar gyi dgang blugs gsum dbul lo/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /me ni rab tu spar nas kyang / /rtag tu 'bras ni sreg byas na/ /gdon mi za bar khyim rgyas 'gyur/ /gsang
<p>180b.3</p>sngags ni 'dis bya ste/ oM badzra puSh+TA ye swA hA/ de nas tshe ring bar 'dod pas/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa thab kyi dbus su bsams la/ mar gyi dgang blugs gsum dbul lo/ /yam shing dmar po rnams kyis kyang / /mkhas pas rtag tu me sbar
<p>180b.4</p>te/ dUr ba'i myu gu mar bcas pas/ /sbyin sreg byas na tshe 'phel 'gyur/ /gsang sngags ni 'dis bya ste/ oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ de nas bdag gam gzhan rnams bsrung bar 'dod pas/ bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa thab kyi dbus su bsgoms la/ 
<p>180b.5</p>til mar gyi [(]dgangs [,]dgang [)]blugs gsum dbul lo/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /me ni rab tu spar byas la/ /ku sha'i yal ga 'bru mar gyis/ /sbyin sreg byas na nges par bsrung / gsang sngags ni 'dis bya ste/ oM a pra ti ha ta badzrA ya swA hA/ de nas rang gi
<p>180b.6</p>lha thab kyi dbus su bsams la til dang 'bras dang mar dang dUr ba dang til mar dang / ku sha'i myu gu la sogs pa dbul ba dang / dgang blugs dang po dang rdzogs khar dbul bar bya'o/ /zhi ba phal cher srod la bya'o/ /rgyas pa snga dro bya ba yin/ /mngon spyod nyi ma gung la ste/ 
<p>180b.7</p>sgrub pa pos ni mdor bsdus pa'o/ /zhi la kha dog dkar po ste/ /rgyas la ser por snang ba yin/ /rjes su chags la kha dog dmar/ /mngon spyod la ni sngo dang gnag /de'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ rdo rje lcags kyu mda' dgu dang / /rin chen nyi ma rgyal
<p>181a</p>
<p>181a.1</p>mtshan 'dzum/ /pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo gzung / /las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcang / /zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / /dUr ba dang dri'i mtshan mar gyur pa rnams te de rnam par mthong nas/ dgang blugs phul la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi lha rnams tshim par
<p>181a.2</p>byas nas bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /de bas na nus pa med pas kyang ci nus pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /nus pa med pa'i phyir brjod par bya ste/ rang gi khang pa'i byang shar gyi phyogs su thab khung zur bzhi'am/ zlum
<p>181a.3</p>por khru gang tsam la zabs su mtho gang tsam brkos te thab kyi dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa sor brgyad pa'i tshad la dpangs su sor bzhi pa bzhag thab kyi ngos la dpangs su sor bzhi pa'i grwa bzhir rdo rjes mtshan par bya'o/ /de la phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa ni 'di yin te/ thal mo
<p>181a.4</p>dam du sbyar ba las/ /sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rim pa rnams nye bar bstan te/ rdo rje bcing bas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ngo / 
<p>181a.5</p>rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya de nyid bcings nas/ rab tu bsdams pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa ste snying gar dgrol lo/ /badzra b+han+d+ha tra Ta/ de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcings la rang la byin gyis brlab pa nas ji srid rdo rje rjes su dran pa dang dgug pa la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i bye brag rnams rang gi
<p>181a.6</p>lus dang ngag yid rdo rje la dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /a rdo rje khu tshur gyis mdzub mo sbyar ba ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /
<p>181a.7</p>de nas zhugs nas rang la byin gyis brlab pa nas ji srid sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis mdza' bo nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa' rjes su dran la/ snying po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /sa ma ya satwa haM/ 'dis ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i
<p>181b</p>
<p>181b.1</p>phyag rgyas dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa' dang gcig tu gyur pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /de nas thun mong gi sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshig sems dpa' chen po de nyid rang gi lus la brten cing zla ba'i
<p>181b.2</p>dkyil 'khor thams cad la bzhugs shing / rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i sku bdag nyid du snying po 'dis bsgom par bya'o/ /sa ma ya haM/ de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag nyid rnam par bsams la sngags 'dis der byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /sa ma ya
<p>181b.3</p>satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ de nas rang gi lha snga ma bzhin du thab kyi dbus su bsams la sbyin sreg ji lta ba bzhin du bya ste/ mchod nas snying po 'dis gshegs su gsol lo/ /badzra muHde nas rang gi snying ga las byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i
<p>181b.4</p>gnas na gnas pas dbang bskur la mdzub mo gnyis kyi phreng ba bcings shing de bzhin du snying po 'dis bcing bar bya'o/ /oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+ba mu dra mai tri D+hi ku ru ba ra ka pa tse na baM/ rin chen sems ma'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rin chen rdo rje las mthe bo mnyam ste
<p>181b.5</p>mdzub mo bkug pa dang rtse sbyar ba'o/ /de nas yang go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcing ba de bkrol la snying po 'di dang mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o/ /badzra tu Sh+ya hoH/ go cha 'dis phyag rgya dgrol ba dang / dbang bskur ba bcing zhing mnyes par bya ba'am/ rdo rje sems
<p>181b.6</p>dpas kyang rdo rje nyid du nye bar dgrol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod la/ gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o/ /rdo rje 'gying pa'i tshul gyis su/ /bsam pa g.yos pas gdung bar bya/ /phreng ba bcing dang kha nas byung / /rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin/ /
<p>181b.7</p>rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba yis/ /spos la sogs pa de bzhin dbul/ /thur du blugs dang gyen du gtor/ /bskor dang de bzhin byug pa'o/ /badzra lA s+ye/ badzra mA le/ badzra gI ti/ badzra nr-i t+ye/ badzra d+hU pe/ badzra puSh+pe/ badzra A lo ke/ badzra gan+d+he/ rdo rje bstod pa'i glu ni 'di
<p>182a</p>
<p>182a.1</p>yin te/ oM badzra satwa su saM gra haM/ badzra rat+na ma nut+ta raM/ badzra d+har+m+ma gA ya nai/ badzra kar+m+ma ka rot+b+ha be/ rdo rje bstod pa'i glu 'di dang glu blangs la/ lag ba'i rtse mos gar byas nas/ /mchod pa thams cad bya'o/ /rab dang 'bad pas khrus byas te/ /rtag tu sbyin
<p>182a.2</p>sreg khang par zhugs/ /zhes ji skad du bshad pa de ma smras so zhe na/ de brjod par bya ste/ rnam rtog khrus kyi sbyor ba 'di/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis bshad pa/ /de ni rnam rtog tsam yin pas/ /de la blo ni 'jug mi bya/ /de bas sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /legs byas
<p>182a.3</p>khrus ni bshad par bya/ /rnam rtog la ni spyod bzhin du/ /gang gi bgegs ni mi 'jug pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /khro bo ti rIn+ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la snying gar bzhag ste/ lus 'bar ba'i gsang sngags bzla'o/ /oM ku pi ku pi
<p>182a.4</p>kA ya ku pi pra dz+wa la ni swA hA/ de nas cho ga 'di dang / dang po'i yi ge'i go chas go bgo ste rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ snying gar mdzub mo gnyis kyis mdud pa byas la rgyab tu drangs te mdud pa bya slar yang snying gar drangs te mdud pa bya/ de bzhin du lkog
<p>182a.5</p>ma'i steng du mdud pa bya ba dang / dpral bar mdud pa bya ba dang ltag par mdud pa byas nas/ rna ba gnyis kyi gong du mtha' nas dgrol bas dar dpyangs bya ste/ mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM TuM rdo rje gnod sbyin
<p>182a.6</p>gyis gdug pa thams cad bza' bar bya zhing / mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gsang sngags brjod par bya'o/ /hU~M de nas bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags brjod de/ a bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas gsang sngags 'dis chu
<p>182a.7</p>snyim pa gsum gyen du gtor bar bya'o/ /oM b+hur dz+wa la hU~M swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis cha gsum du bya ste/ gcig gis ni dge ba'i gtsang sbra bya'o/ /gnyis pas lus kyi gtsang sbra bya'o/ /gsum pas ni khrus dang nye reg bya zhing / rang gi mgor rang gi gsang sngags dang phyag
<p>182b</p>
<p>182b.1</p>rgyas chu gtor na/ rang gi rnam par rtog pa las skyes pa'i bgegs mi 'byung ste/ sems can 'tshe ba'am sdig pa dag khyed la med kyi ma 'jigs shig /rig pa las byung dge ba bzhin/ /bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung / /khrus byas nas ni sbyin sreg gi/ /cho ga thams
<p>182b.2</p>cad spyad par bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ snying po 'dis gyen du dgrol lo/ /oM khyed kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad/ /dngos grub ji bzhin gsol lags kyis/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ badzra satwa muH/ de nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i
<p>182b.3</p>byang chub kyi sems chen po rjes su dran la/ ci bde bar gnas par bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ming tsam zhig /lan cig yongs su gzung bas kyang / /'di ni bsrung ba dam pa ste/ /mi zad rtag pa'i dngos grub ster/ /mkhas pa ngang pa'i rgyal pos rtogs par bya ba'i
<p>182b.4</p>phyir/ /'dir ni sbyin sreg cho ga bris pas dge ba gang bsags pa/ des ni srid gsum tsher ma 'byin cing zhi bzhi rtog ldan pa/ rgyal ba lnga yi cod pan 'dzin dang 'gro ba rjes su mnyam par shog /kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so// // 
<p>182b.5\] ]@##/ /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga rab gnas kyi rgyal po bzhugs/ @##/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te/ /rgyud rnams thams cad las bsdus te/ /
<p>182b.6</p>rab gnas cho ga bshad par bya/ /de la dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pa dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang thob pa/ rig pa'i sdom pa gzung ba/ gsang ba'i mchod pa'i bya ba shes pa/ dpa' la brtan pa spro ba che ba/ dul ba phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 
<p>182b.7</p>gsang ba'i ye shes bslabs pa/ phyag rgya bzhi bsgom par mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang / sgrub pa'i grogs po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gsang ba'i cho ga'i bya ba shes pa/ gtsang ma/ gsang ba'i bya ba la mkhas pa/ blo dang ldan pa dang / snying stobs dang
<p>183a</p>
<p>183a.1</p>ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ grong khyer ram grong rdal lam/ nags tshal lam/ ljongs sam/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang du lugs su blugs pa'am/ 'bur du brkos pa'am/ ri mor bris pa zhi ba'am/ dbang ngam rgyas pa'am/ 
<p>183a.2</p>mngon spyod la sogs pa'i sku rab tu gnas pa byed par 'dod na/ dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi'i nye 'khor du dris nye bar byugs nas dkon mchog gsum dang / rab tu gnas par byed pa'i lha dang / rdo rje slob dpon la dmigs te/ maN+Dal lnga byas nas mchod pa lnga bshams nas
<p>183a.3</p>stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs bgos nas cod pan dang rgyan btags te/ phreng ba dang dag byed dang ldan pas/ skar ma rgyal dang gza' phur bu'i nyin par khrus byas shing zas dkar gsum zos pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang dril bu rnams bris te/ gu gul
<p>183a.4</p>gyi dud pas bdugs pa dang / yungs kar gyis bgegs bzlog nas bsnyen pa dang / de la re zhig rnam par rtog pa shas chung na/ stong pa nyid kyis khrus bya ba/ lce byin gyis brlab pa dang / lag pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / khro bo bzhi'i lus bskyed pa dang / khro bo
<p>183a.5</p>gsum gyis bgegs bsal ba dang / khro bo drug gis phyogs bcing ba dang / khro bo gsum gyis ra ba dang dra ba byas la/ mchod pa byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje 'khor los dkyil 'khor sprul la/ mchod pa dang phyag btsal ba dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / rjes
<p>183a.6</p>su yi rang ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang / mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / mchod pa'i sprin dang lus dbul ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sdom pa gzung ba dang / gzugs
<p>183a.7</p>brnyan gyi lhar bskyed nas mnyam pa'i thal mo dang / rdo rje thal mo dang / rdo rje bsdams pa dang / bsdams pa dral ba dang / ye shes dbab pa dang / dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba dang / ngan song dgug cing sdig pa dral ba dang / dkyil 'khor snying gar bsdu ba dang / 
<p>183b</p>
<p>183b.1</p>mngon par byang chub lngas lhar bskyed la/ byin gyis brlab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi bsgom pa dang / snying gar dbang bskur ba dang / phrin las kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po bskyed pa dang / rjes su rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams gzhug pa
<p>183b.2</p>dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la/ bdag nyid thabs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs par byas la/ ye shes kyis sbyong ba stong pa nyid bsgoms pa dang / rdo rje'i sa sbyang ba 'byung ba rim brtsegs gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bskyed
<p>183b.3</p>pa dang / 'chi ba'i srid pa ri rab kyi rtse mor lus gzhag pa dang / srid pa bar ma do bsam gtan gzugs med pa bsgom pa dang / skye ba'i rnal 'byor byang chub sems dpa' don grub tu bskyed pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bslangs nas dang po'i sbyor ba dang /
